description: Exclusive home located in the Reserva de San Antón urbanization, a closed residential complex of single-family homes, with private security (Prosegur) 24 hours a day and located in the prestigious area of Pinares de San Antón. The entire urbanization is surrounded by natural areas of vegetation and protected trees, which give it a lot of tranquility and independence, as well as panoramic views of the sea. Another value to highlight of the urbanization is its communication, since despite its situation in a natural environment and its consequent privacy, it is located three minutes by car from one of the main commercial areas of the capital and the beach, a ten minutes by car from the city center and a few from the Rincón de la Victoria shopping center. It also has public transport with line 29 of municipal buses and direct access to the Mediterranean highway. The urbanization has large community gardens, two swimming pools, a paddle tennis court, a sports area with a grass football court, a small basketball court and a games area. The house has an elevator for four people The property is distributed in: Torreón Plant: There is the entrance hall to the house as well as a private parking area (40m2) with space for two large cars, a covered storage room / clothesline and a large 25 m2 terrace that has a large pergola area and fantastic views Sea. Floor 1: Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom (with bathtub and separate shower), dressing room and terrace, two bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and another bathroom, all with sea views. Floor 0: Living room with fireplace, kitchen with island, office and pantry, a bedroom with a built-in wardrobe, a bathroom with shower. Both from the living-dining room and the kitchen there is access to a magnificent 29m2 porch and the 34m2 private garden. All materials are top quality, hot / cold air conditioning in all rooms, electric shutters, laminated flooring finished in oak, armored door, thermo acoustic glazing with air chamber and access gate to private motorized parking. Visit her without commitment!

description: Your own private paradise, Villa Palmeras, in the middle of Costa del Sol. This property hides a huge amount of wonderful details. The entrance floor has a large hall, dining room, a kitchen, a utility room, lots of terrace space, a large courtyard, a two-car garage and an entrance to the north wing of the building, which has a huge suite with its own bathroom, a walk-in closet and its own terrace. There are 5 bedrooms on the ground floor, each with their own bathroom. In addition, there is one separate room, as well as a bathroom for guests and, of course, access to the pool area. You will not have a sense of being cramped in this place. Inside and out you have a lot of space everywhere. The plot is a so-called double plot. The orientation of the house is towards the south and the swimming pool area gets sun all day. The pool is lit, so it's amazing even at dusk, and there's also a separate shower. The building is in very good condition, as a large amount of money has been spent on renovations and upgrades. There is a wonderful, well-maintained garden with an automatic irrigation system. The location is peaceful, there is a supermarket and schools nearby, and the services of Arroyo de la Miel and the train station are about a 15-minute walk away. The lovely Benalmádena Pueblo is only a 5 minute drive away, the beaches 10 minutes away and Benalmádena Marina 15 minutes away. This is our exclusive listing. Contact us and we will book a viewing for you!

description: Casa Carmen is a majestic and spacious penthouse located in one of the best areas of Malaga, on the Antonio Banderas seafront, in the Torres de San Andrés. It is a private and very exclusive urbanization with only two blocks of 14 neighbors. Located on the seventh and last floor of the block to which we access by an elevator for individual use that gives us direct access to the house. It is a spacious two-storey penthouse of 247m2 divided between the house and the solarium. We enter through a hall that distributes us in a comfortable way to the different rooms. It consists of three bedrooms and two bathrooms: The main bedroom of about 12 m2, with a dressing room and built-in wooden wardrobes, as well as a recently renovated 6 m2 bathroom with a large shower and underfloor heating walls. The second bedroom of about 9 m2 and with a built-in wardrobe and window to the east terrace and the third bedroom, of about 10.6 m2, also has a built-in wardrobe and a window with the same orientation as the previous one. The second bathroom of about 45m2 composed of a bathtub. It also has a comfortable living room with two rooms that lead us to the east terrace, which is undoubtedly one of the great luxuries of this penthouse, since it runs around the entire exterior perimeter of the house (an east-facing area of 22 m2 and with views of the sea and another area with a north orientation of 29 m2 and views of the Parque del Oeste and the Montes de Málaga) and that is accessed from the living room and also from the master bedroom. The other terrace or solarium, is located on the upper floor, which is accessed by stairs from inside the house, this area is more than a simple terrace, since it has 90 m2 and a room made of wood and closures glass that has a fully equipped kitchen (water, electricity and gas stove) and enough space to enjoy its spectacular views and host celebrations with friends, events and family gatherings, or simply enjoy daily life. The sale of the house includes a large garage space, 33 m2 (in which two vehicles can be parked) and a large storage room of about 9 m2. It is an area that enjoys a high level of development and quality of life, has a multitude of shops and restaurants, emblematic buildings of the city and its proximity to the center of Malaga make it an ideal place to live.

description: We are pleased to present this charming semi-detached house in the upper area of El Limonar, known as Mayorazgo. The property is part of an exclusive complex of 29 houses with communal pool and gardens. Just a short walk from the sea and a few minutes from the services area, with supermarkets, cafes, hospital, sports and social club and small neighbourhood shops.  The house is characterized by an elegant design, spacious rooms, quality construction and a large plot with garden, ideal for outdoor games, barbecue, have a garden or solarium. We have 292 m2 built distributed in three floors, ground floor, upper floor and semi-basement. The main orientation is southwest, with views of the surrounding houses and lush vegetation. The plot is accessed from the parking area, which also has a direct staircase to the kitchen patio. Another staircase leads down to the garden and further on to the entrance of the house. The entrance hall is spacious and bright. On this floor there is an elegant living/dining room with a beautiful marble fireplace and access to a cosy porch. The kitchen receives light from a large patio with flower pots and a circular table, ideal for breakfast or improvised aperitifs in the open air while cooking. There is a room with a full bathroom, which is now used for watching TV, but could be a guest bedroom. Upstairs there are four bedrooms and three bathrooms, the master ensuite. All the bathrooms have windows and the master has a skylight that illuminates the bathroom spectacularly. The master bedroom has a private terrace. All bedrooms have fitted wardrobes and electric blinds. The house ends in a solarium terrace. The semi-basement has a huge living room with windows onto English patios. There are also several rooms for storage, laundry and service, and a complete bathroom. The property is ideal for families due to its layout, proximity to the schools in the area, services, communications, but also a perfect holiday home, because it hardly requires any maintenance, the community is pleasant and has a swimming pool, and we are close to the motorway. The area of El Mayorazgo is located between El Limonar and Colinas de Limonar. It is highly demanded, due to the boost that the new developments have given. We will be happy to show you the details of this house and all that this neighbourhood has to offer.

description: The location of this property is very special and emblematic just next to the beautiful Iglesia de San Juan, 3 minutes away from Calle Larios, and walking distance to El Muelle Uno, La Alcazaba and the closest beach la Malagueta. This historical building of only 4 neighbours is from 1830 and it was renovated in 2005. We will be already amazed from the facade looking at the french balconies. Perhaps the building does not have an elevator the apartment is located on the 1st floor of the building. The apartment was renovated in April 2022 and we can feel the love that the actual owner put in every corner of the house, every material used. The apartment has a very special feeling, since you open the main door, specially at night with the dim lights that invite you to relax on the coach and disconnect from a long day.  We will find an open kitchen area very welcoming for when you have guests or when after a long day at work you feel like cooking and catching up with your family. The living room area counts with 2 french cozy balconies where to enjoy a nice glass of wine. We find a very spacious master bedroom with a french balcony and another spacious room with one too.  On the other side we encounter a lovely and sizeable walking closet with ensuite complete bathroom and another full complete bathroom. The high of the ceiling has allowed us to create a cozy loft with another bed.  We will be amazed by the wooden beams, the high ceiling the lovely marble floors, the nice quality of the materials used, the double glazed windows. Come and see the special vibe that his house has to offer before it gets sold. Ideal also for investors who want to invest as the building allows the tourist license. There is an option to buy a private space at 28,000 euros in a nearby parking area.

The exterior part of the house has a closed garage area for one vehicle and another covered interior parking area, pool area and green area. The state of conservation is fantastic, the house does not need any type of investment to be inhabited and it is a very good investment not only for the finalist client who is looking for a magnificent home to live in but also for that client who seeks to make his money profitable through the short-term rental in tourist format. description: Super spacious townhouse with a large living room, huge bedrooms, suite type, with en-suite bathrooms. Huge wall-to-wall built-in wardrobes. If you are looking for a very spacious home and you do not need many bedrooms and that is located in a good urbanization in a quiet area and not far from services and on the first line of golf and its driving range, you should ask us for a visit, I am sure you will like it. The dining room is very spacious with a fireplace, to which the porch with aluminum enclosure has been incorporated, giving great clarity and comfort. The kitchen is very spacious to which the laundry room has been incorporated and has a serving hatch to the dining area. On the first floor there are two magnificent suites with private bathrooms. The main one has a terrace with pleasant views of the golf course. Garden for private use with jacuzzi and storage room. The community is closed. It is very quiet and has a large pool for few neighbors. The community fee includes water and garden care for private use. A covered parking space in the same community is included in the price. It has a tourist use license Brokerage fees are included in the sale price. Notary fees, property registration and property transfer tax (7%) are not included.

description: ELEGANT, COMFORTABLE, BEAUTIFUL TWO BEDROOM DUPLEX WITH A MODERN DESIGN IN THE HISTORICAL CENTER IN A BUILDING BUILT IN 2020 WITH A PARKING SPACE AND STORAGE ROOM. FORTUNY HOMES ÚNICOS offers for sale this beautiful, comfortable, bright and modern duplex located in the Historic Center of Malaga. The house has a privileged location, just a 5-minute walk from the emblematic Calle Larios, surrounded by all services such as supermarkets, pharmacies, leisure and restaurant shops and the biggest cultural and restaurant offer. This beautiful duplex is located in a modern building built in 2020. It has a sunny terrace with electric awnings and a comfortable and spacious parking space and a storage room. The property is quiet due to its location within the building. It is oriented to the southeast and has a constructed area of 121m2 and 85m2 useful, distributed over two floors: Ground floor: Upon entering the property you feel the peace of a comfortable and comfortable home. All the spaces are perfectly used, and decorated in an elegant and comfortable style. On this floor, we find a spacious and bright living-dining room in a modern classic style, a fully furnished American kitchen in light tones, perfectly equipped with all the top brand appliances, perfectly studied storage space, and a bedroom with built-in wood-lined wardrobes and an en-suite bathroom. First floor: consists of a beautiful main bedroom with fitted wardrobes lined with wood with access to a sunny terrace facing southwest with motorized awnings and points of water and electricity, maximum privacy, and the bedroom has an en-suite bathroom. The duplex, built in 2020, offers the best qualities. We highlight the air conditioning of the house with aerothermal, double-glazed Climalit windows, porcelain floors imitating wood, and a fully furnished kitchen equipped with Bosch brand appliances, awning electric, fitted wardrobes lined with wood. The property has a parking space and a storage room included in the price.  Furnished for sale, as seen in the photographs. All the furniture is new and designed. It is an excellent property ideal for family use or as an investment since the house can access to obtain a vacation rental permit. With a strategic location in the Historic Center of Malaga, close to schools, nurseries, hospitals, public transport, shops, restaurants, and all amenities at your fingertips. Energy Certificates are in process. In compliance with the RD of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of 11 October, we inform consumers that the price indicated does not include the costs derived from the purchase of the property according to the laws in force (ITP, notary fees and in the case of new construction the VAT tax). description: IMPECCABLE VILLA.DESIGN AND FUNCTIONALITY.WITH SEA VIEWS IN CHURRIANA.MALAGA TRESOL Inmobiliaria sells this VILLA, like new, built in 2015 with high qualities, with the possibility of expanding rooms by conditioning the semi-basement and located in a quiet area surrounded by nature and 2 minutes from supermarkets, 5 from the center of Churriana, 10 minutes from the beach, Plaza Mayor and airport and with fast connection to highways. On a 405m2 plot, the 310m2 house built on three floors plus a solarium, is distributed in a hall, living-dining room, kitchen, pantry/laundry room, porch, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, garage and raw space in the semi-basement.All rooms are exterior and with lots of natural light. EXTERIORS: It has everything, living area, swimming pool, porch, and a garden that is very easy to maintain, landscaped, but with artificial grass. Porch with wooden ceiling and built-in leds, with exit from the kitchen. Pool currently fenced for the protection of the little ones but very easy to uninstall. Elegant landscaped front entrance. MAIN FLOOR: Hall, living room, kitchen, utility room, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom and porch. An elegant hall with high ceilings, full of light, with a staircase with flown wooden steps, welcome us to this fantastic villa. We access the living room through sliding doors that are embedded in the partitions, leaving the space free.The living-dining room is on two levels: dining room with large windows, an elegant large fireplace separates both spaces and two steps below, the living area, very cozy and with sliding doors leading out to the garden and pool. A wonderful and modern kitchen with a central island, breakfast bar, dining area, and a room equipped as a laundry room and pantry.It has access to a porch and garden.The kitchen is delivered fully furnished with excellent qualities and equipped with electrical appliances. In the rest area there is a bedroom with 3 sections of built-in wardrobes and an exterior bathroom with a built-in shower with a glass partition. UPPER FLOOR: 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom The corridor on this floor is very bright: it overlooks the hall through several openings with a glass railing and also has stained glass windows throughout the height of the staircase. The two bedrooms are very spacious and with large built-in wardrobes.The main one with a terrace with views. The bathroom is exterior and with a built-in shower with a glass screen. BASEMENT: 1 bedroom, garage, storage area. With access from the garage and from the hall on the main floor. A very spacious bedroom with a large closet, with natural light. In the garage area there is a space with windows that can be added to make a cinema room, games room, another bedroom, etc. In the parking area there is capacity for 2 cars plus another on the outside ramp.In addition to having plenty of space for storage. Treatment area. SOLARIUM: Terrace with views. DETAILS: Air conditioning by plants, hot / cold Tilt-and-turn double-glazed PVC windows Marble floors and laminated flooring Security home entrance door automatic car gate Parking spaces, 2 closed and 1 on ramp Solar panels for hot water awnings on porch Year of construction 2.015 No community fees IBI: €1,163/year For more information, do not hesitate to contact us, we will be happy to assist you.REF 1.712 Phone: 952 410 333.WhatsApp and mobile phone: 662 922 851 (In compliance with RD of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of October 11, it is reported that the price does not include the expenses derived from the purchase of real estate according to current laws: notary, registry, ITP expenses, etc.).

description: Magnificent home for sale with great views, on the first line facing the sea and the beach, on the Paseo Maritimo, where you can enjoy great walks and access the beach. Very well located in La Malagueta, a highly demanded residential area. With all kinds of services in the area, such as supermarkets, restaurants, cafeterias, pharmacies, hairdressers, etc. The house is close to Pier One, in the Port of Malaga, where you can enjoy all the existing offer both in the various shops and in restaurants, cafeterias, drinks, etc. , as well as visit the Pompidou Museum. Five minutes from the Historic Center of Malaga through the spectacular City Park, where the Picasso, Thyssen, Municipal, Customs, etc. museums are located. As well as the Cathedral and the different artistic monuments that exist. The house is located in a unique building with security 24 hours a day. Its distribution is very comfortable and its orientation to the South makes it very bright and cheerful. Once on the corresponding floor, the landing is for use only for this house, without sharing access to the door of the house with any neighbor. From the moment we enter the spacious Hall, with a built-in wardrobe, the space is divided between the access to the living-dining room with a large terrace and magnificent views of the sea, the bedrooms and the kitchen. The living-dining room area is large with several large windows with magnificent views of the sea, the Paseo Maritimo and the South, which makes it very bright. The living room has a large terrace. The bedroom area is divided into two areas: entering the hall to the right is the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, a built-in wardrobe and access to a second terrace with sea views and plenty of light. Next to the main bedroom there is another bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and also with access to the same terrace. Going back to the hall, there is access to two very spacious bedrooms, both with fitted wardrobes, sea views and both share a bathroom with a window. The kitchen area is very large since it contains the kitchen with a second service door, a service bedroom with its bathroom en suite, a pantry with a window and a laundry room with lots of light.

description: WONDERFUL VILLA COMPLETELY RENOVATED WITH SPECTACULAR VIEWS IN PINOS DE ALHAURIN, ALHAURIN DE LA TORRE, MALAGA The house has two floors with a total built area of 508 m2 (412 m2 indoors and 96 m2 outdoors), all on a 781 m2 plot.   Property Description:   Low level:   The entire plot is fenced with a perimeter wall built with imitation natural stone concrete blocks.Entrance gate to the enclosure and reinforced vehicle exit.On the surface we can find various fruit trees as well as planters and orchard, all assisted by drip irrigation.Inside the house we have a huge 79 m2 living room with two leisure rooms, an open kitchen with an island and a dining area with direct access to a large covered porch with an impressive wooden pergola.From the porch we have access, on the same level, to a beautiful infinity pool with extensive views of the valley and the mountains, a hammock area where there is a full bathroom with shower. From the pool area we access the master bedroom, with a 4 meter long wardrobe, a beautiful bathroom that includes a designer shower and bathtub and a luxurious 10 M2 dressing room.On the same floor there is a double bedroom with a custom-made wardrobe and direct access to an elegant bathroom with shower.   Semi-ground plant:   Floor of 180 M2 where there is a cellar, two double rooms (one of them used as an office), a bathroom with shower, storage room and diaphanous area with a relaxation area and another for guests with a built-in bar and a drinks fridge.The room is completed with space for several vehicles and a garage door with an independent pedestrian entrance and exit door. Possibility of expanding the number of rooms and bathrooms without changing the volume of construction.   The house is located between 10 and 20 minutes from the most important points of Malaga: Malaga International Airport, AVE Station, Technology Park, the most significant Shopping Centers in the area, the center of Malaga and its Old Town, several beaches in Malaga and Torremolinos, several golf courses (Parador, Lauro golf and others), etc.Excellent location in a consolidated commercial and equipment area (supermarkets, shopping centers, leisure area, restaurants, schools, etc.)   QUALITIES:   RADIATING FLOOR COLD/HEAT SOLAR PANELS SAVING ENERGY AND HOT WATER OVERFLOWING AND TRADITIONAL INFINITY POOL, WITH SALINE PURIFICATION EQUIPMENT TANK FOR RUNNING WATER WATER TANK 300 LITERS FOR HOT WATER 1ST QUALITY PORCELAIN FLOOR CLIMALIT KOMMERLING WINDOWS THROUGHOUT THE HOUSE, IMITATION WOOD, TILT-TURN WITH SAFETY GLASS 6+6.4 STREET GATE REINFORCED STEEL FIXING KITCHEN COUNTERTOPS DETKOR SYSTEM (COSENTINO) ROCA BRAND BATHROOMS (IN THE 4 BATHROOMS) MAGNETIC CLOSURE SYSTEM ON ALL DOORS.   We have plans, project, quality report, etc. available to those interested.   Price negotiable depending on the term and form of payment.     SPANISH - ENGLISH - DEUTSCH - FRANCAIS - NEDERLANDS - RUSSIAN       In compliance with the decree of the Junta de Andalucía 218-2005 of October 11, customers are informed that notary, registry, ITP and financial expenses are not included in the price.

description: FORTUNY HOGARES ÚNICOS offers this fantastic property for sale. Located in a quiet residential area, you will have at your fingertips all kinds of services, such as supermarkets or restaurants, and in just 15 minutes on foot you will find the Puerto Deportivo de Benalmádena, where you can enjoy the beach, the commercial and restaurant area and the Sea Life Center, dedicated to marine fauna. With 886.05 m2 of plot and 425.35 m2 built, it is a very special property, as it is divided into two buildings within the same enclosure. On the one hand, we find the main house, distributed over two floors. On the ground floor we find the hall area, a fully furnished and equipped kitchen, with microwave, oven, hob, dishwasher and extractor hood, a dining area that connects to the kitchen, a laundry area, a spacious and bright living room with fireplace, a full bathroom, and two bedrooms, one of them with an en suite bathroom, also complete. Going up to the first floor we find a wonderful bedroom with natural light, which gives direct access to the terrace, with built-in wardrobes and an en-suite bathroom. On the other, we have the other building, called "The gap". Going down the stairs we come to a wonderful and very spacious basement, which enjoys natural light, with a fireplace and access to the cellar area. On this floor we also find an industrial kitchen, a complete bathroom and a garage with capacity for at least two vehicles. As for the outdoor area, it has a garden area, swimming pool and a large porch with barbecue area, where you can relax and enjoy an excellent meal in the sun. It has two more covered parking spaces on the ground floor. Among its excellent qualities we highlight its ceramic floor, air conditioning and built-in wardrobes. It is a habitable home, although with excellent possibilities for reform. At Fortuny Hogares Únicos, we have a Technical Service specialized in: Projects, reforms, interior design, licenses, energy certificates and everything you need to carry out any project you need. Contact us without obligation. Some of the images in the ad are infographics made virtually to offer examples or ideas for decoration or reform in rooms of the property. Fortuny is at your disposal to advise you on everything you need. Energy Certificates are in process. description: The only house located in one of the most emblematic baroque buildings in Malaga from the end of the 17th century, located in front of the Cathedral in the historic center of Malaga. A unique opportunity to acquire a part of a historic building. Entering the spacious entrance and reception area, we find the majestic central courtyard with its large columns and impressive height. The apartment on the second floor can be accessed by the wood-paneled elevator or by the wide, palatial-style stairs. Thanks to the imposing architecture and attention to every detail that characterizes this entire house, we will feel as if we were transported back in time. The home's museum-quality front door opens to reveal a foyer overlooking the ivy-covered interior courtyard, as well as the main entrance to the great room. The living room is characterized by its large size and large windows that frame the impressive views of the cathedral and the park and has one of the two fireplaces in the house. It presents three differentiated environments separated by large ornate double doors, which can be used as a living room, dining room or living room, among others. One of the bathrooms adjoining the hall includes a large circular stained glass window, a permanent reminder of the building in which it is located. From the hall, we can access the wide corridor that leads us to the service area of the house with the large kitchen and the service bedroom. Next, we will arrive at the night area with three large bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and ornamented in carved wood, one with its private bathroom and the other with the second fireplace in the house. From the kitchen, a spiral staircase gives us access to the terrace.

description: – EXCLUSIVE ARIS REAL ESTATE – Great opportunity to purchase a brand new modern-style home with more than 280m² spread over two floors with a spacious and bright patio, as well as two other terraces on the upper floor. With high-quality materials and designed for large families who need space and privacy, this house is the ideal option for living in a quiet environment with extra comfort. Located a few steps from the town center and the main services and shops, this house gives you the chance to live in a historic enclave of Alhaurín de la Torre, where walking through its traditional streets is one of the main attractions. The house is distributed in: – Ground floor: living-dining room with access to the patio, living room or work area, two bedrooms, one of them en suite, separate kitchen with utility room and toilet. – First floor: three bedrooms, one of them with access to its own terrace, bathroom with shower and an additional independent terrace. *Special promotion: the first 50 visits will have a discount check worth €15,000 to furnish the kitchen. With the discount applied, the price of the house would be €340,000. *In compliance with RD of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of October 11, Messrs. description: DESCRIPTION OF THE PROPERTY Engel&Völkers is proud to present an apartment on the fifth floor of a majestic residential complex located in Calle Goethe number 12. It has a spacious entrance hall and a large living room to the right which leads out onto the terrace with unobstructed views of El Limonar. To the left of the entrance hall we find the large fully fitted kitchen.  Through the hallway we find the master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and ample wardrobes which also gives access to the terrace. If we go along the corridor there is a bathroom that serves the other three bedrooms that are spacious as well. It has parking and storage room and the complex is very quiet. It has a large swimming pool, tennis court, large gardens, barbecue area and pergola area. The location is very quiet, ideal for those who wish to live in the heart of El Limonar with all the amenities that this exclusive area of Malaga has to offer. DESCRIPTION OF THE LOCATION “El Limonar” has been one of the most exclusive and sought-after areas to live in from many decades due to its great quality of life and above all because of its proximity to the city centre and the beach. It is one of the most emblematic residential areas in Málaga, due to its tranquility and to its excellent geographical location as it is close to all kind of comforts: shops, restaurants, cafés, international schools etc. Furthermore, “El Limonar” is characterized for the abundance of gardens and vegetation.  All things considered, it is an ideal place for all those people who wish to live close to the city centre, but enjoying at the same time, a great quality of life in a dream area.

description: Spectacular duplex apartment, very bright and with a large terrace in the Paseo de Reding area, consisting of 185 m2 + 35m2 of terrace, with a central distribution, 4 bedrooms, views of the sea and the area of Mount Gibralfaro. The living room is spacious and bright in a gallery with a dining room from which you can enjoy spectacular frontal views of the sea from where you access the master bedroom by going up the spiral stairs, this bedroom has large windows with an en-suite bathroom and a large dressing room, it has another adjoining bedroom and also with sea views. Downstairs, there are two other bedrooms that share a bathroom and are of great size. The South-East facing terrace, which is accessed from the upper floor, is large enough to house a table for 6 people and a seating area, giving rise to an idyllic place from which to contemplate the sea on a daily basis. The price includes a garage space and a storage room in the same building. A spectacular home!

description: LOOK NO FURTHER, YOU HAVE ARRIVED AT THE END OF THE ROAD.EXCLUSIVE LUXURY VILLA FULLY RENOVATED AND FURNISHED IN THE MIDDLE AREA OF THE URB.THE WINERY.ALHAURIN DE LA TORRE You will love this enviable Villa with 7 rooms, recently renovated with hot water and electricity from solar panels. TRESOL Inmobiliaria offers a 450m2 VILLA for sale, built on a 1,077m2 plot with impressive views, located in a unique enclave.A 5-minute walk from the main avenue, pharmacy, restaurant, bus, 5m by car from the center of Alhaurín de la Torre, and 15m from the airport, beaches, Plaza Mayor, Technology Park and the center of Malaga. OUTDOORS The exterior is perfect for you to spend your time with your loved ones, and not for you to spend your time maintaining the garden.A garden surrounded by flower boxes with bougainvilleas and shrubs, which give it color and privacy.Fantastic 32m2 pool, carriage entrance with automatic gate and outdoor parking, terrace on the main floor with barbecue pergola and patio. THE VILLE With 459m2, it was built with the highest quality and completely renovated 5 years ago with exquisite taste, taking care of even the smallest detail to make this luxury Villa a cozy home full of corners where you can enjoy privacy and peace.The owners include the furniture in the price, many of the pieces are handmade Italian design. It is distributed over 3 floors, ground, main and upper with: Living room - dining room, kitchen, 7 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms, porches and terraces. MAIN FLOOR: Lobby, living room - dining room, kitchen, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, terraces and patio. A spacious hall welcomes us announcing the cozy and elegant home that awaits us.To the left, an arch gives us access to a large living-dining room with an open kitchen of approx. 75m2.Entering the living room is a delight for the eyes, looking out onto the balcony terrace with impressive views and going down to the garden and pool, or snuggling up by the fireplace with your favorite book on cold days, it is irresistible. From the living room we go out to another large terrace with a pergola with barbecue/bar, ideal for summer gatherings around the table.The light-filled dining room opens to the kitchen.The kitchen with Schmidt furniture and high-end appliances, with a breakfast bar and a very large laundry room with access to the patio and barbecue area. On this floor a bedroom/office with large windows and a bathroom. GROUND FLOOR: 2 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms We went down from the lobby to this marvel.The owners have enabled in the reform a large room of more than 40m2 as the master bedroom, an open space to the garden/pool, with a Balinese bed, a cozy living room and a huge bathroom with Jacuzzi, dressing room and sauna with another bathroom.A luxury suite you won't want to leave.It could be perfect for a movie theater, summer lounge... The second bedroom, also en suite, with lounge and bathroom. UPPER FLOOR: 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.All with fitted wardrobes To the left, a bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, with views of the Guadalhorce Valley, very bright.To the right 3 bedrooms and a bathroom.1 of them large with a work and living area.It shares a large bathroom, with a shower and double sink. DETAILS: -Premium teak parquet floors -Hot water – solar panels.butane thermos support -Electricity – Photovoltaic -Pvc windows with thermal break and double glazing -Alarm.Windows and security doors -Automatic irrigation system -Electric towel rails in bathrooms -Sauna, Jacuzzi. - Gym equipment -IBI: €1,600/year For more information, REF 1785.Phone: 952 410 333.WhatsApp and mobile phone: 662 922 851.

description: Lucas Fox presents this wonderful apartment with four bedrooms and two bathrooms for sale. The property enjoys spectacular frontal views of the bay, the seafront promenade and the port of Malaga, since it is located in the area of La Malagueta, a few steps from the seafront promenade.  Upon entering, we find the entrance hall that leads to all the rooms on the floor. To the right of the entrance hall, we have the large living room with access to the spectacular terrace with frontal views of the sea and the bay. To the left of the entrance hall, there is the service area with a bedroom and a bathroom. Next, we go to the kitchen with utility room and pantry.  From the kitchen, there is a corridor that gives access to the sleeping area. On the right, there is the first bedroom with access to the terrace with views. Next, we have the master suite and the bathroom to be shared between the three bedrooms. The third bedroom has interior views of the building.  The apartment is located on the seafront promenade with all amenities such as pharmacies, restaurants, shops and leisure area. It has a bus stop that allows us to enjoy all the pleasures of living in Malaga and only 5 minutes from the centre.  Contact Lucas Fox for more information.

description: Lucas Fox presents this exclusive and spacious house, just a step away from the airport and the Plaza Mayor shopping center and just 20 minutes from Malaga.  The house was built with great care and has been well cared for ever since. The house is very spacious and bright and it is very easy to adapt it to different needs. Thanks to its great breadth and flexibility to create different combinations of spaces, you can design a dream home, according to your tastes and needs.  From the entrance, we can appreciate its spaciousness, with its spacious living-dining room. This same leads us to a terrace area built later, to be able to enjoy the more than 300 days of sunshine a year in Malaga, thanks to its south orientation. On this main floor, we have a small room with a fireplace and next to it, an office, the kitchen and the laundry area.  From the living room we will go up to the first floor that houses the night area. Firstly, there is the main bedroom, with its dressing room and a private bathroom. The second bedroom also has a private bathroom and access to a terrace with views of the extensive green areas and the Mediterranean Sea.  Some stairs will lead us to the diaphanous roof area, where the views are even more impressive.  On the lower floor of the house, we will have a parking area for several cars, approximately four storage rooms, a cistern and an office with several windows to the outside of the house. In this house, even the garage receives abundant light.  Its outdoor areas are well used. It has a mature garden that surrounds the entire plot with automatic irrigation installed and a swimming pool, currently covered for the winter months. Its facade was made with one of the best types of brick and has remained intact all these years. We also have a covered outdoor parking area, in case you need it.  Do not hesitate any longer and call us to visit this great home, very spacious, natural light and endless possibilities, ideal as a dream permanent residence.

description: Cozy and familiar townhouse in the quiet and exclusive Cerrado de Calderón neighborhood, this house has a beautiful and large covered terrace, closed with a high-quality window, where, thanks to the fantastic climate that Malaga offers, you can enjoy moments of tranquility and relaxation or pleasant dinners and chats with your family and friends. The living room, the perfect space for day to day, has a seating area and a dining area, it has a terrace with beautiful views and a cozy fireplace for cold days. Another area to highlight in this beautiful semi-detached house is the interior patio and laundry area that helps with the daily organization of the house. This property has heating and air conditioning in all rooms, is located within a community which offers common areas and swimming pools, has access to a private parking space and storage room As for the location, we can say that it is located in one of the most beautiful and exclusive areas of Malaga, it has large green areas where you can walk, playgrounds and well-known restaurants, with easy access to the highway and a 15-minute drive to the center of Malaga. Cerrado de Calderón, more commonly known as "El Cerrado", is located in the eastern part of Malaga, being one of the most demanded residential areas with a relief mountainous with abundant vegetation and where, thanks to its orography, a large number of homes have unobstructed views of the urbanization, the sea and the bay of Malaga. The properties are, for the most part, individual, semi-detached and semi-detached chalets with swimming pools and lush gardens that make the homes of Cerrado de Calderón the perfect location, since tranquility and well-being are combined with proximity to the city center either by car (10 to 15 minutes from its different locations), or thanks to an excellent network of municipal buses.Cerrado de Calderón has two main shopping centers which are the "Multicentro" with a supermarket and the "Next Shopping" shopping center located north of the urbanization.In addition, the residential area of Cerrado de Calderón has the privilege of housing four of the best schools in Malaga which are: the Cerrado de Calderón school, the Lycée Français (or French Lyceum), the British school The British School of Malaga and the school belonging to the Sagrado Corazón, better known as "Las Esclavas" Structured around its three main streets (Olmos, Flamencos and Cáceres) and with direct access to the Autovía del Mediterranean, the urbanization is perfectly connected to the area of beaches and the promenade of Malaga, just 15 minutes from the airport.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cerrado de Calderón - Hacienda Paredes, Málaga

description: TRAVERSO offers this beautiful town house for sale in the district of Benaque, next to the town of Macharaviaya, in the Axarquia region, which had a great commercial boom in the 18th century with the arrival of the Gálvez family, highlighting the Real Fábrica de Naipes founded in this family. In 1857, in the annex of Benaque, where the house is located, belonging to the municipality of Macharaviaya, the illustrious poet Salvador Rueda, precursor of modernism, whose house-museum is preserved and whose name bears the Macharaviaya public school, was born. The house sits on a plot of 497 square meters, it is distributed in: Entrance hall, two living rooms with fireplace, large kitchen with dining room, cellar with bar for leisure from where you can access a large porch with barbecue, then the garage area for two cars, orchard and storage room with natural light with the possibility of convert to apartment. First floor: Five bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, two bathrooms. Attic floor: A bedroom with access to the terrace from where you can see incredible views. The materials are of the highest quality, the wooden beams are appreciated throughout the house, the floors are ceramic and gloss terrazzo, the aluminum windows in wood color, split air conditioning. IDEAL FOR TOURIST RENTAL Visit it without obligation!

description: This villa is located in the lower area of Pinares de San Antón, one of the most exclusive urbanizations in the eastern part of Malaga. Perfectly oriented to the south, it enjoys beautiful unobstructed views of the Mediterranean. The house is distributed in five bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, two of them with en-suite bathrooms, three bathrooms in total and a courtesy toilet. It has two living rooms with fireplaces and a large dining room. Kitchen with ironing room. Apart from the family home, there is an apartment with an independent entrance from another street, with a living room and open kitchen, bedroom, bathroom and terrace, a total of 75 square meters. The location is unbeatable, two minutes by car from schools (León XIII, San Estanislao, Cerrado de Calderón, Liceo Francés, La Presentación, La Asunción), and nurseries, access to the highway, etc. Pool with shower, gardens and barbecue. description: Lucas Fox presents this semi-detached house of 264 m² built, in the upper area of Cerrado de Calderón, one of the most sought-after urbanizations in Malaga.  Outside the property, we are greeted by the pool and garden area, adorned by various plants.  Upon accessing the interior, on the main floor, we will find the entrance hall, which leads to the rest of the rooms. To our left, there is a practical guest toilet. In front, the living room is located, with a very relaxing seating area. To the right of this, there is the dining room area, which connects us with the kitchen, very bright and spacious, with a table to enjoy breakfast or lunch. Back in the living room, we can go out to the terrace and enjoy the day and afternoon sun that this fantastic south-facing offers us.  We go up the stairs to the first floor and to our left we will have the master suite, with access to a beautiful terrace where we can enjoy some graceful views of the mountains and the sea. This has a large dressing room (which was previously a bedroom) and a private bathroom with a shower. In this part of the house we have two other bedrooms. One of them is currently used as an office and gym and the other as a secondary double bedroom. Finally, a complete bathroom is offered to serve these two rooms.  Going up some shiny marble stairs we reach the upper floor with an open-plan multipurpose area, which is currently used as an ironing area. Here we will also have a space to store various household objects, taking advantage of every corner. On this floor we can go out onto a terrace originally designed to hang clothes, with a variety of purposes today, for example, to simply enjoy the captivating development and sunsets of the beautiful city of Malaga and the tranquility of the Cerrado de Calderon.  Going down to the lower ground floor, there is a small bedroom, with a full bathroom and a garage with space for two cars, with a charging facility for electric vehicles.  The house has an installation of photovoltaic solar panels, to take advantage of the perfect climate and more than 360 days of sunshine in this interesting city.  In this house, you will be one step away from the best international schools in Malaga, in a commercial area full of life and leisure and at the same time close to the beach.

description: WONDERFUL COUNTRY HOUSE WITH CLEAR VIEWS OF MOUNTAIN RANGE, PLOT OF 36000m2 WITH LARGE ORCHARD WITH OLIVE, ALMOND AND FRUIT TREES.    NEXT TO THE COZY VILLAGE OF CASABERMEJA AND THE MONTES DE MÁLAGA NATURAL PARK - JUST HALF AN HOUR FROM MALAGA CAPITAL CITY    *** RENOVATED HOUSE - READY TO ENTER - 100% LEGAL & REGISTERED CONSTRUCTION ***    *** ENDOWED WITH 2 OWN WATER WELLS AND 4 WATER TANKS **    This attractive house, located in the heart of the mountains is a spectacular and cosy home, which will undoubtedly satisfy any person who seeks to escape from the big city and take a break surrounded by nature. If you are looking for a quiet but charming home surrounded by nature, this is a perfect option for you and your family. Just a few minutes by car you will have access to the cosy town of Casabermeja, and just half an hour away you will find MALAGA CAPITAL CITY, with all the CULTURE, SERVICES and LEISURE at your fingertips.    On the ground floor, the house enjoys a spacious living-dining room with a picturesque FIREPLACE that effectively heats the whole house in winter, as well as a cosy and cool porch as an outdoor terrace with a garden and privileged views. You will also find 3 large bedrooms with BUILT-IN WARDROBES, 2 bathrooms, and a charming fully equipped kitchen.    The second floor is open plan with loft-style slanted ceilings, with the same dimensions as the ground floor, offering you a CARTE BLANCHE of possibilities such as expanding the number of rooms, installing an office, workshop, or simply using it as a storage area.    Outdoors, a STORAGE ROOM and a large plot of land await you where a SURFACE SWIMMING POOL, (removable), has recently been installed. The beautiful orchards cultivated with olive, almond and fruit trees of several hectares offers you unparalleled tranquillity, privacy and contact with nature.    The house was built with a MUNICIPAL BUILDING LICENSE and BUIDING PROJECT drawn up by a Superior Architect, and therefore 100% legal since its construction date. (Documentation available).    The Property is endowed with 2 natural WATER WELLS:    • The shallowest with a daily flow of 150 litres - 250 litres per day  • The deepest (205 meters deep) with a flow of 300 litres - 350 litres per day    There are 4 WATER TANKS, (Aljibes), on the property, 3 with a capacity of 9,000 litres and 1 with a capacity of 2,000 litres. The Total Capacity of the tanks is of 30,000 litres of water.    Don't miss out on this great opportunity! description: SPECTACULAR VILLA WITH CLEAR VIEWS OF THE MOUNTAIN AND VALLEY, EQUIPPED WITH A PRIVATE POOL, LARGE GARDENS, COVERED BARBECUE AREA, BASKETBALL COURT, BAR WITH GAMES AREA AND GARAGE - LOCATED IN A LISTED RESIDENTIAL AREA, PINOS DE ALHAURIN - ALHAURIN DE LA TORRE, MALAGA *** PRIVATE POOL AND GARDENS, BASKETBALL COURT, COVERED EXTERNAL DINING ROOM WITH BBQ, BAR WITH GAMES AREA *** ***FIREPLACE *** Would you like to live in one of the best areas of LA COSTA DEL SOL and ALHAURIN DE LA TORRE? This beautiful property is located in the exclusive residential area of Los PINOS DE ALHAURÍN from where you can enjoy SPECTACULAR VIEWS of mountains and valleys.Located just a few minutes from the CENTER OF ALHAURIN DE LA TORRE, enjoy living in one of the most beautiful and quiet areas, without neglecting the comfort of having all the SERVICES and SHOPS within your reach such as BANKS, PHARMACIES, CENTERS DOCTORS, SCHOOLS AND SPORTS CENTERS, SUPERMARKETS, VARIOUS STORES, RESTAURANTS and CAFETERIA.Likewise, you will have at your disposal easy access to all kinds of LEISURE and CULTURE in a few minutes, such as BEACHES, MUSEUMS, and THEATERS, thanks to its proximity to the Coast and Malaga City. GOLF lovers will not miss it with the LAURO GOLF RESORT and ALHAURIN GOLF CLUB clubs nearby, as will HIKING lovers thanks to its proximity to the mountains and a wonderful NATURAL RESERVE. TORREMOLINOS and its beaches, MÁLAGA AIRPORT, and MÁLAGA CAPITAL are only 20 minutes away by car.Alhaurín de la Torre has the convenient addition of having good access to the MAIN MOTORWAY A-7, and excellent PUBLIC TRANSPORT connections. This charming house, built with the best qualities, is divided into 3 floors.The main floor has a LARGE PORCH that surrounds it, a generous entrance HALL, a spacious and bright LIVING-DINING ROOM with a WOOD-BURNING FIREPLACE, an elegant fully equipped INDEPENDENT KITCHEN with access to the outside, a PANTRY and LAUNDRY ROOM, a guest TOILET , and finally a generous MASTER SUITE with BUILT-IN WARDROBES and an elegant EN-SUITE BATHROOM.Going up some charming stairs adorned with Andalusian ceramics and equipped with large windows that allow natural light to enter, you will have access to the first floor, where a hall currently used as a living room awaits you, TWO DOUBLE BEDROOMS, one of them with access to its own TERRACE, AN INDIVIDUAL BEDROOM and a complete BATHROOM.All the bedrooms are equipped with BUILT-IN WARDROBES and enjoy cozy V-SQUARE CEILINGS with the best quality wood.Going down to the basement floor equipped with windows and natural light, you will be surprised by a LARGE LEISURE ROOM, including a LIVING ROOM, a DINING area, a charming BAR where you can prepare cocktails with friends, a pool table and a gym.From this floor you have direct access to the outside, where you will find a LARGE Balinese-style PORCH with an EXTERNAL DINING ROOM and BARBECUE AREA, from where you can enjoy summer lunches in the company of friends and family, a PRIVATE POOL surrounded by a well-kept and spacious GARDEN, and a sports area that currently includes a BASKETBALL COURT. *** PARKING AREA INCLUDED *** What are you waiting for to call us and arrange a visit? Don't pass up this unique property! *** WE OFFER LEGAL AND FINANCIAL ADVICE *** ESPAÑOL – ENGLISH – FRANÇAIS – DEUTSCH – NEDERLANDS - RUSSIAN In compliance with the decree of the Junta de Andalucía 218-2005 of October 11, clients are informed that notary, registry, ITP and financial expenses are not included in the price.

description: This is a fantastic home located on the third and top floor of this beautiful and quiet residential complex called Los Eucaliptos. This comfortable apartment has a bright entrance hall, a large kitchen equipped with a utility room, a guest toilet and a living room with a fireplace and access to the private terrace with unobstructed views of the garden and the pool. The night area is made up of three bedrooms (the main one with an en-suite bathroom) and a complete bathroom.All rooms have fitted wardrobes, large windows and two of them with access to the terrace and balcony. The house has air conditioning and also has a private garage and community parking area. You will enjoy the light, the space and the privacy that this house offers, as well as its pleasant terraces that will make you enjoy the light of Malaga and relax with the nature that surrounds you.Its excellent location is another of the strengths of this house, since it is within walking distance of the best schools in the city, shopping centers, excellent restaurants and other services necessary for a quiet life, also having access to the Mediterranean highway. Cerrado de Calderón, more commonly known as "El Cerrado", is located in the eastern part of Malaga, being one of the most sought-after residential areas with a mountainous relief of abundant vegetation and where, thanks to its orography, a large number of houses have Unobstructed views of the urbanization, the sea and the bay of Malaga. The properties are, for the most part, individual, semi-detached and semi-detached villas with swimming pools and lush gardens that make the homes in Cerrado de Calderón the perfect location, since tranquility and well-being are combined with the proximity to the city center either by car (10 to 15 minutes from its different locations), or thanks to an excellent network of municipal buses. Cerrado de Calderón has two main shopping centers which are the "Multicentro" with a supermarket and the "Next Shopping" shopping center located to the north of the urbanization.In addition, the residential area of Cerrado de Calderón, has the privilege of housing four of the best schools in Malaga, which are: the Cerrado de Calderón school, the Lycée Français (or French Lyceum), the British school St.George's and the school belonging to the Sacred Heart, better known as "Las Esclavas" Structured around its three main streets (Olmos, Flamencos and Cáceres) and with direct access to the Mediterranean motorway, the urbanization is perfectly connected to the beach area and the Malaga promenade, just 15 minutes from the airport.

description: Are you looking for the ideal house to find tranquility and peace to live with your family or where you want to start forming that family? Do not move from this ad because I present the ideal house. In one of the best areas of Alhaurín de la Torre (El Limón) and with a unique design focused on maximum efficiency and luminosity, we find this magnificent corner Townhouse divided into 3 floors. Starting with the top floor, we find the best areas of the house to have family gatherings, such as the fabulous terrace with views of the city and the mountains, or where your children have quiet study areas that allow good concentration. On this floor we find, after climbing the wonderful marble stairs of the house, the first and main terrace of the house with wooden beams and an awning where you can enjoy the good weather of the Costa del Sol; a bedroom, a bathroom, a study room that can be another bedroom, a relaxation area with television and sofa, and another terrace. On the first floor, we find the main living room and separated by a sliding door we find the kitchen-dining room. The kitchen has been completely refurbished two years ago, and offers ample space for eating and cooking. After the kitchen we find an interior patio, with a covered area where the laundry is located. This interior patio offers a lot of light to both the rooms and the kitchen. This helps to keep the electricity consumption of the property to a minimum. Continuing on the first floor we find the 3 bedrooms, all with capacity for double beds, and the main bathroom. On the ground floor of this spacious house we find one of the areas that makes the property even more interesting: a 65m² commercial space in which any commercial activity can be developed or converted into an independent home, or even used as a large storage room or living room. of games or meetings. This local annex to the house has an independent entrance to the street. In addition to the premises, on the ground floor we find a room used as an office and the large garage for two small cars, or a car and a motorcycle. This house also has solar panels for hot water. Due to the distribution of the property, it is also interesting to divide the 3 floors and make a block of buildings with up to 4 apartments. The property is ready to receive visits. Are you going to miss it? AGM.

description: Are you looking for a spacious apartment with sea views in the towers of Playamar Torremolinos? We offer a bright, high floor with 2 bedrooms and two bathrooms of 115m2 with wonderful views of the sea and mountains. Beautiful and charming kitchen, with renovated plumbing and top brand appliances in perfect condition. Large bright dining room with double-glazed windows and blinds with room for several sofas, with a terrace where you can receive and spend good afternoons with family and friends. Bathrooms with direct light, double windows, new glass partitions and renovated plumbing. One en-suite. The bedrooms include fitted wardrobes made to measure with venetian wooden doors and interior also covered with wood in both rooms. The entire house except the closed balconies have wooden flooring in perfect condition. The balconies have ceramic floors imitating wood less than 3 years old. The house has another terrace currently used as an office with unobstructed views of the sea. This office can also be used as a guest bedroom as it has an enclosure and shutters. Double glazing surrounding the entire house and central air conditioning hot / cold. The urbanization consists of about 27,000 square meters, with several swimming pools with picnic tables, umbrellas, hammocks, leafy trees, a children's playground, mini golf, 2 tennis courts, ping-pong tables, a basketball court and a beach bar for days when you don't want to cook. At the exit of the enclosure we will find two supermarkets (Mercadona and Carrefour), a pharmacy, taxis, several restaurants (Vietnamese, Italian, Indian... ), bus stop, cafeterias and Bajondillo beach at 150m. You can park in the entire enclosure, with a license plate reader, two cars per apartment. The community price includes water, electricity, daily garbage collection on the same floor, security surveillance and maintenance. Do you want to know more details about this fantastic home? Do not hesitate and contact us, we are looking forward to introducing you to your new home!

description: The house that we present here surprises you with the quality and quantity of details and rooms that make it a unique product. Built in 2005 and expanded and renovated by its previous owners, the house stands out for the light in its rooms, thanks to its large windows and the existing glass panels in different areas. The distribution of the main floor is very harmonious, with communications between the different rooms and the outdoor terrace, highlighting the spacious living room with fireplace and the kitchen with a central island. On the upper floors, we find three bedrooms with their private bathrooms (one of them with a large attic and the main one with a dressing area, private terrace, shower cabin and bathtub). The lower floor deserves special mention where we find everything that makes this house unique. These are carefully decorated and equipped spaces such as the bar, the wine cellar, the gym with sauna and shower and the jewel in the crown: a cinema room equipped with the latest technology. The house is completed with different storage spaces, a study for guests or service and a large garage with space for two large cars and motorcycles. If the interior is spectacular, the outdoor areas are not far behind, with a wonderful porch and a large summer terrace facing south and direct access from the living room and dining room where you can enjoy a barbecue with family and/or friends and spectacular views of the sea. At the back it has a small private garden from where you can access the common areas that have pleasant walks, a rest area and two swimming pools.

description: Located in the capital of Málaga, this 5-bedroom house has a privilege of being situated within few km from the lively centre of the tourist city of Málaga with all its amazing gastronomic, cultural and shopping offer. An ideal house for year-round living or converting it into a nice boutique hotel with 5 independent apartments.  The tranquillity is breathed by being located in a neighbourhood that is situated outside the historic centre, without losing its connection with the best authentic places and tourist attractions of Málaga which we can reach by car in just 10 minutes. Its strategically perfect location offers the possibility of reaching the train/bus station in 10 minutes, the port of Málaga - 15 minutes and the airport - 20 minutes by car. The property occupies 392 square meters, it is built on a 200 m2 plot, where we can, also, highlight a sunny interior patio. The rooms are designed to provide you peace and plenty of light. The house is distributed in two levels. We enter the first floor where we can find a large living room with a fireplace and a fully equipped kitchen. The first of the 5 bedrooms is located on this first floor. From the same level we have a direct access to the interior patio where you can enjoy the sun and quiet hours of the day. On the upper floor there are 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms - one of them is en-suite, and two open terraces. Large windows, sunny interior patio, spacious terraces and privileged location make this property truly wonderful home. Garage for 5 vehicles + 2 motorcycles and storage room - included in the price of the house. Also, it is worth mentioning the solar panels for hot water; and the photovoltaic panels for electricity consumption, installed in May 2021. Book now a visit to this beautiful property. Will it be the house you are searching for? JG1.

description: Charming independent house on a plot of 2489 m2 with open views to the mountains, in the most exclusive area of Alhaurín de la Torre: Pinos de Alhaurín. With 3 bedrooms, 1 large additional bedroom with living room and toilet in the attic, swimming pool, large gardens, tennis court, covered barbecue area, playground and large garage with capacity for several cars. It is located in a privileged area due to its location and the tranquility of its surroundings: A few minutes from the center of Alhaurín where you can enjoy all its services and a few kilometers from the Center of Malaga, the Airport and the beaches of the coast. Also close to the Lauro Golf course and the Jarapalo Shooting range. If you want to live in one of the best and most valued areas of the Costa del Sol, surrounded by mountains, where you can breathe peace and tranquility without giving up the comfort of having all kinds of services at your fingertips and being able to enjoy the wonderful quality of life on the Costa del Sol, do not hesitate and come and see this wonderful property. This magnificent house is located on a 2489m2 plot and has a constructed area of 235 meters, a 193m2 tennis court, a 48m2 pool and consists of 2 floors: On the ground floor we find a covered barbecue, a beautiful entrance Porsche, a spacious and bright dining room and a living room open to the terrace where we can enjoy unbeatable views of the plot and its beautiful gardens. In the back we find a large kitchen with an additional dining room, a pantry and a bathroom, with access to the outside to a garden and a small park and/or children's play area. Then, going up the stairs, we find a spacious hall with a built-in wardrobe and access via a folding staircase to the attic of the house converted into a renovated open-plan guest room with a living room and a toilet. On the same floor there is a complete bathroom, a very spacious single bedroom with its built-in wardrobe, 2 double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and access to a large terrace with wonderful views of the gardens and surroundings. From this floor you can access the pool area and the exterior of the house: a tennis court, a small warehouse house, a plot of land divided into 3 terraces with trees and fruit plants. A complete covered barbecue. Independent house or chalet 2 plants 3 bedrooms +1 bedroom in attic 2 bathrooms 1 toilet. 2,483 m² plot Terrace Balcony Parking space included in the price second hand/good condition Built-in cabinets Storage room. equipment Swimming pool Yard Tennis court covered barbecue KRD.

description: Do you want to live in a new house, in a quiet area of Malaga and have a strategic location, close to everything? We exclusively present this charming house, which is ideally located next to the Camino de los Almendrales, a couple of minutes from Pinos del Limonar and a couple of minutes from the A7 motorway and the center of Malaga. In an area where new high standing urban complexes are being built and where the construction of a shopping center is scheduled. The house, which is South facing, has received a comprehensive reform in 2020 with a modern and simple style and has been decorated with furniture in a warm, neutral style and in tune with the light that floods the house. The house is divided into three floors, on the ground floor we find a large garage with capacity for one vehicle and the possibility of installing shelves for extra storage, as well as two halls, one outside, ideal for leaving packages once the door has been opened to through the mobile app and the interior of the house itself. On the first floor we have the rest area, since it is where the 4 bedrooms and two bathrooms are located, one of them en suite, counting the entire floor with parquet flooring. On the second floor there is the living-dining room, the kitchen and a bathroom with a shower, as well as a large terrace where you can enjoy views of the countryside and sun during most of the day, due to its south orientation. It can be seen that a lot of time and resources have been dedicated to the comprehensive reform of the home, paying attention to detail to obtain a home of high quality and comfort. On this same floor we find an ideal patio to enjoy the tranquility and aromas of nature, enjoy children or rest area for your pet. In addition, there is a closed diaphanous space of about 14m2 that is currently used for storage, but which is a very flexible space since it can be set up as an office or even an apartment since it has electricity and water outlets, and a semi-independent entrance. The house stands out for being in full contact with nature since the north side borders the Montes de Málaga Natural Park, being able to enjoy a few minutes of beautiful places where you can go hiking and outdoor activities and impressive views of the sea. Completely ready to move into since the furniture and appliances are included, which, being so new, are under warranty, be sure to come and see it, it is worth it.

It is distributed as follows: 4 rooms 2 bathrooms Bath service Main bathroom in Suite with Jacuzzi Dressing room in main room Sauna installation Marble floors Underfloor heating throughout the living area. Private pool 413.6m2 of Private Terrace Additional kitchen on the terrace and bar area. Large Open Kitchen Fully Equipped and Furnished. High End Kitchen Appliances Large dining room Spacious living room with TV and reading area Hot/Cold Air Conditioning Alarm system Climalit windows / double glazing. Doors/blinds in all areas Garden and pool views Built-in wardrobes. Large storage rooms on the roof (2) Elevator 6 Parking spaces in Total: 2 covered parking spaces with electric gate 4 Uncovered Parking spaces This property is caracterizad by its sobriety and natural light. It is surrounded by a 413.6m2 terrace that can be accessed from the bedrooms, the living room or the kitchen. Perfect to enjoy the sun all year round due to its multiple orientations. Beautiful night views where you can see the cruise ships on the horizon or the mountains, the stars and the fully illuminated city. In the private area we find the 4 bedrooms and two bathrooms. The main room is very spacious and has a very spacious and comfortable bathroom with double sinks, Jacuzzi, shower, and a pre-installed sauna. It has a large dressing room, fitted wardrobes and natural lighting. The social area is characterized by being a very large open area where we find the living room, the TV area, an adjoining reading area, the dining room and the open kitchen with beautiful design and high-end appliances. Perfect to enjoy great privacy and tranquility. It has a wonderful private pool with great views and great. roof terrace with 2 large storage rooms ideal for storage, ext. Property in excellent condition with 2 covered and closed garage spaces plus 4 carports, marble floors, double glazed windows with shutters, fitted wardrobes, alarm system, hot and cold air conditioning, and underfloor heating throughout the property. Very well-maintained community with beautiful common areas, large pool with gardens, 2 paddle tennis courts, children's area, and barbecue. Total area 640.70m2. A prestigious architecture studio has designed this building comprising 72 2- to 5-bedroom homes, with interior areas ranging from with 132 m2 to 404 m2 and with large terraces offering direct sea views and underground parking spaces. Located in the city of Málaga, next to the beach, the promenade and all amenities. The communal areas include three swimming pools (one heated), spa, gym, children's room and cinema room. The prices do not include VAT. This is, without a doubt, a great opportunity both as an investment and as a permanent or holiday residence that guarantees life quality as its best. description: Villa located in one of the best residential areas of Malaga, both for its safety and comfort and for its proximity to the city center and the beach. The property is distributed over two floors. The ground floor is divided into: entrance hall, courtesy toilet, spacious living-dining room with kitchen that also has a 25-meter warehouse. Also on this same floor is the garden with the pool, pool toilet, gardening room, and a beautiful pergola where you can eat, dine, read. Waterfalls and fountains give a romantic touch to the garden, the entire exterior flooring being made of travertine. The upper floor has five bedrooms, the main one with a dressing room and bathroom en suite. Two of the rooms are separated from the rest so they could be considered a charming apartment ideal for guests. The flooring in the bedrooms is made of natural Jatoba wood. The property is full of precious details, in addition to being built with the best existing materials, such as the leaded glass skylight that is in the stairs that connect the two floors. All windows and exterior doors are all matching and all exterior carpentry is from Iroko. Its beautiful architecture and the quality of the details make it a unique villa: its marble mosaic at the entrance, the limestone on the window and exterior door trims, the sandstone balustrade make this beautiful Villa ideal for who want to live in one of the best areas of Malaga, very close to the sea but without giving up tranquility and security in a unique enclave and environment. The exclusive area of "El Limonar", due to its unbeatable location, its high quality of life and, above all, its proximity to the center of the city of Malaga and its beaches, has been for many decades one of the most desired and demanded areas for reside in the capital of Malaga. To the excellent geographical location and its tranquility we must add the proximity to all the necessary services: shops, restaurants, cafeterias, international schools, highway access, bus stop every 5 minutes. "El Limonar" is characterized by the abundance of landscaped spaces and magnificent vegetation, it is also one of the most emblematic residential areas and with the most history in Malaga since the city's high bourgeoisie settled in it during the 19th century. In short, it is the ideal area for all those people who wish to live near the center and the beach, and who above all seek tranquility and the best quality of life they can imagine.

neighborhood: Finca el Pato - Torre del Río
description: Lucas Fox International Properties is proud to present this exclusive property, very close to the sea in Malaga, the most fashionable city in Europe.  It is a bright apartment with three bedrooms and two bathrooms located in Building del Pato, the district with the highest price per square meter in the city. It is called to become the reference district for its modernity, green spaces and proximity to the beach and all amenities. This apartment is located on the fourth floor of an open U-shaped building, which has seven heights and enjoys a south orientation, which allows it to enjoy partial views of the sea and have light all day.  At the entrance to the right, there is a wardrobe where you can comfortably place your daily clothes. To the front, there is the bright and open-plan living-dining room with the modern and charming kitchen integrated with a central island, which gives it a great feeling of spaciousness. The living room, with corner windows, has access to a splendid terrace also facing south, towards the gardens of the communal areas and the pool.  From the hall and to the right, you access the bedrooms. The main one has a private bathroom, as well as a dressing room. The other two bedrooms, of ample dimensions and which also have a lot of light, share the other bathroom.  In this property, which is only one year old, the best materials have been used for its construction and its perfect orientation to the south makes it warm and bright.  The beach is a 5-minute walk away and to the west, about 30 minutes, is the Guadalhorce Natural Park, a natural enclave in the city. This entire area is suitable for the use of bicycles, with lanes along the beach that reach the eastern area, passing through the historic centre.  This comfortable property has a garage space and two large storage rooms.  Get in touch for more information about this property or to arrange a visit.

All bedrooms, living area, and the kitchen have direct access to a massive terrace with a southwest facing. The terrace is partly covered, and this is the perfect place to enjoy daily outside. This apartment is fitted with marble flooring, integrated air conditioning, fitted wardrobes and most importantly, an abundance of space. Underground garage space is included in the price. On entering the complex, there is a 24-hour security/reception office; beyond this, the complex’s grounds are very well presented, offering a clean and mature garden environment. The location of Golf Resort Torrequebrada is quite advantageous; built on the edge of the golf course, it’s just a few minutes from the famous Torrequebrada Golf Course and its Club House with a restaurant with marvellous golf views. Around 1.5 km from Sunset Beach, hence a very short drive from amenities and a lovely beach or about 10 minutes walk for most.

description: COMFORTABLE, COSY AND BRIGHT FLAT, FULLY FURNISHED WITH TERRACE AND UNOBSTRUCTED SEA VIEWS A FEW METRES FROM THE BEACH, LOCATED IN LIMONAR BAJO, MALAGA. Fortuny Hogares Únicos offers for sale this comfortable, cosy and bright one bedroom flat, fully furnished and with unobstructed sea views. It is located in the prestigious residential area of Limonar Bajo in Málaga, with all services nearby, close to prestigious international schools, kindergartens, health centres, pharmacies, supermarkets, shops and public transport stops. The location of the property is unbeatable, within walking distance of the Pablo Ruiz Picasso promenade, La Caleta beach and a wide range of leisure options and restaurants serving Mediterranean cuisine. The historic centre of the city is a 10-minute drive away, where you can enjoy the city's wide range of cultural and leisure activities. The south-facing flat has a built-up area of 70m2 and is divided into an entrance hall, a spacious and bright living-dining room with access to a comfortable terrace with automatic awning and unobstructed sea views, a kitchen with island, fully furnished and equipped with electrical appliances, a bedroom with large fitted wardrobes, a complete outdoor bathroom serving all rooms. The property has very good qualities. Among them, we highlight air conditioning hot/cold, heating with an electric boiler, and an automatic awning on the terrace.  The communal areas are equipped with a children's playground for the enjoyment of the little ones.  The building has a concierge and lift and is adapted for people with reduced mobility.  The flat has a parking space and a storage room included in the price. This property is the perfect opportunity for those who love to enjoy a quiet and cosy place in a residential area with all the amenities. Energy Certificates are in process. In compliance with the RD of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of 11 October, we inform consumers that the price indicated does not include the costs derived from the purchase of the property according to the laws in force (ITP, notary fees and in the case of new construction the VAT tax). For more information, do not hesitate to contact us. We will be pleased to help you.

description: If you are looking for a house to relax, with privacy and panoramic views, this is undoubtedly the house you were waiting for. Exclusive area for a few neighbors, to access is only possible through a private road with automatic gate, this gives you the peace of mind and security that the house will be protected either your main home or as a second residence. The plot of 2500m2, which could have up to 3 different entrances, has impressive panoramic views from the Sierra de Mijas to the port of Malaga and even the sea. The house itself is a comfortable single-storey house of 86m2 with covered porch with views, living room with fireplace and air conditioning, kitchen with pantry, two bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and bathroom. Upper terrace. It also has a basement of approx. 30m2 with independent entrance with three rooms with large south-facing windows, which could be used as rooms. Exterior with a very sunny private pool ideal to relax quietly admiring its stunning views, or if you want to eat on the terrace you do not need to enter the house as it has an indoor barbecue to delight the family's gourmet. If you like animals you have several areas enabled for the use of chickens, birds, dogs or any other animal that you may have on a rustic plot. As for parking on the plot itself, it has a large outdoor parking area, if you want to have the car protected, it also has a private covered garage of approximately 50m2 with independent entrance. Well maintained plot with aromatic flowers and different palm trees next to the pool, the rest of the plot with fruit trees and avocados in production. Community water 20 minutes from the beach and 5 minutes by car from the center of alhaurin de la torre.
