description: If those words are important to you: design, luxury, quality, incredible views, 500m from the beach and 300m from a golf club, this is your future home!  Lucas Fox EXCLUSIVELY presents this beautiful design house, in a recently built development with well-kept communal areas, and various amenities. The house, semi-detached, offers three bedrooms, two bathrooms and a toilet, all with the best qualities and a layout over three floors plus the semi- lower ground floor. The property has large spaces, with a surface area of 205 m², an 18 m² terrace, a 50 m² solarium and a 16 m² private garden.  We enter through the gate, we discover a small private garden, ideal to have your dog house for example. We enter the property and directly to the right we have the beautiful fully equipped kitchen, to the left we have a courtesy bathroom, and then we have the spacious living / dining room bathed in light, with its wonderful covered terrace.  We go up the fabulous design stairs and access the first floor that houses the night area. We have the master suite that has a dressing room, with a built-in wardrobe, a large shower room and a balcony with sea views. We continue on that same floor, and we have two bedrooms, both of them have built-in built-in wardrobes, and one of them enjoys a balcony with mountain views. A bathroom completes that floor.  Finally, the upper floor offers a solarium with panoramic views of the sea, with an area of 50 m², where you can enjoy your celebrations with friends or family, all year round!  The semi- lower ground floor has a private garage with capacity for two cars and a storage room with private access to the property.  The communal areas are wonderful, they were designed by a landscape gardening company, it is very pleasant and relaxing. It also has a large designer infinity pool and a children's pool below. A gym and a park area complete the communal areas.

description: A charming house on a plot of 744 m² with a built surface area of 484 m² in El Limonar. It is arranged as follows:  The main entrance of the property is from the street. On the right hand side, we find the garage, which currently has space for two large cars. Next to this, we have a storage room that is the same size as the garage, meaning it is possible to obtain more space to accommodate more vehicles. Climbing a few steps we reach the peaceful, pleasant garden area.  We enter the house via a hall on the first floor. On the left there is a toilet cleverly built into the stairwell, the bright living-dining room with access to the garden and a bedroom. Returning through the hall, we see a room currently used as a dining room. Next to it is the kitchen, with a rectangular floor plan and plenty of storage space. From this room, we can go out to an ideal terrace for entertaining and gatherings, since it benefits from a barbecue area.  Some stairs take us to the second floor, which houses most of the bathrooms and bedrooms. To the right is a bedroom, which is currently being used as an office, with access to a terrace with incredible views of the Limonar Alto. Next to this office, there are two double bedrooms, with a built-in wardrobe and plenty of natural light, as well as a bathroom with a bathtub.  Next, the spacious master bedroom is presented, with an ensuite bathroom, dressing room and access to a terrace with beautiful views of the sea.  On this floor we find the door that leads to the rear of the house. Here, stairs lead to the porch by the pool and an art workshop, which could be used as an office or as a guest apartment. In addition, this area benefits from a complete bathroom with a shower and a storage space.  Please contact us to discover this house with tranquility, space, abundant natural light and sea views.  .

description: This apartment is located in one of the most emblematic baroque buildings of the late seventeenth century in Malaga, located in the epicenter of this historic city. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a part of a historical building, generally reserved for public institutions.  Upon entering the large entrance and reception area of the building, we find the majestic central courtyard with its large columns and its impressive height. The property can be accessed on the second floor by the wood-panelled lift or by the wide, palatial-style stairs. The historical nature of this building is felt through the imposing architecture and the attention to detail.  The entrance door of the home, which is a piece worthy of a museum, opens to reveal a hall with views of the ivy-covered interior courtyard, as well as the main entrance to the large living room. The living room stands out for its large size, with a fireplace and large windows with exterior views. It has two large entrances with double doors to access from the corridor, as well as a dining room attached to the back.  Following the corridor with windows towards the interior patio with its mature vegetation, we reach the access staircase to the upper floor, as well as a spacious kitchen and the living room. The kitchen has a service door with its independent stairs accessible from the outside. Next to the living room, we have the master bedroom with its large private bathroom.  After the access stairs to the upper floor, we come to a hall with large double doors that offer us incredible views and direct access to a huge terrace. In this hall, there are two additional bedrooms, one of them with a private bathroom.  Contact us for more information about this incredible home in Malaga.

description: DESCRIPTION OF THE PROPERTY This is an elegant and bright property in one of the best residential areas of Malaga. It is a large flat in a private residential complex, in the heart of the Pedregalejo neighbourhood. It is the perfect option to enjoy a quiet, privileged environment, with wonderful open views and surrounded by greenery. The property is located on the top floor of the building. There are only two flats per floor. All bedrooms face outwards to the south and south-west. It has an excellent terrace with space for different atmospheres where you can enjoy the fantastic climate of Malaga. We are welcomed by a spacious entrance hall, where we have a wardrobe. The cosy main living room has a fireplace and a large dining room, which also has a comfortable and bright office. Next to the living room is the master bedroom, with a large en-suite bathroom. Both, the living room and the master bedroom lead to the terrace of the property. The hallway then leads to three further bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, two of which have access to a separate north-facing terrace, and two full bathrooms. Finally, the cosy kitchen, has a laundry room and a convenient pantry. DESCRIPTION OF THE LOCATION Pedregalejo is one of the most exclusive areas of the city with a long tradition, renowned for its architecture (beautiful villas, former fishermen cottages etc). The atmospheric promenade has a great range of both long established and modern bars and restaurants. Thus, it is easy to understand why Pedregalejo continues to be one of the most sought-after locations in Málaga. It is within the catchment area of the best bilingual and international schools, consulates, sports clubs (sailing, tennis, a golf course, swimming pools…) supermarkets etc. It is located within walking distance of the city centre, the historic old town and the newly refurbished Muelle Uno from which you will be able to see the sunset while enjoying refreshing drinks or while reading. Furthermore, if you wish to continue discovering the “Costa del Sol” there is an easy access to the motorway “Autovía del Mediterráneo”.

description: One of the most emblematic Baroque buildings from the late seventeenth century in Malaga, located in the epicentre of this historic city. This is a unique opportunity to own part of a historic building, usually reserved for a public institution.  After entering the enormous entrance and reception area, we find the majestic central patio with its large columns and impressive height, you can access the property on the second floor with a wood panelled lift or using the palatial size stairs.  The incredible detail and imposing architecture, that is characteristic throughout this property, transports us back in time.  The front door of the property, which is a piece worthy of a place in a museum, opens up to reveal an entrance hall with views of the ivy-covered inner patio and the main entrance to the large living room.  The living room, with one of the two fireplace in the property, is characterized by its large scale and large windows framing the tremendous view of the cathedral and park, it is separated in three sections buy large ornate double doors allowing for separate spaces such as living room, dining room, parlour, etc. One of the bathrooms adjacent to the living room is characterized by a large circular stained-glass window, a constant reminder of the building it is found in.  From the entrance hall we can access the large corridor that culminates at the service area of the property with the large kitchen and service quarters, passing buy the large bedrooms with ornate carved wood built-in closets, one with an en-suite bathroom and another with the second fireplace of the property.  From the Kitchen, we have a spiral staircase that provides access to the terrace.  Please contact us for further information about this incredible home in Malaga.

description: This property is located in an extraordinary location, next to the enormous vertical garden that characterizes this square, surrounded by narrow streets and with little tourist traffic. Thus, the location enjoys silence and tranquility, but with everything you need nearby.  After the large entrance door, we have a lobby with access to an courtyard and three bedrooms, each with its own private bathroom. The property has access stairs to all its floors, with a large internal hole, designed to be able to install an lift in the future, if desired.  On the first floor we have a spacious living room with a fireplace and three large windows with balconies that overlook the square, a large dining room for eight people and a wonderful fully equipped American-style kitchen, with a forklift to facilitate transport to the terrace.  On the second floor we have the master suite that faces the outside, with its large private bathroom and its own dressing room.  In the internal part with large windows to the patio we have another two bedrooms, used as an office and storage room.  Next, on the third floor, we have the roof, with a large terrace, with incredible views and distributed in two areas, one ideal for eating outdoors, with access from the forklift and another to enjoy the weather phenomenon of Malaga.  Get in touch for more information.

description: The villa sits on a private and secluded plot of nearly 29,000 m². It is typically Spanish in style with whitewashed walls, shuttered windows, terracotta frescoes and tiles, and colourful furnishings with soft surfaces.  The large open-plan living room is ideal: The kitchen, with granite countertops and breakfast bar, is fully equipped with all the comforts, the dining room and the living room with its fireplace are ideal to enjoy unforgettable moments with your family or friends.    The four bedrooms are spacious, airy and light, and enjoy the benefits of air conditioning. There are three incredible double bedrooms with super-sized beds and another double bedroom that can be put to other uses, and two modern bathrooms, both with bathtub and shower.  The exterior space of the house is magnificent, with views of incredible natural beauty that surround the Los Nuno estate, with only the sound of the birds, a pure peace. The large pool is located on a large terrace, perfect to enjoy the Malaga climate and its 300 days of sunshine. The adjacent shaded relaxation space is furnished for alfresco dining. In addition, you can celebrate barbecues with family and friends, with the open Spanish-style kitchen, while the beautiful and extensive garden is perfect for children to play and have fun.  In addition, it offers a beautiful interior patio, with Spanish tiles decorating the walls and outdoor seating to relax while keeping cool under the umbrellas, making it a perfect retreat on sunny days and balmy nights.  This house is perfect for a holiday residence or for an investor who wants to find a good return.

description: The living room is situated at the front of the property, while the kitchen is located at the back. The largest part of the property is on the southern exposure section and front of the home, comprising the living rooms, the property's terrace, two large bedrooms, and a large bathroom.  The ample sunlight that floods the living spaces in the southern part of the property is a crucial factor for those who enjoy a bright and airy living space. The south-facing terrace, offering stunning views of the surrounding area. At the back of the property we have another bedroom, bathroom and the kitchen with another smaller terrace.  Simply updating the property will result in a beautiful, sunny property to enjoy in this incredible cosmopolitan Mediterranean city. The property has tremendous potential and is an opportunity for those with some vision and eagerness to make their dream home.  Take advantage of this fantastic opportunity and contact us today to arrange a viewing.

description: Great semi-detached house, located in a quiet street in the exclusive and familiar neighborhood of Cerrado de Calderón, It is property, located in a cozy urbanization closed, it is to be reformed to your liking, it has a garage, bathroom and a large basement, perfect for a gym, game room or office. The first floor has a terrace where you can install a barbecue and enjoy great moments with family and friends. Upon entering the house we find with a spacious entrance with a toilet, a large kitchen and the bright living room with fireplace that leads to a wonderful terrace, which gives easy and direct access to the pool. The Second floor has two bedrooms, a bathroom and the Master bedroom, with fantastic views and an en-suite bathroom. suite room. Finally, on the top floor there is a laundry area and large space that offers many possibilities. Cerrado de Calderón, more commonly known as “El Cerrado”, is located in the eastern area of Malaga, being one of the the most demanded residential areas with a relief mountainous area with abundant vegetation and where, thanks to its orography, a large number of houses have views open to the urbanization, the sea and the bay of Malaga. The properties are, for the most part, individual villas, townhouses and semi-detached houses with swimming pools and lush gardens that convert the homes of Cerrado de Calderón into the perfect location, since the tranquility and the well-being with the proximity to the city center either in car (10 to 15 minutes from their different locations), or thanks to an excellent network of municipal buses. Cerrado de Calderón has two shopping centers The main ones are the "Multicentro", with a supermarket and the shopping center "Next Shopping" located north of the urbanization. In addition, the residential area of Cerrado de Calderón, has the privilege of hosting four of the best schools in Malaga which are: the Cerrado de Calderón, the Lycée Français (or French Lyceum), the school British The British School of Málaga and the school belonging to the Sacred Heart, better known as "Las slaves” Structured around its three main streets (Olmos, Flamencos and Cáceres) and with direct access to the motorway Mediterranean, the urbanization is perfectly communicated with the beach area and the promenade of Malaga, just 15 minutes from the airport.

description: After the discreet entrance, we find a covered garage with capacity for two vehicles and a large terrace, from which we can enjoy the tranquility and the extensive vegetation that characterizes this house.  Next, we see a large hall, with access to two living rooms, one of them next to a terrace with incredible views, a dining room, toilet and a fully equipped kitchen with access from the outside. All rooms are characterized by their views and the feeling of being in the middle of the forest.  On the ground floor we find three bedrooms, all of them with their own en-suite bathroom and two of them with their own dressing room and terrace.  The property is surrounded by a garden, with access from the terrace and at street level on both sides of the house, culminating in a terrace that surrounds the pool.

description: Lucas Fox presents this villa with a large plot with outdoor areas to enjoy the climate of Malaga.  Upon entering the property, there is a garden area with a garage for several cars and a large covered terrace. After crossing the terrace, we find the main entrance, with a large lobby, giving access to the main spaces of the property. Towards the north, we have a spacious living room, which stands out for its huge glass door that leads access to the beautiful garden and a large central fireplace. Next, we have a spacious adjoining dining room, which leads, after crossing a short corridor and the guest toilet, to the huge, fully equipped kitchen. The kitchen benefits from generous dimensions and has a huge central table for lunch and breakfast. The kitchen has a large attached laundry area and storage room and offers direct access to another informal living room, which is attached to the large main terrace of the property.  From the spacious lobby, we can directly access the southern area, where we have the night area. It offers a large master suite with two dressing rooms and a large private bathroom. Next we have three bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and a spacious bathroom.  The spacious main terrace of the property surrounds the pool and is access from the entrance lobby or the informal living room next to the kitchen. It is equipped with an outdoor kitchen/bar, toilet, a covered living room phenomenon and an outdoor dining room.  The informal living room leads to the upper floor via the only stairs in the property, which houses a separate guest bedroom with its built-in wardrobe, private bathroom and its own terrace.  Get in touch for more information.

description: This property is well located as it offers the chance to explore the surrounding area, enjoy a round of golf at the nearby golf course, a tennis match or some laps at the sports club, or relax by the marina, as well as being just a few metres from the beach. Whether you are looking for a relaxing holiday getaway or an opportunity to entertain family and friends in style, this magnificent villa will exceed all your expectations.  We enter the property via a large front terrace, ideal for enjoying the morning sun. The main entrance is equipped with a spacious lobby, which separates the large living room from the fully equipped kitchen.  The living room features a lounge area around a fantastic fireplace, a dining room with wall-to-wall windows and direct access to a fabulous terrace with stunning views. The modern kitchen, with its large corner windows, has a spacious dining area, perfect for family brunch.  One floor below, we have the main living quarters, with the master bedroom on the east corner of the building, with two large windows and a balcony overlooking the gardens, built-in wardrobes and a large ensuite bathroom.  On the west side of the house, we have three additional bedrooms, all large, overlooking the gardens, with built-in wardrobes, accessed via a long corridor with floor-to-ceiling storage and a large bathroom.  In addition, there is a large room, that can be used as a gym, play room, bedroom or storage area. From this area we have access to an additional terrace, the machine room and the large garage.  At the pool level of the house, we have a separate apartment, which can be accessed from the house, with a large living room and dining room, open kitchen, in addition to two bedrooms and a large bathroom. The building also has its own cellar, perfect for those keeping a wine collection.  In the garden area surrounding the pool, we have a covered terrace section equipped with an outdoor kitchen and barbecue, large bar and dining area, as well as a large two-storey wooden cabin, equipped with a bathroom and sauna on the ground level and a fabulous large jacuzzi room on the top.  Do not hesitate con contact us for more information or to arrange a viewing.

description: Lucas Fox is pleased to present this wonderful and exclusive apartment for sale, just a step away from the beach, the beach bars and the famous Baños del Carmen spa. This apartment has been fully renovated just three years ago and has been perfectly cared for ever since.  Upon entering the house, we can already appreciate the breadth of its corridors and rooms. To our left, there is the living-dining room with impressive views of the beautiful bay of Malaga. The living-dining room offers us enough space to rest after a long day or to enjoy meals and moments with our family and friends. From here, we can access the imposing terrace of almost 80 square meters.  Taking advantage of this space, a fully equipped room has been built to be able to work, read or simply sit and enjoy the views. This terrace also offers us the possibility of having meals outdoors or even enjoying celebrations with family and friends, while contemplating the incomparable views. Without a doubt, the views and the terrace are a jewel, but the interior of this home is not far behind either. Back inside, we have a completely new kitchen with the best brands on the market. Previously there would have been a service bedroom, but that was integrated into the kitchen, to have an office area, perfect as a dining room for day to day.  Following the comfortable corridor, we arrive at the night area. First, we will find the master bedroom, which transports us to a cruise-type suite in the Mediterranean. This has a private bathroom and fitted wardrobes. Next, we will see a double bedroom with great views of the mountain and a perfect orientation to sleep peacefully. This also has fitted wardrobes. The last bedroom in question is slightly smaller than the adjoining bedroom, but it certainly offers enough space to fit a bed and even a desk, without giving up mountain views and again with fitted wardrobes.  The apartment is located in one of the best areas of the city, although it is a difficult parking area. For this reason, the estate offers an impressive parking lot of almost 50 m², just below this house. We certainly have room for a large family car, bicycles and garage utensils, although it could fit two smaller cars.  The common areas are not far behind either, since an external elevator has been installed that takes us directly to the access portal, less than a year ago.  Don't think twice and visit this impressive apartment with Lucas Fox Málaga.

description: Lucas Fox is pleased to present you with a fantastic home designed with an unmistakable style and completely ready to move into. A spacious house with plenty of space to live comfortably, as well as bright and with sea views. Located in a dead end street, it is an ideal house to enjoy the most complete tranquility in one of the most prestigious urbanizations of Malaga that also has private security. This house has an entrance from two completely independent streets.  On the ground floor, there is the spacious living-dining room full of natural light. It has a fireplace and access to the porch and pool. In addition, we find a guest bedroom, a complete bathroom and a modern and fully equipped kitchen.  On the first floor, there are two bedrooms that share a bathroom and the wonderful master bedroom with two bathrooms and two dressing rooms.  On the second floor, there are two other bedrooms that, due to their size, can be used for various uses, such as a study, library or gym.  Outside, we find a swimming pool, a complete bathroom and a barbecue area.  The house has a sophisticated home automation system, electric shutters with adjustable slats, underfloor heating on the ground floor and an independent hot/cold air conditioning system.  Completely integrated into the landscape of pine trees and rocks, this house is a true luxury and a great opportunity to acquire a modern, comfortable and distinctive home.

neighborhood: Finca el Pato - Torre del Río
description: Engel&Völkers is proud to present a modern luxury home. It is a large space that allows maximizing the entrance of natural light, with an attractive design and a perfect layout thought to provide maximum comfort.  This beautiful home is the most exclusive ground floor apartment of “Residencial Halia” and it has a south-east 152m2 L-shaped terrace with fabulous unobstructed views. The terrace has a glazing system that allows you to enjoy it during the winter and artificial turf that brings coolness if you wish to take advantage of its wonderful outdoors terrace. There is an open-plan kitchen, three bedrooms (all of them lead to the private terrace), three bathrooms (one of them is an en suite one) and a dressing room. Fine materials and cutting-edge technology are used throughout. Another aspect to be taken into account is its easy access to the two large parking spaces and storeroom. This fantastic property leads to all the common areas of “Residencial Halia” (gardens, swimming pools, gym and play area for kids) from its private terrace. Last but not least, this property is just a step away from the sea. Halia is everything you have dreamt of to create your home.    The area Torre del Río is located just next to the prestigious Málaga Towers, one block from the beach. It is currently the most-sought after luxury area in Málaga as it is perfectly connected with the city centre, Málaga port (and its leisure area) international airport, indoor sporting arena “Martín Carpena” and a lot of spaces to enjoy Málaga mild weather. Furthermore, it is just a step away from the promenade “Paseo Marítimo Antonio Banderas”, named after Malaga native and Hollywood star Antonio Banderas. Residencial Halia, thanks to its impeccable architecture, perfectly combine with the smokestacks that bear witness to Malaga’s industrial heritage. This project marks the beginning of a new stage for the city that looks forward to become an international reference for the residential tourism. This part of the coast could well become the new Golden Mile of the Costa del Sol.

description: COMFORTABLE AND BRIGHT BRAND-NEW FULLY FURNISHED APARTMENT, WITH A LARGE TERRACE AND STORAGE ROOM, LOCATED JUST A FEW MINUTES FROM THE BEACH IN TORREMOLINOS.  Fortuny Hogares Únicos offers for sale this spacious, comfortable and bright brand-new flat, located just 700 metres from the beach and 900 metres from the centre of Torremolinos, close to all amenities: shops, supermarkets, restaurants, and cafes. At 10 minutes walking distance to the beaches of Bajondillo and Playamar. The property is well connected with public transport stops and the N-340 road to reach the capital of the Costa del Sol.  The flat is located on the first floor (same floor as the access to the building), with a northeast orientation, consists of 68m2 built including the communal areas, 55m2 useful, a large terrace 44m2 and is distributed in an entrance, a bright living-dining room with access to the terrace; an independent kitchen fully furnished and equipped with appliances with access to the terrace; two bedrooms and a bathroom with a bathtub that serves all the rooms.  The property is brand new and has excellent qualities. Among them, we highlight the security access door, porcelain floors, pre-installation of air conditioning hot/cold and double-glazed windows.  The property has parking for a bicycle and a motorbike and a storage room of 10m2 included in the price.  Beautiful property of recent construction, close to the centre of Torremolinos and with all services at hand. A perfect proposal for a quiet life with all the necessary services for daily life and an excellent purchase option as an investment.  The information provided is for guidance only, is not binding and has no contractual value. This information may have undergone modifications that have not yet been incorporated.  Energy Certificates are in process. In compliance with the RD of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of 11 October, we inform consumers that the price indicated does not include the costs derived from the purchase of the property according to the laws in force (ITP, notary fees and in the case of new construction the VAT tax). For further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We will be pleased to help you.

description: Lucas Fox is pleased to offer you this beautiful Andalusian-style villa in the lower part of the prestigious development of Pinares de San Antón. This spacious house, which has all the comforts, has spacious areas, both garden and swimming pool, as well as a parking area for 6 vehicles, to which is added a charming 1-bedroom, 50 M² apartment with direct access to the ideal street to receive visits.  Its facade is white and thick in texture, like traditional Andalusian houses, and is combined inside with arched supports. Its gabled roof is made of tiles that look antique, and the windows have black bars.  On the ground floor of the main body of the house there is a landing and to the left, there are 3 bedrooms with a bathroom. Towards the front, the kitchen, which leads to the laundry and ironing rooms and a spacious back porch that overlooks the parking areas.  From the hall, to the right, is the living room on two levels, which has access to another porch facing south and overlooking the garden. Next to the dining room, a cast iron spiral staircase leads to a study with file, complete bathroom, terrace and sea views. A door from the dining room leads to the winter living room, facing west and the staircase that leads up to the spacious, bright master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom.  At the pool, there is a chill out area and a bar for drinks, as well as a bathroom and a kennel. The garden is divided into flowerbeds that alternate between flowers and stones and has mature trees.  In the back garden, there is a closed parking with shutter, for the most luxurious vehicle of the family and a games room with billiards.

description: In the best area of Ciudad Jardín, next to the prestigious El Limonar neighborhood, is this huge and beautiful duplex penthouse with 360 views of the mountains from its large roof terrace.  With more than 200m2 we find as soon as we enter a large kitchen equipped with the best qualities and appliances, in addition to a terrace that they reformed and covered to create a beautiful dining room and having much more space has also put a large laundry room and a pantry almost as big as the dining room.  This beautiful apartment has 3 bedrooms and two bathrooms, one en suite in the main room, all with lots of light as they open onto the terrace on the first floor.  The living room is divided into two, an interior room and an exterior room leading to the large terrace that runs along the entire corner of the floor with unbeatable views and a beautiful barbecue to enjoy with the family.  Going up some comfortable stairs we find the jewel of the penthouse, a large roof terrace with space to create another room with a bathroom and a magnificent plot with 360 views of the mountain.  You can also see the beautiful community pools and well-kept gardens. Two large parking spaces and a storage room are included in the price.  Now you can live in the house of your dreams, visit it and fall in love.

description: Spacious Townhouse in one of the best urbanizations of Añoreta, in Colinas del Golf. It is located in a very quiet residential area... An ideal place to live! It consists of 4 heights. On the ground floor, with a parking space at the door, we have a large kitchen, a complete bathroom with a shower and a beautiful and cozy separate living room, with a fireplace and access to a small terrace. Its first floor has three double bedrooms, fitted wardrobes and two bathrooms, one of them en suite in the main room, which also has a dressing room and terrace. On the top floor we have an attic room, ideal for the little ones, or an additional room, always necessary... And to enjoy even more outdoors... a solarium, with great views of the sea. And if you still need more space at home... Your basement has another room, which you can use as a bedroom, office, or multipurpose room... a complete bathroom, a laundry room, a large covered terrace, where you will enjoy pleasant evenings and fantastic family and friends gatherings, and a garden area. It is a house that will allow you to live with all the comforts and in a great family atmosphere, in an enclosed area, large garden areas, 4 swimming pools, a children's and sports area. It is very well connected, with easy access to the highway, very close to the private Bilingual Novaschool Añoreta school and other public and subsidized schools in the area, near the Añoreta Golf Course and paddle tennis courts... All services will be at your fingertips! Come see her... you will fall in love! In compliance with R. description: Lucas Fox is pleased to present this high standing property, a truly exquisite villa, with fine finishes, elegant and with an absolutely unusual light.  This villa, located in the Miraflores neighbourhood, benefits from a great constructive quality and good taste, capable of satisfying the most demanding, those who seek to enjoy life in Andalusia in an exceptional property, with high ceilings, stairs and wide corridors, stained glass windows, rustic marble floors and truly luxurious finishes.  The property is accessed from any of the three large lower garage spaces or from the upper parking space, which leads directly to the kitchen and the elegant backyard. To access on foot from the street, some elegant wide stone stairs, representative of the elegance of the property, lead us inside. Once inside, the spacious and elegant entrance hall enjoys abundant natural light, a true prelude to the rest of the property. From the entrance hall, the stained glass windows of the elegant circular stairs that sinuously ascend to the night area can be appreciated. To the right, there is the spacious L-shaped living room with access through wide passageways to the large terrace with sea views. This living room is adjacent to a charming family-friendly room that has a beautiful stone fireplace and south-facing, ideal for winter evenings.  To the left, there is a complete courtesy bathroom next to the incredible new kitchen, fully equipped and with an island and a huge window that faces south, towards the garden area, and that floods it completely with light. From the kitchen, with part of the integrated laundry area, there is access to the elegant rear patio that overlooks the upper parking lot and the garden, as well as the rest of the laundry area.  Going up the elegant stairs, we find ourselves on the right with the master suite, which has a dressing room and private bathroom, as well as a fantastic south-facing terrace with sea views. On this floor, there are three more bedrooms available, one of them with a large terrace with sea views. These three bedrooms share an excellent full bathroom and there is also another room, slightly smaller, that can be used as a bedroom or as an office.  Going down the stairs from the entrance hall, we find a huge semi-basement with fantastic dimensions, since it occupies the same space as the upper floors. It is an open space in which the bar counter and the wine rack- wine cellar stand out, which make it suitable for events with up to 30 people. On this floor there is also a complete bathroom, the technical pump room, a huge guest bedroom and a large room to use as a storage room or winter/summer change of clothes wardrobe. And next to it, there is a large garage with capacity for three large vehicles.  This property is a real opportunity: an unbeatable property for its size, its design and for the radiant light that can be seen in each and every one of its rooms.

description: This stunning 3-floor house is located in the popular neighborhood of Gibralfaro in Malaga, offering breathtaking views of the city and the Mediterranean Sea! With 5 spacious bedrooms 4 modern bathrooms and a guest toilet. The house features a beautifully designed living area on the first floor, complete with comfortable seating, large windows that let in plenty of natural light, and access to a lovely terrace.  One of the highlights of this property is the stunning swimming pool, which can be heated, and garden area at the bottom, perfect for lounging in the sun and enjoying the stunning views of the city and the sea. Whether you're looking for a place to relax or entertain guests, this space is sure to impress. The entire house was done after the extensive renovation in 2019. The kitchen is fully equipped with state-of-the-art appliances and plenty of storage space, making it perfect for those who love to cook. There is also a dining area adjacent to the living room, making it easy to entertain guests or enjoy family meals. The bottom floor of the house is where you find the bedrooms. Main suite with a luxurious bathroom and a walk-in wardrobe. All of the bedrooms feature comfortable beds and plenty of storage space, ensuring that everyone can relax and feel at home during their stay.

description: We are pleased to present this magnificent villa with a 400 m² plot and a private pool. The house has five bedrooms and five bathrooms. The master bedroom is en-suite and has a dressing room. It has a large 57 m² living-dining room with a fireplace. The kitchen is fully furnished and has an office and access to the large garden that has a private pool, barbecue area and pergola. In the basement there is a gym and a garage for two cars. On the attic floor there is a spacious 44 m² study-office and a solarium terrace with sea views. The house also has central air conditioning. Its orientation is north so it allows you to enjoy the beautiful garden all year round and its location is excellent, with easy access to the highway, a few minutes walk from the beach, supermarkets, restaurants, schools and hospitals around. The property is in perfect condition and is ready to move into. It is a great opportunity to live in one of the best areas of Malaga in a very comfortable, spacious house with a lot of privacy.

description: Engel&Völkers is proud to present a unique oportunity for invest in a brand new flat and apartament with high quality materials used throughout and an unbeatable location as it is right next to the beach. The flat has an open plan kitchen, 2 bedrooms, an en suite bathroom and a toilet. The apartament has an open area with kitchen, and a independent bathroom. All rooms face out and they allow maximizing the entrance of natural light. Pedregalejo is one of the most exclusive areas of the city with a long tradition, renowned for its architecture (beautiful villas, former fishermen cottages etc). The atmospheric promenade has a great range of both long established and modern bars and restaurants. Thus, it is easy to understand why Pedregalejo continues to be one of the most sought-after locations in Málaga. It is within the catchment area of the best bilingual and international schools, consulates, sports clubs (sailing, tennis, a golf course, swimming pools…) supermarkets, etc. It is located within walking distance of the city centre, the historic old town and the newly refurbished Muelle Uno from which you will be able to see the sunset while enjoying refreshing drinks or while reading. Furthermore, if you wish to continue discovering the “Costa del Sol” there is an easy access to the motorway “Autovía del Mediterráneo”.

description: Beautiful and magnificent semi-detached house in the area of "El Cañuelo", Chilches, where you can enjoy the space it offers with unbeatable views. It is located within a well-kept urbanization, ideal for individuals or families seeking tranquility close to all kinds of services. With access to the highway a few minutes away, approximately 25 minutes from the center of Malaga and 3 minutes from the beach. The house is distributed over three floors: On the main floor, we find an entrance porch, a charming toilet, a large dining area, a spacious and beautiful kitchen with access to an interior patio for laundry and a bright and spacious living room with a fireplace where, from it, We access a magnificent terrace with impressive views of the sea. On the upper floor, we find an impeccable main room with a built-in wardrobe, a charming en-suite bathroom and a terrace where you can continue enjoying the views, as well as two more beautiful bedrooms and another large bathroom. On its lowest floor, we find the large garage with capacity for 3 vehicles. It also has two extra spaces to park. Comment that the house has additional land where you can make a private pool or use it as a garden area. It enjoys fantastic light and is in perfect condition to move into. Do not hesitate to visit it and be surprised! The hall leads to the living-dining room with large arched windows towards the Alcazaba. There are three large bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, two bathrooms with shower and a fully equipped kitchen overlooking the Cathedral.  The property has an excellent distribution and with a reform you can create a prestigious and exclusive home.  The flooring of the living room and bedrooms is parquet, kitchen and bathrooms have tiled flooring. The Antique doors are made of solid wood. The house has natural gas. It is currently in operation as a tourist rental apartment. It has a tourist rental license.

description: Welcome to this spectacular duplex penthouse located on Benalmádena beach! This home is close to all amenities, steps from a boardwalk as well as shops, restaurants. The southern orientation ensures wonderful natural light and views, while the well-maintained property has a lush garden with two pools - one for children! With easy access to Torremolinos and Fuengirola, less than 20 minutes from Málaga airport and half an hour from Marbella - this is an excellent place for year-round living or for investors. In addition, renovations are planned on the promenade which will have an amazing transformational effect! Don't miss this incredible opportunity - call SkandiaMäklarna today for more information!

description: Charming 2-bedroom duplex townhouse in Arroyo del Miel! This lovely home is located in a pleasant urbanization between Arroyo de la Miel and Benalmádena, walking distance to supermarkets, bus stop, schools and hospital. The property has its own access through a back patio with a storage room. On the entrance level you come to a bright living room with dinning area, fireplace and a fully equipped kitchen opened to the lounge with an arch. Here you also have a guest bathroom. Ahead a cozy and sunny front patio with direct access to the common areas of the complex, which include lovely well-maintained gardens, two swimming pools, adults and children, all bathed with all year-round sun and views to the mountains. A staircase takes you to the top floor where you find 2 doble bedrooms both with fitted wardrobes, and one with a private terrace with views to the pool and garden area. With golf courses very close, highway that takes to the Málaga airport in 12 minutes and the beach only 8 minutes, this is a great opportunity to have a permanent relaxed home, a great investment or a perfect holiday.

description: Your duplex penthouse with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms 80 m to Torremolinos beach! This lovely and bright apartment is located only a few steps from the Bajondillo Beach, in Torremolinos. Just around the corner you can enjoy the many beach restaurants, swim in the Mediterranean sea or relax in a yoga class on the sand watching the sunrise. It is also surrounded by all the services and amenities you could need. As you enter the building through a pedestrian street, the lift takes you to this corner duplex and you enter to a sunny large living room with a completely renovated opened kitchen fully fitted. To the right of the entrance, you also have an extra wardrobe. Ahead, one of the three terraces this magnificent property has, a south east covered terrace of approximately 10 m2 with some sea view. Further to the left, you have two newly renovated bathrooms both with shower and two double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, one with direct access to the terrace. A staircase takes you to the top floor where you have the jewel of this apartment: a third room which is used as a dining/reunion area with a 6 m2 north facing terrace and a magnificent solarium of 74 m2 where you can surely enjoy all day sun, sea view and have fantastic family and friends’ moments all year round. In addition to all these advantages, the property has a large storage room in the solarium, electric blinds, hot and cold centralized aircon and one underground parking space as well as the option to buy a second parking space adjacent to the one included in the price. Due to the excellent location of this duplex, it is a very successful rental investment, a perfect holiday home or a comfortable permanent residence, only 15 minutes away from the Malaga airport.

description: Magnificent plot in Alhaurín de la torre, has two houses and a semi-basement (on three floors) of about 108 m2 per floor meters built each, are totally independent, has barbecue area, swimming pool - pool, has large land of about 2500 meters which has various fruit trees, plus a farmhouse, also with several pens for animals and with capacity to park several 2-3 cars within the plot. The ground floor and the first floor each have three bedrooms, a bathroom, kitchen, fireplace and the semi-basement has one more bedroom and a bathroom. The property has a licence as a rural tourist accommodation. Cozy detached house located in a quiet and bright environment, with views to the mountains of Malaga and only 5 minutes drive to the centre of Alhaurín de la Torre and easy access to the motorway, Malaga International Airport (only 5 minutes drive).

description: Charming traditional townhouse located in one of the oldest street in Malaga's historic center. Townhouse with four floors and a separate self contained ground floor studio apartment for guests, complete with kitchen, bathroom and private entrance. On the first floor we find the living room and main kitchen. Continuing up to the second floor, master bedroom with bathroom. Third floor there are two further bedrooms and an additional kitchen for convenience when hosting dinner parties on the spacious roof terrace.  This home has a a colorful design with influences from all corners of the world and decorative items collected by the owners on their travels. The house is called La Casa de las Campanillas, meaning House of the little Bells, and this is represented by different types of bells decorating each room. The location really is ideal with everything the old town can offer within only a few minutes walking distance. Restaurants, shops and food markets. The roof terrace offers all day sun.

It is distributed on one level and offers modern and bright open-plan living/dining room with designer kitchen and top of the range appliances, two huge terraces with possibility for both dinning and chill out areas with lovely views to the square, 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom.

It is a fantastic 95m2 house with a duplex apartment that is distributed in an entrance porch, hall, independent kitchen, complete bathroom and a spacious living room that leads to a southwest-facing terrace with beautiful views of the sea. On the upper floor there are three double bedrooms with wardrobes, outdoor terraces with views and a complete bathroom. The house has a 12m2 storage room and a 30m2 garage space included in the price. This beautiful urbanization is in a privileged situation because it is on the beachfront, it is all exterior with sea views and has direct access to the beach, beautiful gardens and at the same time it is very well connected with access to the highway, schools and supermarket. of the zoneThere are no real estate brokerage fees in addition to the sale price. description: This beautiful and bright apartment is located in Plaza Arriola in the historic centre of Malaga. The living/dining room and the fully equipped kitchen face towards the West with wonderful views to the Guadalmedina river and Santo Domingo. The master bedroom opens onto a patio and ensures absolute tranquility. The flat has a spacious bathroom with a shower and equipment of first quality. The property, which was completely refurbished, is located on the fourth floor of a five storey building. There is a communal terrace with fantastic views over the historic centre of Malaga. The well-managed property is located in Plaza Arriola near the old central market of Atarazanas and Plaza Felix Saenz, with a fantastic atmosphere, an exceptional location with cafes, delicatessen shops and taverns.

description: The penthouse of the Marqués 13 project consisting of four exclusive apartments in the heart of Malaga, in one of the most well-liked areas of the historic center offers light and all amenities for life in the city centre.  Designed by a prestigious architecture studio and built by a leading construction company in the sector, Marqués 13 has been devolopped to fully enjoy the style and quality of life that Malaga offers. Its new exterior façade coexists in perfect harmony with the surrounding buildings and its carefully designed interior patios bring a great luminosity to the apartments, thanks to its generous sizes.  Premium quality materials that guarantee the greatest possible confort combining the latest trends in interior design with classic Malaga decorative elements, have been selected and the result are unique and stunning apartments. The project consists of four apartments (one per floor), all of them with two bedrooms with private bathrooms. The penthouse has one bedroom and two terraces where you can feel the exceptional climate that Malaga offers throughout the year. Together with the 3rd floor apartment it could form a unique residence in Málaga.  Among its materials it is worth mentioning the oak and cedar wood that has been used for the doors and window blinds, the high-quality marble and porcelain floors, the aluminum carpentry with safety glass and its high grade of acoustic and thermal insulation.  As for the equipment, the flats have underfloor heating, aerothermal system, video intercom, indirect lighting and fully equipped bathrooms and kitchens of leading brands such as Porcelanosa, Bosch, Samsung, Cortizo or Tiemme.

suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Plaza Enrique García-Herrera

description: Spectacular duplex penthouse on the beachfront in Guadalmar, one of the best areas of Malaga, ideal for both investment and living; . It has four rooms plus a fifth in the attic; all with sea views; On the ground floor there is a large kitchen with impressive views, a complete bathroom with the views that characterize it the most a beautiful large living room with two orientations, from the living room you access one of the terraces facing the sea, ideal for barbecues or enjoying the surrounding environment; and on the upper floor are the rest of the rooms, plus the second bathroom and the second terrace from which it is accessed through the master bedroom, and a fitted attic. The house is very bright, nothing has been built in front of it and there is no possibility of building since the surrounding environment is the beach and natural area of Arraijanal, which is ideal for cycling, jogging or enjoying a walk with the species animals that you meet on the way. It is a very charming house. Its strong point without a doubt is its views, its surroundings and its luminosity and of course the spaciousness of its rooms. Located on the beachfront in Guadalmar next to the Arraijanal natural area. Quiet area ideal for living or investing, in a flat environment with easy access to the highway, a step away from Plaza Mayor, five minutes from Malaga airport, close to the Parador de Golf and Playamar area that has beach bars, shops, schools, bus, and metro stop that connects to the East and West zone. Quirón Hospital ten minutes away, Supermarkets, Martín Carpena Sports Palace, fifteen minutes from the historic center of Malaga.

description: DESCRIPTION OF THE PROPERTY Great opportunity to buy an exclusive property in the best area of Málaga. The price of this property has been reduced from 1,790, 000€ to 1,390, 000€. This property is ready to move in as it has been well-kept and top-quality materials have been used throughout. Security glass in all rooms.  It is distributed over three floors. On the basement there is a 50m2 (approx. ) garage and a storage area of about 50m2 as well. On the main floor there is a spacious living room with large windows leading directly to the garden, fully fitted kitchen with top brands appliances, toilet and utility area. On the first floor, there are four large bedrooms, all of them with wardrobes and an en suite bathroom. The master bedroom has a big terrace facing South. Spectacular garden with swimming pool, barbecue area and big pergola in order to make the most of the outdoor space. This dream home faces South in order to maximize allowing the entrance of natural light.  DESCRIPTION OF THE LOCATION “El Limonar” has been one of the most exclusive and sought-after areas to live in from many decades due to its great quality of life and above all because of its proximity to the city centre and the beach.   It is one of the most emblematic residential areas in Málaga, due to its tranquility and to its excellent geographical location as it is close to all kind of comforts: shops, restaurants, cafés, international schools etc. Furthermore, “El Limonar” is characterized for the abundance of gardens and vegetation.  All things considered, it is an ideal place for all those people who wish to live close to the city centre, but enjoying at the same time, a great quality of life in a dream area.

description: Lucas Fox presents this exclusive modern penthouse in the privileged Limonar Homes urbanization.  Originally designed as a four-bedroom penthouse, the owners were able to design it into three bedrooms, to enjoy a larger living space, with an open kitchen, guest bathroom and private lift access.  The property occupies the entire upper floor of the building, it is surrounded by a terrace on this same level of 121m2, it is worth noting the solarium that adds about 107m2 of terrace with panoramic views of the sea. Enjoy a storage room and two adjacent garage spaces with an electric vehicle charger.  It is distributed in such a way:  - A large living space by day, with a spacious living room with dining room, open kitchen fully equipped with high-quality appliances, access to the terrace and its chill-out area.  - A night space: two rooms with built-in built-in wardrobes and balconies that share a spacious bathroom with a bathtub and the majestic suite, which has its own bathroom, a dressing room, a large wardrobe and access to the terrace.  The qualities and materials used in the design of the apartment, such as the beautiful parquet in all spaces. The huge windows that provide magnificent light to each part of the apartment, and obviously the outdoor spaces on this floor that make you feel like you are in a villa with an outdoor garden.  It is worth noting the amenities provided in the urbanization: future buyers will be able to enjoy 3 swimming pools, one of which is Olympic (50 meters), barbecue areas in the common areas for celebrations, sports area and play area for children.

description: This cosy apartment is located on the top floor of a three-storey building built in 2002 in the popular quarter of La Trinidad. It is very well connected by public transport and a few metres from the historic center and shopping malls.  From the entrance, a corridor leads to the bright living-dining room with an east facing terrace and the large fully equipped kitchen. The private area with the two bedrooms is south facing and offers a lot of tranquility and brightness. All rooms are exterior with daylight. The living room and master bedroom have A/C by split. The bedrooms are equipped with built-in wardrobes. The apartment has a bathroom with shower, sink, toilet and bidet and a separate guest toilet. The floors of the rooms are of marble.  On the ground floor of the building that has two elevators is the large garage and a storage room that are included in the price.

description: A truly impressive home surrounded by a magnificent garden. Stunning views to the bay of Malaga and sierras. Good access, very tranquil with no noise contamination, close to a golf course, 10 minute drive from the airport, 15 minutes to the centre of Malaga and beaches. 12,000sq. m. land comprising an amazing botanical garden with 100 palm trees, 300 rose bushes, great variety of plants and fruit trees, large pool, covered barbecue area, supersize trampoline, tennis court. The main residence comprises, entrance hall, very large lounge with fireplace, 2nd lounge, fully equipped beautiful kitchen, 4 bedrooms main ensuite, 2 bathrooms. High quality construction, solid carved wooden doors, airconditioning/heating throughout, built in wardrobes, solar heating. Second spacious 3 bedroom home with magnificent seaviews and roof terrace. Wooden very spacious 1 bedroom fully equipped guesthouse. A truly unique property!.

description: A jewel in the center of Malaga: A charming duplex with a large terrace in the historic center. The building is a 2016 construction with only three apartments.  On the second floor there is the bright living room and the American kitchen fully equipped with high quality appliances.  Through a sliding door you can reach a large bedroom that also can form part of the living room. On the same floor there is a bathroom with shower.  Going up the stairs there is access to the spacious bedroom with large fitted wardrobes and an en-suite bathroom, also with shower set. The bedroom overlooks the terrace of about 20m2 so it is very bright and quiet.  To enjoy the terrace throughout the year has an electric awning. The wooden windows are double glazed and the house is equipped with split air conditioning. Solar panels produce the energy for hot water.

description: This is a unique home due to its location, layout and size. An authentic luxury full of corners and spaces to discover, balconies, porches and gazebos where you can enjoy the eternal summer of Malaga.  We enter the house through a square with a fountain in the centre and a covered garage with capacity for 4 vehicles plus another 6 in the open. The entrance to the house is located under a huge covered area that can be accessed by vehicle so that passengers can descend.  On entering, we immediately find the day area, distributed around a spacious circular hall illuminated by natural light. On the left is the dining room. Next, at the back, is the kitchen, which includes a living-dining area, utility room with bathroom and pantry room. The kitchen has sea views and access to the terrace that surrounds the house.  To the right, we find a living room that has 3 rooms on two levels of about 120 m² that includes a fireplace and access to a huge porch with views of the bay. To the right of the living room door is the lift.  Dominating the centre of this hall, there is a solid wood staircase that is divided into 2 sections, one on each side. On the right, there is a corridor that leads to two bedrooms, each with a dressing room and a bathroom. On the left you access the master bedroom which has more than 40 m², a 30 m² dressing room and a bathroom with a jacuzzi of similar proportions to the rest, and all with views of the Bay of Malaga.  All floors are marble or solid wood, the windows are insulating and the blinds are electric and it has a sophisticated security service with cameras.  On the ground floor, which overlooks the garden with the pool, there is a games room with billiards and a spacious living room with a fireplace that includes a kitchen open to another porch. In the other wing, there is an equipped gym that includes a toilet, an indoor pool with hot water by solar panels and a jacuzzi.  In the middle of the garden, separating the pool from the house, there is a charming gazebo that overlooks the sea and can seat 6-8 people. The pool, one of the highlights of the house, is made in part with natural rock and has water jets and various waterfalls that make it unique.  And in addition to all this, it has more than 600 m² unfinished on 2 floors of 300 m² each where to install bedrooms and service area, storage area, cinema or a bowling alley.  A unique, elegant home with Malaga on the doorstep.  Contact us for more information or to arrange a visit.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Antón Chéjov

description: Lucas Fox presents this beautiful villa in one of the best areas of Malaga.  From the street, the first floor is accessed by stairs. Once inside, we find the entrance entrance hall that, through a corridor, leads to the large living-dining room with access to the garden and pool on the right. To the left of the entrance hall, there is a guest toilet and, next, the equipped kitchen and a staff bedroom with bathroom. From the kitchen, we access the covered pool area that has a porch area and access to the garden. From the pool, by some small stairs, we access a laundry area.  From the entrance entrance hall, some beautiful stairs lead us to the first floor with the night area. To the right, there is a complete bathroom with a shower, a double bedroom and then the ensuite bedroom with a bathtub and a large built-in wardrobe. From the stairs, to the left, there are two bedrooms and a bathroom.  On the second floor, we have a large office with a large living room and rest area with access to the roof terrace.  From the main floor, some stairs lead to the semi- lower ground floor, with a garage for two cars, a gym and storage area.  This beautiful villa consists of several independent areas, a storage area in the garage and the pool area. Its north orientation allows us to enjoy the sun and some warm summer afternoons. Do not hesitate to request a visit to see this spectacular villa in perfect condition and ready to live.

description: Engel & Völkers presents a wonderful home that occupies an entire floor in one of the most emblematic buildings in the heart of Malaga. The apartment is distributed in a large living room and dining room, a large kitchen, three bedrooms, two bathrooms with shower, a courtesy toilet, a storage room and a laundry area. The large dining room has four windows and three French balconies. The handmade glass windows stand out. The kitchen is located right next door and is fully equipped with high-quality appliances. Inside there are three large double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes that overlook interior patios and offer light and tranquility. The main bedroom is equipped with a spacious bathroom with a shower, the other bedrooms share the second bathroom. In the laundry room with washer and dryer there are cabinets to store bed linen, towels, etc. Additional storage space is in the storage room of approximately four square meters. The floor in the living room and bedrooms is oak parquet, bathrooms and kitchen tiles. The house has piped music and ducted air conditioning.

address: Calle Juan Vázquez no number s/N
description: Opportunity to buy in one of the most popular urbanizations in Malaga, Cerrado de Calderón, ideal for families with children as it has a series of unbeatable services, the location of the house is five minutes from the English and French School, Sagrado Corazón (Esclavas), León XIII and Cerrado de Calderón nearby even for walking, bus stop, a few meters from the shopping center with restaurants and all kinds of services, including the Mercadona supermarket. The property is distributed in: Entrance hall, a large, spacious, independent and bright living-dining room that gives direct access to the terrace with open and closed views with Lumón. Fully equipped and renovated kitchen with the laundry room included in it. Of the four rooms, one functions as an office, (possibility of recovering said room as a bedroom). It has four bedrooms, the main one with an en-suite bathroom and direct access to the terrace and another bathroom for the rest of the bedrooms, all with fitted wardrobes and lined with drawers. The house has PVC and climalit windows, the closing of the room is anti-bullet. It has hot/cold heating through ducts and hot water through an individual natural gas boiler, granite floors, armored door, alarm system, etc. The house includes a garage space of 28 meters built. The gated community offers a communal area with a large wooded garden, with a social club that has a swimming pool, an area for celebrations with a bar, a squash court and a gym with changing rooms. These facilities make the enclosure a safe area for children to play throughout the year. The community has a physical doorman. Visit it without obligation!

description: Property in Pinares de San Antón, where you can enjoy family and friends due to the facilities available: terraces, swimming pool, barbecue, etc. Due to its location it has enviable privacy and surroundings. It consists of two floors: on the main floor we find a large entrance hall with high ceilings and a glass skylight, a bedroom and another one half a floor up, guest toilet, living room and kitchen. On the upper floor there are 3 bedrooms with direct access to the terrace, one of them with an ensuite bathroom. All this surrounded by a pine forest and views of the sea and the mountains. Located at 7 km from the city centre and 15 km from the AGP Málaga airport, Pinares de San Antón is one of the best areas of Málaga city to live in. It is in a rural environment, but open to the sea, where we can find all kinds of amenities and services in order to make your daily life comfortable and functional. We should not forget its great leisure and entertainment options: restaurants, beach bars, shops, El Candado Golf Club, El Candado Marina, Málaga Tennis Club, Miraflores, etc. This residential area offers 24-hour security services. In the vicinity, we can find renowned national and international schools (San Estanislao de Kostka, The British School Malaga, Lycée Français.. . ).

description: We present in Playa del Bajondillo (Torremolinos), 50 meters from the promenade, this apartment with 2 spacious bedrooms and 1 very large bathroom with bathtub, the living room has two large balconies and access to the terrace that is also accessed through one of the bedrooms, the Kitchen is independent and has all appliances plus a laundry area and patio. The building was built in 2001 and there are only 4 neighbors, this apartment is on the first floor (no elevator). Characteristics: Centralized air conditioning in the living room and bedrooms with heat pump, white lacquered aluminum windows with Climalit (double glazing), marble floors and northeast orientation (morning sun).

description: FRONT OF THE SEA IN THE CORNER IN ONE OF THE MOST EXCLUSIVE URBANIZATIONS OF BENALMÁDENA WITH DOUBLE GARAGE! Spectacular house with panoramic views of the sea with a very large terrace of 30 m2 facing south with lots of sun. The house is distributed with a spacious living room with direct access to the terrace. Fully furnished and equipped independent kitchen with serving hatch and a large laundry room. Very spacious master bedroom with built-in wardrobe and direct access to the terrace. 1 full bathroom. The house also has 5 storage rooms attached to the house where it is accessed directly from inside the house with the possibility of making several bedrooms and a second bathroom. The complex has beautiful common areas with gardens and swimming pool. ORIGINALLY HOUSE WITH 1 BEDROOM WITH THE POSSIBILITY OF MAKING SEVERAL INTERIOR BEDROOMS. description: DESCRIPTION OF THE PROPERTY We are proud to present “La Colina”, an exclusive classic-style villa located in one of the most prestigious neighbourhoods in Málaga.  This magnificent villa offers complete tranquility and privacy as well as wonderful views of Malaga bay and mountains as it is located on top of a hill.  The outdoors spaces are beautiful: nice garden, salt-water swimming pool and a fantastic porch in which to enjoy the beautiful sunsets and cheerful gatherings with family and friends.  This classic style home was built to the highest standards and it has special places such as the cozy cellar that leads to a garden with barbecue, or the charming attic, perfect to enjoy unique views or your favourite reading.  There is also a staff area and a separate guest apartment in order to improve the well-being and privacy of the owners.  The property is located on a quiet dead-end street, at the northern part of Cerrado de Calderón. It is well-connected (just a few minutes away) with the commercial area where renowned restaurants, fashion shops and prestigious schools are located. Last but not least, it is just fifteen minutes from the exciting and cosmopolitan city centre by car. DESCRIPTION OF THE LOCATION. Cerrado de Calderón, more commonly known as “El Cerrado”, is located in one of the most sought-after residential areas. Thanks to its mountainous topography and vegetation, a great number of properties have scenic views to the houses complex, to the sea and Málaga bay. The properties are mostly, single-family, terraced and semi-detached houses with swimming pools and luxuriant gardens. They are the perfect option to create a new home, as they combine the tranquility and well being with the proximity to Málaga City, both by car and public means of transport. The complex accommodates shopping areas such as Multicentro in the lower part of the area and Next shopping in the higher part and has the privilege of being home to four of the best schools in Málaga: Cerrado de Calderón, the Lycée Français, St George’s and Sagrado Corazón, better known as “Las Esclavas”. This area is structured around three main streets (Olmos, Flamencos and Cáceres) and is perfectly connected with the beach and the promenade, it is just fifteen minutes away from the international airport in Málaga, twenty-five minutes from Nerja and thirty-five minutes from Marbella. Furthermore, there is an easy access to the motorway “Autovía del Mediterráneo".

The community offers a 24 hour reception, on site gym with heated pool and spa (paid service), onsite restaurant, supermarket and bars. All this in one of the best holiday destinations in Benalmadena! description: Engel & Völkers presents a unique home in the heart of Malaga. On the top floor of a building built in 1870 with architectural protection grade 1 the architect D. Antonio Álvarez Gil has restored the property of an area of approximately 280m2.  A private covered terrace and a lookout tower offering 360-degree views over Malaga are included. The house has a large living room with a kitchen equipped with top quality appliances.  The master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom, the three secondary bedrooms share two bathrooms. The lookout tower has a library on the lower floor, on the upper floor a living area. Apart there are two spaces for facilities and warehouse.  The structure of the floor was reinforced with a collaborative slab of reinforced concrete. The interior enclosures were made with a newly built brick factory. Lapacho wood floor imported from Paraguay The wall coverings are made of traditional stucco of the highest quality made by the company Cumen SL. The cladding of the walls of the bathrooms is made of solid stone from the Guijuelo quarry. The wooden ceilings of 1870 were restored in 2005.

suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle Méndez Núñez

description: Lucas Fox is pleased to present this beautiful Andalusian-style villa built on several floors with terraces, perfectly integrated with the natural environment that surrounds it, perfect for enjoying the tranquility of living in a privileged spot like Pinares de San Antón. Here you will enjoy living in the middle of nature, while contemplating the wonderful views of the sea.  This villa, whose main body is distributed over three floors, including the apartment, has 6 bedrooms and 6 bathrooms. In total, it has a constructed area of just over 360 m² with approximately 250 m² useful and sits on a plot of 829 m². From the upper entrance, there is access to some stairs that communicate with the main entrance.  From the landing, there is access to the right to an office and a complete guest bathroom. Next, the spacious and bright open kitchen is presented and has views, both from the living room and from the south-facing office bar, as well as a pantry. The wonderful living-dining room is the ideal size for a family, neither small nor excessively large. This room includes a charming terrace from which you can enjoy the wonderful sunsets over the Mediterranean Sea.  On the lower floor, there is a hall that leads to the two bedrooms. Both are connected by a discreet and elegant open hall that functions as a library and a reading corner. Both bedrooms have a private bathroom and both are very spacious, especially the one that functions as the master bedroom and has a large dressing area. In addition, both have a quiet private terrace where you can spend time contemplating the blue tones of the sea and the sky, as well as the green of the surrounding pines.  Going up from the main floor to the upper floor, there is access on the left to a spacious and bright bedroom with a terrace. To the right, another sophisticated and elegant master bedroom with ensuite bathroom and private terrace is offered, facing south with sea views.  The house has two access doors, one on the main avenue, where there is an uncovered parking space for one, and another on the back street, which has a closed garage and a 30 m² storage room. Another fantastic detail that this villa has is that, at street level, it has a one-bedroom apartment with direct access from the outside and from the large terrace on the lower level. Immediately upstairs is the pool, which is saltwater.  This elegant and well-kept villa is a true luxury for its decoration with old wooden doors from India, for its careful distribution, for its location and for its relaxing views, in addition to having a perfectly distributed 8-camera surveillance system. Although the truth is that security and tranquility are the keynote of this fantastic urbanization where you will enjoy living in the middle of nature, but just 15 minutes from Malaga, with all its bustling cultural and gastronomic life.

As can be seen in the photos, unobstructed views of the square and in front of the Cathedral tower, surrounded by museums (Carmen Thyssen, Picasso, Pompidou, Malaga Museum, etc. ) and by the main monuments of the capital, the Alcazaba, Teatro Roman, the Cathedral, Gibralfaro Castle, etc. A few meters away they have the necessary services for daily life, supermarkets, shops, schools, nurseries, pharmacies, Atarazana food market, etc. The property is distributed in: A large living room with two balconies overlooking the square with unobstructed views, two bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, one of them with an en-suite bathroom, two bathrooms in total, a fully equipped independent kitchen. The materials are top brands, marble floors, climalit windows, hot and cold air conditioning, high ceilings, etc. Visit it without obligation!

description: Welcome to this spectacular house, famous for having served as the base camp for a successful American technology company recently installed in Malaga! Built in 1994, the house is located in an exclusive residential area that is in high demand, with great privacy and close to all services to make your life in this house a unique experience.The views of the sea from its exteriors are impressive, which will allow you to enjoy the spectacular Mediterranean sunsets. With a large flat plot, as soon as you enter the house, you will be surprised by its modern style and its high ceilings.One of the most unique features of this house is its large living room with dining area and kitchen, equipped with a magnificent fireplace and open to the porch through three large windows.Two of the three bedrooms are located on this main floor, one of them with two en-suite bathrooms.On the upper floor there is another bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and a private terrace with views of the golf course and the sea and an attic room with multiple possibilities of use.The house is completed with a service area on the ground floor. If the interior is spectacular, the exterior areas are not far behind with the cozy porch and the garden area with abundant vegetation and unobstructed views of both the sea and the city.In this area we find the pool as well as the orchard where you can grow your own fruits and vegetables and even your own olives! If you are looking for a spacious and luxurious home in an exceptional location and with a host of amenities, then look no further than this successful property. The materials used in its construction, such as the resistant slate on the roof or the double-glazed windows, as well as its decoration and details, mark the classic and elegant character of the property, making it a unique and safe investment in which to create your home. El Candado is one of the best urbanizations to live in the capital of the Costa del Sol, connected by public transport and only 7 km from the historic center of the city.Located in the eastern part of Malaga, a few minutes away are the famous beaches of El Palo and Pedregalejo with their classic beach bars where you can taste the typical "pescaito malagueño".Within the urbanization we can enjoy a golf course, social club and marina, prestigious restaurants, supermarkets and schools with an international environment.It is an area open to the sea where we can find all the comforts and services necessary to make your daily life comfortable and functional.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Candado, Málaga
