description: Villa located in one of the best residential developments in Malaga, both for its tranquility and proximity to the city center, as well as for its security and facilities. It is ideal for both a couple and a large family, as it is very versatile and has many distribution options. This property is divided into 2 independent houses, one per floor, being able to restore it again in one. It also has 2 independent exterior rooms. The house on the ground floor is distributed in: entrance hall, courtesy toilet, living-dining room, kitchen, large bedroom with bathroom en suite and porch with direct access to the garden and the swimming pool. The house on the upper floor is distributed in: living room with integrated kitchen, bathroom and 3 bedrooms, one of them with an en-suite bathroom and access to a large terrace that connects with the living room. Regardless, there is a very spacious room with a bathroom in the pool area and another room with the possibility of having a living room, kitchen, bathroom and bedroom. All this surrounded by a large well-kept garden, a backyard connected to the kitchen and an infinity pool. Located 7 km from the city center and 15 from Malaga AGP airport, Pinares de San Antón is one of the best areas of Malaga capital to live. It is an area in a rural environment, but open to the sea where we can find all the necessary comforts and services so that your daily life is comfortable and functional. We cannot forget its great leisure offer: restaurants, beach bars, shops, etc. and entertainment: El Candado Golf Club, Puerto Deportivo El Candado, Malaga Tennis Club and Miraflores. The urbanization offers 24 hour security, and with renowned schools for the children's studies.

description: I present to you this exclusive couplet on the first line of the beach in Torre de Benagalbón.Ideal for lovers of the sea and tranquility.Privileged location, with a door that gives direct access to the promenade that makes up the Malaga Coastal Path and the beach. It has 2 floors, a basement and a loft with access to a beautiful L-shaped solarium. Rectangular plot of 465.21m2 with a beautiful porch with barbecue and a large garden facing south.In the access area to the enclosure, there is a parking area with 3 covered spaces and ample space to manoeuvre. Upon entering the house, we find a spacious hall, a living room with a fireplace, very bright and spacious, which leads to the main porch and the large garden, where without a doubt, you will live great moments and magnificent evenings in the company of family and friends. An independent and equipped kitchen with a laundry room and storage.On this ground floor, we also have a bedroom and a toilet. On the first floor there are four more bedrooms and two complete bathrooms, one of them en suite.The main room has a large terrace with spectacular views of the sea.Another of the rooms, in the opposite orientation, with views of the mountain.Four of the 7 rooms that the property has have built-in wardrobes and three of them have air conditioning units with a hot and cold pump. On the second floor we have two cozy rooms with sloping ceilings.From the distributor there is access to an L-shaped solarium terrace with spectacular frontal views of the sea.Ideal to enjoy the beautiful sunsets of our wonderful Mediterranean climate throughout the year. It also has a basement with many possibilities, where the machinery, motors, water tank and large electric water heater are located, from where hot and cold water is distributed to the entire house and a large storage area. It has a security alarm, armored door and bars on the windows.It has an unbeatable location, due to its proximity to the center of Rincón de la Victoria, a few minutes' walk along its promenade.Close to restaurants, beach bars, supermarkets, gas stations, a club with a paddle tennis court and health establishments. Very well connected, with easy and quick access to the Mediterranean highway.You will reach the center of the Capital in 25 minutes and the international airport in 30 minutes. If you love the sea and the relaxing sound of the waves...What more could you ask for? Come visit it and you will see its full potential.Purchase proposals will be studied! The house is completely renovated preserving all the historical elements of the building, original natural wood ceilings, exposed brick walls and porcelain floors imitating the original hydraulics. The house has hot and cold air conditioning in all rooms, climalit-type lacquered aluminum windows and white lacquered doors. The entire house is decorated with great taste and is fully furnished. description: Penthouse Reserva del Higueron. The apartment was built in 2018 in Reserva del Higueron and is called Collection Hill. In the Reserva del Higueron you will find the Nagomi spa that offers various treatments and a hairdresser as well as relaxation areas. The complex also offers a gym, tennis courts and paddle tennis courts (for a fee) 3-4 restaurants, including a Michelin restaurant. There is a free daily "train" from Reserva del Higueron to Fuengirola beach/town and the shopping center at the top of the complex. The train is free to use Penthouse Reserva del Higueron is a penthouse furnished in Boheme style and forms a wonderful setting for a fantastic vacation/home. The house contains a fully equipped open plan kitchen. Charming open plan living/dining room combined with large windows to the terrace, the windows can be pushed aside so that the living room opens onto the terrace, the living room is fitted with electric shutters for sun protection if desired? Large sunny terrace with an unspoiled view of the Mediterranean, the coast and Fuengirola as well as the mountains in the background, on the terrace you will find a Jacuzzi from which you can enjoy the bubbles and the view, sun loungers, hammock and a long table with accompanying chairs. 2 bedrooms with wardrobes and access to the terrace. 2 bathrooms. hot and cold air conditioning as well as fiber internet. 2 private parking spaces Today the penthouse is used as a holiday home for the owner and is also rented out in holiday rentals through a Danish company called Malaga Holiday Homes.

description: Magnificent plot located in Cerrado de Calderón, a single-family house to reform, consisting of two floors, on the first floor, we find 3 bedrooms, a bathroom and a terrace. The ground floor is distributed in a large living room, a bedroom, a kitchen, a bathroom and a terrace. This house is a great opportunity, since you can reform it to your liking and it is located in an unbeatable area of the Cerrado de Calderón, a few minutes walk from schools, supermarkets, restaurants... Cerrado de Calderón, more commonly known as “El Cerrado”, is located in the eastern area of Malaga, being one of the the most demanded residential areas with a relief mountainous area with abundant vegetation and where, thanks to its orography, a large number of houses have views open to the urbanization, the sea and the bay of Malaga. The properties are, for the most part, individual villas, townhouses and semi-detached houses with swimming pools and lush gardens that convert the homes of Cerrado de Calderón into the perfect location, since the tranquility and the well-being with the proximity to the city center either in car (10 to 15 minutes from their different locations), or thanks to an excellent network of municipal buses. Cerrado de Calderón has two shopping centers The main ones are the "Multicentro", with a supermarket and the shopping center "Next Shopping" located north of the urbanization. In addition, the residential area of Cerrado de Calderón, has the privilege of hosting four of the best schools in Malaga which are: the Cerrado de Calderón, the Lycée Français (or French Lyceum), the school The British School of Málaga and the school belonging to the Sacred Heart, better known as "Las Esclavas” Structured around its three main streets (Olmos, Flamencos and Cáceres) and with direct access to the motorway Mediterranean, the urbanization is perfectly communicated with the beach area and the promenade of Malaga, just 15 minutes from the airport.

description: OPPORTUNITY, magnificent home in a quiet area with a large garden space, close to Ciudad Jardín and the Botanical Garden. Well connected and good access. The house is located in a quiet enclave, but very well connected, 5 minutes from the Ciudad Jardín area. It is ideal to adapt as a rural hotel, farm for events, etc. But it is also a magnificent place to live surrounded by nature and at the same time with all kinds of services and communications five minutes away, in Ciudad Jardín. It has its own well, cistern and also municipal water supply. It has a 290m2 warehouse and another 57m2 warehouse. The house is surrounded by a large plot of land with a garden and facing South, with porch areas, barbecue, which makes it very bright and with unobstructed views. The house is very comfortable, it has two living rooms, and the bedrooms have an en-suite bathroom. From the garden there is access to the main living-dining room, with large windows, the kitchen is independent, very charming and rustic in style and has a large pantry. Next to this area there is a small open patio. All bedrooms are on the ground floor. On the upper floor there is a large living room with several windows, a bathroom and a storage area, which occupies the entire floor of the house..

The apartment consists of two entrances. Central air conditioning and a Split in the living room. Large garage with storage room included in the price. Unbeatable location in Limonar, the most exclusive area of Malaga. Close to all kinds of services, hospitals, supermarkets, restaurants, the beach is 5 minutes walk and bus stop (El 32) a few meters. description: Magnificent independent villa a few meters from the beach of Rincón de la Victoria, and close to the road, easily accessible from the highway and the old road. It is a large house of 600 m2, divided into a ground floor of 300m2 and another of 300m2 on its first floor connected by an elevator. and interior staircase. On the ground floor we have a garage for 4 vehicles, TV room, office-library, large gym, bathroom with hydromassage shower, ironing room and storage room, very large cellar with dining room, and two direct exits to the garden and elevator to access to the first floor, and access door to the garden and a recreation area with barbecue. This entire floor communicates with the first floor by means of an elevator or the hall with stairs, which in turn has direct access to the garden. The main or first floor is accessed from the garden, through a beautiful white marble staircase. The plant is distributed in hall, three large living rooms with terrace and porch, facing south, very bright and overlooking the garden and the pool, very large kitchen-dining room with pantry and laundry room. Four large bedrooms, two of them with bathroom en suite, and two rooms that share a bathroom and a toilet. The house is surrounded by a consolidated garden, with very pleasant living areas, with a barbecue, and a swimming pool, which has a Jacuzzi, a shower room and a bar counter. All rooms are very bright with large windows. Very close to the house we can find a service area and supermarkets. Equipment and facilities. Elevator, cistern for water, solar panels, air conditioning, armored doors, fire detector. All the rooms are exterior, and with built-in wardrobes. Windows, doors, latches and stair railing are Oregon pine.

description: GREAT SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE RECENTLY RENOVATED WITH PRIVATE POOL IN CAPELLANIA.ALHAURIN DE LA TORRE TRESOL Inmobiliaria sells this impressive newly renovated semi-detached house in one of the best urbanizations, Capellanía, with an unbeatable location, close to all kinds of services, the center of Alhaurín de la Torre and with a quick exit to the highway. On a 250 m2 plot, its 194m2 built on 3 floors are distributed in: living room, kitchen, 3 bedrooms (before 4), 4 bathrooms, living room in the basement / games room and storage rooms.Outside: porch, pool area, dining terrace, patio with bar and barbecue. GROUND FLOOR: hall, living room, kitchen, 1 bedroom with bathroom and 1 toilet. The living-dining room, with a fireplace, is very spacious and with lots of natural light, open to the garden and the pool facing south.Cozy and modern, with perimeter led lights on the ceiling. The kitchen is fully equipped with appliances, has a laundry closet, office area and exit to the side of the plot with a pleasant pergola terrace perfect as a summer dining room. The master bedroom is on this floor, spacious with plenty of storage area and a large en-suite bathroom with Jacuzzi. In addition, there is a toilet on this floor. UPPER FLOOR: 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom The two bedrooms on this floor are large, sloping ceilings, especially one of them, which used to be two.They can easily be divided again by removing the plasterboard. BASEMENT: living room, game room, toilet, storage room and bar with barbecue. The basement is huge.It is divided into several rooms. A large dining room open to the outside.A large room with a shower that could be converted into a large bedroom and have an apartment downstairs. Storage room and outside toilet. OUTSIDE: The front garden, with the porch and pool area is immaculate. Dining room off the kitchen and patio with bar and barbecue in the semi-basement. DETAILS: Year of construction: 2000 but recently completely renovated PVC windows with armored glass Marble floors IBI: € 720 / year approx For more information, do not hesitate to contact us, we will be happy to assist you.REF: 1692 Phone: 952 410 333.WhatsApp and mobile phone: 662 922 85 (In compliance with RD of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of October 11, it is reported that the price does not include the expenses derived from the purchase of real estate according to current laws: notary, registry, ITP etc.) The data displayed is merely informative and has no contractual value, the offer is subject to errors, price changes, availability and / or withdrawal from the market without prior notice.

description: This spectacular Penthouse - Duplex ( 2 Duplex Penthouses joined together ) Majestic Penthouse in the heart of La Carihuela in Torremolinos. 300m2 built, 3 large bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 1 ironing room, 3 kitchens, air conditioning throughout the property, as well as heating radiator and a wonderful fireplace. In addition to a large terrace of 50 m2 with opening roof and all the front from where we can contemplate incredible views of the Mediterranean. In the original plans it was configured for 7 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms in total, this is what would have been in these penthouses if we had not asked for their union in a single penthouse and changed the distribution of the same when the building was constructed as we can see in the photos. In any case, this penthouse can be separated into two by simply locking an interior door, although with different measurements between the two at any time, as it has a kitchen on one side and another on the other side of the penthouse. This means that we can have family or friends in our home, but at the same time totally separated as there are two entrances. The urbanisation in which it is located has a communal swimming pool, the property has private parking. Only 100 metres from the sea, next to the sand you can enjoy a magnificent promenade and numerous shops, bars, restaurants and beach clubs in one of the most characteristic and must-see areas of the municipality, where it retains the charm of a typical Andalusian village that once was.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Carihuela - Los Nidos, Torremolinos
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Villa superbly located 150 m. from the beach in Benajarafe On an area of about 406 m2. With garden in the front and left as you enter, diaphanous rear area enabled for clothesline and 3 terraces on the right side. It has parking area. The house is oriented to the South, which makes it very bright, overlooking the sea, the beach. It is very nice to be on the terrace that there is so wide and with so much light watching the sea. The construction is located in the center of the plot and divided into two individual floors (a floor of 98 m2 built and the top floor of 98 m2 built too), each of them has a hall, hallway, two bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, large kitchen with pantry, bathroom with window, laundry room, very cheerful and bright living room and terrace with magnificent views of the sea, facing South and West (the one on the ground floor is about 10 m2 and the one on the top floor of 20 m2). At the moment there are two independent houses, very easy to communicate or convert into one if you want. It has a garage for two vehicles. The Villa is also ideal as an investment, being divided in two, for tourist rental given its proximity to the beach and good communications, as well as all kinds of nearby services It is located just 150 meters from the beach, 300 meters from the bus stop. The area has several snacks and restaurants, supermarket, pharmacy, two hostels and tobacconist. Near gas station and 3 km from Mercadona Chilches.

description: Let yourself be impressed by the spectacular panoramic views of the Guadalhorce Valley from this detached villa with pool and two guest apartments in Pinos de Alhaurín, Alhaurín de la Torre. The exterior of the house, with an area of 2,500m², offers us beautiful natural areas, a large swimming pool and a stone staircase that leads us to the area where you can enjoy its views. In addition, next to the house there is a guest apartment of about 60m² with a living-dining room, an independent kitchen, a bedroom and a bathroom. The main house, with an approximate area of 260m², has a spacious living-dining room with fireplace, separate kitchen, five bedrooms, two bathrooms and a storage room. On the upper floor of the house, which is accessed by an external staircase, we find an independent apartment of 50m² distributed in: living room, kitchen, bedroom and bathroom. In addition, this chalet has a garage for two vehicles and a semi-basement with two large rooms. description: An impressive villa for sale in Gibralfaro. In a perfect location, since the Gibralfaro Castle and the Mirador are a 5-minute walk away, and only a 10-minute walk from the beach and the historic center. Four floors with a large distribution, with two living rooms, 6 bedrooms, 3 of them with a balcony with sea views and fitted wardrobes, 3 bathrooms and a terrace on the fourth floor with sea views. One of the rooms is currently used as a study. The outdoor area is one of the most square meters in the area, with a private garden, swimming pool, porch and laundry area next to the kitchen. The garage is recently renovated and has capacity for two cars. It is a semi-detached house only at the rear, so it has great independence. The terrace on the top floor has beautiful south and east facing views. The house has many possibilities, such as joining the 2 rooms, which at the beginning was a single large room. The main living room has a fireplace and built-in bookcase with the wall that separates it with soundproofing. The floor is marble and one of the three balconies is closed with a beautiful window. It has a small storage room as a store for cleaning products or food on the first floor, at the bottom of the stairs.

description: This magnificent and unique property is a large estate of 20.000 m2, perfect for a large family or business as it is prepared and conditioned for the planning and production of any type of events (it has a license for it). This property consists of: Main house, three independent studios, two independent rooms, two large rooms for celebrations, events etc.. . Spacious gardens and a large swimming pool. The property also has a large parking area with capacity for more than 200 vehicles. The house on one floor consists of a large living-dining room with a beautiful fireplace, a large fully equipped kitchen, three very spacious bedrooms, two of them with en suite bathroom, also has a toilet. The house has a large porch from which you can contemplate a large part of the garden and pool area of the property. On the side of the house there are three terraces with barbecue area, as well as access to other areas of the house. In addition to the three studios, the two bedrooms have full en-suite bathrooms. Only 20 kilometres from Malaga city and 10 kilometres from the beaches of Torremolinos, Alhaurin de la Torre is a perfect destination for relaxed living in the Guadalhorce Valley. Its proximity to large urban centres, and the large amount of green areas makes Alhaurín de la Torre the perfect place to live.

description: Spectacular duplex penthouse on the beachfront in Guadalmar, one of the best areas of Malaga, ideal for both investment and living; tourist license approved, currently operating as such at 90%. You have four rooms plus a fifth in the attic; all with sea views; On the ground floor there is a large kitchen, a bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and an en-suite bathroom plus a beautiful living room with a fireplace and a larger window than the standard one with all the sea in front and the ground floor terrace that overlooks the areas common and has a built-in barbecue; and on the upper floor are the rest of the rooms, plus the second bathroom and the second terrace from which it is accessed through the master bedroom. The house is very bright, it has nothing built in front and there is no possibility of building since the environment that surrounds it is both the beach and the natural area of Arraijanal, which is ideal for cycling or running or enjoying a walk together at animal species that you meet along the way. It is a very charming house. Its strong point without a doubt is its views, its surroundings and its luminosity and of course the spaciousness of its rooms. Beautiful duplex penthouse on the beachfront in Guadalmar next to the Arraijanal natural area. Quiet area ideal for living or investing, in a flat environment with easy access to the highway, a step away from Plaza Mayor, five minutes from Malaga airport, close to the Parador de Golf and Playamar area that has beach bars, shops, schools, bus, and metro stop that connects to the East and West zone. Quirón Hospital ten minutes away, Supermarkets, Martín Carpena Sports Palace.

description: We are happy to present you this beautiful townhouse in Torrequebra, in Ronda del Golf Este. The townhouse is located in a charming urbanization, closed area with large green areas, gardens and a large community pool. An area where its tranquility and green areas stand out. You can breathe a lot of peace thanks to its good atmosphere, surrounded by nature and accompanied by the continuous singing of birds. The semi-detached house has numerous outdoor areas, a completely exterior home where you can enjoy the sun both in the morning and in the afternoon, thanks to its south-east orientation in the living room and main garden and south-west orientation in the porch. It is a residential and very quiet area, next to the Torrequebrada golf courses. The townhouse stands out for the spaciousness of its spaces, both exterior and interior; thus the tranquility and quality of construction of the residential. A very comfortable townhouse, distributed on two levels. On the mezzanine floor there is an American-style kitchen, living room with fireplace, toilet and access to the garden with a private Jacuzzi. In the basement there is a large storage room. On the upper floor there are two bedrooms with their bathroom en suite each and large built-in wardrobes. The beginning with a terrace overlooking the mountains and golf courses of Torrequebrada. In addition, the house has other storage spaces. Stairs and marble floors. It has a private garage space, in closed parking. Do not hesitate to contact us for more information. We also have the virtual tour of the house.

description: Malaga is known for blending the traditional with modern refinement and nature, and Sierra Blanca Tower echoes this with its unique 21st century architecture focused on sustainability and respect for the environment.  This development consists of 3 towers of 22 floors each, including this exceptional 4-bedroom apartment. This stunning home offers spacious interiors and exteriors that have been designed to maximize stunning sea views and natural light.  The interior design has been carried out by the prestigious Beriestain studio and emphasizes high-quality materials and light tones with high-quality woods that add warmth to the space.  Residents will be able to enjoy the excellent community facilities including gym, sun deck, infinity pool, pool bar, office, co-working space, games room, cinema, nursery and spa.  A very special home facing the sea that offers an unparalleled quality of life in Malaga.

description: Majestic independent villa located in the Platero urbanization close to all kinds of services.Plot with an area of 782 m2 and southeast orientation.Location with easy access to main road.Good neighborhood environment. Exterior: Pool of 54 m2 of sheet water and hot / cold shower.Open space conditioned with pergolas, barbecue and summer dining room.Garden tool room.Mature garden with hedge of cypresses and light point for night lighting.Automatic entrance gate.Parking for several vehicles. Housing with a constructed area of 400 m2 distributed over 4 floors: - Basement 182 m2: Large room of 80 m2 ideal as a games room or celebrations.41 m2 apartment with bedroom + dressing room, bathroom.Garage and storage room. - Ground floor 123 m2: Porch, dining terrace, living room on two levels, equipped kitchen, laundry room, bedroom, bathroom. - Upper floor: 3 bedrooms (dressing room in the master bedroom), bathroom, terrace. - Roof floor: Attic with access to a solarium terrace (with beautiful views). Imposing independent villa located in the quiet urbanization Los Manantiales, Alhaurín de la Torre.A unique opportunity to be able to enjoy tranquility and privacy without giving up having all the services, supermarkets and leisure within walking distance. Second floor; three bedrooms, all of them with access to a large terrace with panoramic views of the mountains, a full bathroom and also, the main room has its own dressing room. Keep; On this floor we have the opportunity to enjoy the attic with access to the spectacular solarium where we can contemplate the great views. Basement; It has an area of about 180m² distributed in a spacious living room, an apartment with a bedroom, dressing room and bathroom.Covered garage for two vehicles. The exterior of the villa surprises us with its well-kept gardens, porches, terraces and a large 54m² swimming pool to enjoy long days outdoors with family and friends. Qualities: - Marble flooring on upper floors.Terrazzo and semi-basement wood laminate. - Interior carpentry with molded solid wood. - Exterior woodwork of pinotea wood, folding. - Aluminum blinds. - Centralized sound installation. - Fireplace with Italian marble front. - Video intercom. - Air conditioning throughout the house. - Solar panels. * In compliance with RD 218/2005 of the Junta de Andalucía of October 11, Messrs.Consumers that at the indicated prices are not included the expenses derived from the purchase of real estate according to the laws in force, (ITP, notary expenses.etc.).There are NO real estate brokerage fees in addition to the sale price.

description: Classic style villa with incredible views of the bay of Malaga. The entire house is surrounded by gardens and areas with various plants, flowers and fully consolidated trees, giving rise to unique spaces. The villa is divided into three perfectly distributed floors. On the central floor we find the entrance and main hall where there is an imposing skylight that is the axis of the house, double height living room, large kitchen with laundry room and pantry, courtesy toilet and garages. From this floor you can directly access the garden, swimming pool, gazebo and barbecue through various areas, where you can enjoy the climate of the Costa del Sol throughout the year. The upper floor has three bedrooms and two bathrooms. The master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom and a large terrace with extraordinary views. The ground floor is distributed almost entirely in a large meeting room with wine cellar, bar and fireplace with direct access to the garden. It also has a bathroom, a machine room and several storage spaces. Located 7 km from the city center and 15 from Malaga AGP airport, Pinares San Antón is one of the best areas of Malaga capital to live. It is an area in a country setting, but open to the sea where we can find all the comforts and services necessary to make your daily life comfortable and functional. We cannot forget its great leisure offer: restaurants, beach bars, shops, etc. and entertainment: El Candado Golf Club, El Candado Sports Port, Malaga Tennis Club and Miraflores. The urbanization offers 24-hour security, and with renowned schools for children's studies.

description: This beautiful apartment in the urbanisation Rocas Blancas, is all about the views and the light. With the south facing orientation and the spacious terrace with views over the green golf course and the sea, this is at the same time a perfect holiday home and a permanent living for someone that wants to live here all year around. The high location gives you the panoramic views but it´s still walking distance to a lot of things if you don´t mind a little hill going back. 1,5 km to Benalmádena Pueblo, 1 km to supermarkets 2,8 km to Arroyo de la Miel and the trainstation with easy access to Málaga and the airport. In the inmediate surroundings you also have an international private hospital, the hospital of Benalmádena, several restaurants and Benalmádena Golf. The apartment consist of a generous entrance hall with wardrobe, a living room, a fully fitted kitchen, 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 2 complete bathrooms and a separate utility room. Living room, kitchen and master bedroom have direct access to the amazing terrace overlooking the golf towards the sea. Included in the price are a private garage space, a private covered parking space and a storage. This well kept community offers 2 big swimming pools with sea views, one with a wooden deck and another surrounded by lush gardens.

description: DESCRIPTION OF THE HOUSE Engel&Völkers is proud to present this magnificent villa built in 1936 in one of the most prestigious areas of the city. It is located in the lower part of Pedregalejo, surrounded by the most singular and exclusive houses of the neighbourhood in a welcoming, homely and quiet atmosphere. The house was completely renovated in 1991. On the main floor, there is an entrance hall, a cozy living room, dining room and three sitting rooms, two of them with a fireplace, a large kitchen with a pantry and direct access to the garden and inner patio. On the upper floor, there is a master bedroom, with an en suite bathroom, two bedrooms that lead to private terraces, spectacular sea views and a bathroom. On the outside, there is a double-height porch and a fantastic private garden with barbecue area where one can enjoy with family and friends the wonderful weather that Malaga offers all year round.  The materials used in its construction (cobblestones of the outside space, green glazed ceramic roof tiles, really typical in Pedregalejo, rough bricks in the terrace, wood doors and windows, pieces of glass and shutters), its thorough decoration (centenary doors, bars and wrought-iron stairs) and an old stone fountain, which is a detail of the original house that has been preserved, grant this house a marked Andalusian character. All this make of this property a unique and safe investment where to create your dream home.  DESCRIPTION OF THE LOCATION Pedregalejo is one of the most exclusive areas of the city with a long tradition, renowned for its architecture (beautiful villas, former fishermen cottages etc). The atmospheric promenade has a great range of both long established and modern bars and restaurants. Thus, it is easy to understand why Pedregalejo continues to be one of the most sought-after locations in Malaga. It is within the catchment area of the best bilingual and international schools, consulates, sports clubs (sailing, tennis, a golf course, swimming pools…) supermarkets, and a popular, local organic open-air farmers market (Baños del Carmen) etc. It is located within walking distance of the city centre, the historic old town and the newly refurbished Muelle Uno from which you will be able to see the sunset while enjoying refreshing drinks or while reading. Furthermore, if you wish to continue discovering the “Costa del Sol” there is an easy access to the motorway “Autovía del Mediterráneo”.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Pedregalejo - Morlaco, Málaga

description: WOW Factor in the city centre Absolutely breath-taking property that is currently being completely renovated and should be finished Feburary 2023. The property ticks all the boxes: terrace, location, space, light, luxury….  Simply stunning top floor apartment that is 200m2, distributed in 3 bedrooms (2 of which have a walk-in closet), 3 en suite bathrooms, 1 guest toilet, an extremely spacious open plan kitchen and living room (80m2), where the living room opens up to a 23m2 terrace with views of the Cathedral and the Castillo de Gibralfaro.  The master bedroom is spacious with big walk-in closet, ensuite bathroom and access to an 8m2 terrace.  Location in unbeatable, right in the centre of Malaga next to one of the popular squares filled with the city best restaurants. The city, and all is has to offer, is literally at your doorstep. description: With a plot of 1038 m2, this magnificent villa with a total of 4 bedrooms (double) is located in one of the best areas of Benalmádena. Distributed in semi-basement, ground floor and first floor, it has a beautiful garden area, salt water swimming pool, as well as a nice Bar-chiringuito in the garden, a cosy Irish bar. In the semi-basement floor there is a Spanish style wine cellar of more than 100 m2, details that make the difference of this property. On the ground floor there is a spacious living - dining room, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, a large independent kitchen and an ironing room. The large kitchen of almost 30 m2 with access to the gardens and a large pantry. On the first floor we have 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, the master bedroom with a large balcony from which we can observe the fabulous sea views, a large dressing room and an en-suite bathroom. The property includes an annex that can be a multipurpose room (small gym, office etc) as well as a Turkish bath, solar panels, garage for two vehicles, and fantastic terraces with a magnificent orientation from which we will have sun at any time of the day. An impressive villa in one of the most privileged areas of the Costa del Sol. A great opportunity to live in a quiet Villa with supermarkets, tennis and paddle courts, restaurants, bus stop and taxi just a few meters from the beach. Only 10 minutes walk from the train station which connects Fuengirola to Malaga in less than 30 minutes, you have the freedom to have or not to have a car. If you do, you are close enough to motorway access so that you can get anywhere in 15 minutes or less: Malaga Airport (15 minutes), Marbella (20 minutes) and Fuengirola (10 minutes). Benalmádena is situated in a privileged enclave with golden beaches stretching for miles and miles in all directions.

description: We present this fantastic Villa which consists of 2 houses (3 dwellings) on the same property on a plot of 3.255m2. 1st: 3 Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms 2nd: 7 Bedrooms, 3 Bathrooms 3rd: 1 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom (Independent Apartment) Guest House In total 3 kitchens, outside kitchen and extra toilet. Perfect location to enjoy all the tranquillity and magnificent views over the valley. On entering the property we find a large parking area, with three covered and 8 uncovered parking spaces. The ground floor of the house is completely independent with living room, kitchen, three bedrooms and two bathrooms (1 en suite). On the other side of the villa, the first floor is accessed via an impressive staircase. This part of the house has its own living room, kitchen, 7 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. There is also a beautiful terrace with views to Malaga, and Sierra Nevada. In the garden there is a large swimming pool (around 60m2), a roofed dining room with table for 20-25 people, an outside kitchen with barbecue, toilet and washing machine. In addition to the outdoor kitchen, there is a completely independent guest house with living room, kitchen, bathroom and bedroom. The plot has a large orchard with avocados, lemons, oranges, mandarins, pomegranates, olive trees etc. Connected to town water, well in the garden. Alhaurín de la Torre is a beautifully kept village in the interior of the province of Málaga. Situated only 15 minutes from the beach, 10 minutes from the motorway, 7 minutes from Malaga International Airport.

description: If you dream of living in an independent house with a good plot, and with a fantastic location... This is your ideal home! It is located in a very consolidated area of Rincón de la Victoria, with an extraordinary South orientation. It has a beautiful flat plot of more than 1,200 meters, with different environments, which will help make your home unique... a nice and well-kept garden, a beautiful pool, barbecue area and bar... small corners to enjoy fantastic family and friends gatherings, in a quiet environment, but close to everything you need! The house was completely renovated in 2019 and has a very comfortable layout to make your day-to-day life easier. Its main floor consists of a front porch, hall, a spacious and cozy living-dining room with a fireplace, surrounded by a wonderful light well, providing it with great light, a large independent kitchen with access to a backyard, a bedroom, a bathroom, and another additional room, currently set up as an office, but which you can use as you wish. A few steps separate it from its first floor, where there are three bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of them en suite in its main room, which also has a spacious dressing room. All rooms are spacious and bright, with fitted wardrobes. In the basement, we have a very cozy open floor plan, with natural light, thanks to its windows, with different environments to achieve greater enjoyment for the whole family... Playground and fun guaranteed! It also has a beautiful laundry room and storage room. A home designed for everyone... the older and the younger... with different relief, storage and recreation areas, where, without a doubt, you will live unforgettable moments and enjoy pleasant evenings, thanks to the wonderful climate of the Costa del Sol throughout the year. A few minutes walk, you will have everything you need at your fingertips... shops, restaurants, health center, pharmacies, beach bars, schools... and the Paseo Marítimo de Rincón and its beaches. Very close to the Añoreta Golf Course, as well as Padel Clubs and other sports centers. With easy access to the Autovía del Mediterráneo, it is located about twenty minutes from Malaga and less than half an hour from the International Airport of Malaga and Costa del Sol. Your dream of an independent house in the center and on a flat plot is real.. . Come and see it, you will love it!

On the ground floor we have a spacious hall, a large living-dining room with large windows and a fireplace, a kitchen with a pantry, a dining area and open onto a living room. On this same floor we have a bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and a full bathroom. On the first floor, 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms. The master bedroom has a large terrace of 35 m2 facing south and overlooking the sea. Pool and gardens with two orchards. On the basement floor, a large storage room, a garage for 2 or 3 cars, and a room used with a cinema room.

On the first floor there are 3 bedrooms, one of them en-suite with its own bathroom, and another bathroom. It also has another terrace with a spiral staircase that leads to a solarium. First quality, with acoustic and thermal insulation, double-glazed sales, air conditioning by conduct with machine installed, fitted kitchens, built-in wardrobes in the bedrooms, full bathrooms, and hot water through aerothermal energy. The Hill Collection penthouse complex was built in 2018 and offers a beautiful, bright modern penthouse with high ceilings and large windows for full exposure of the beautiful surroundings. description: Welcome to a large and beautiful house in El Candado. El Candado is one of the most popular residential areas in Malaga. Here you can live in a relaxed way, away from the crowds but still, the sea is within walking distance. If you don't want to take the car, you can go by bike or take a long walk along the promenade to the center of Malaga. El Candado also offers its residents a sports club with a 9-hole golf course, tennis, paddle, swimming pool, and its own marina, as well as popular public and private schools. Upon entering the door, you will find a large hall. On the same floor, there is a modern kitchen with a large dining room that can accommodate a large family, the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, and a large living room with a fireplace and a balcony with views of the mountains and the sea. On the first floor, there are two bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and a bathroom. On the top floor, there are two other bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and a bathroom. There is also a larger terrace overlooking the city of Malaga. The laundry room is also located here. The lower floor is a basement used as a warehouse, but there is the possibility of creating a separate apartment with its own entrance. Here, a larger bedroom, a bathroom, and a kitchen can be built. The house has spacious entertainment areas with different environments where you can sit and enjoy the Malaga mountain range, swim in a larger pool of 8x4 m or sunbathe in the large pool area. From the pool area, there are breathtaking views of the city of Malaga, the mountains, the port, and the sea. There is an outdoor billiard table and comfortable sofas to spend time with friends or watch a good movie and feel like you're in an open-air cinema. There is the possibility of a self-sufficient garden for those with green thumbs. Large garage with remote-controlled door that can be converted into space for two cars. Facade recently painted both exterior and interior - Q4 2022 Newly installed solar panels for a cheaper energy source - Q4 2022.

description: Welcome to the best views on the entire coast! The apartment is located in the community of "Mirador de Carvajal", on the border of Fuengirola and Benalmádena, which is located high up but at the same time close to the beach. From this terrace you get the best views of all of Fuengirola with the port and all the beaches. Here on the terrace there is a bar with bar stools to the left and to a seating area to the right where you can enjoy the fantastic views all day long. Directly from the entrance hall is the kitchen on the right and after that there is a bathroom. On the left side we find two bedrooms. A previous third bedroom was removed in favor of gaining a larger sitting room, this can of course be restored if you need to have three bedrooms. In the living room there is a bathroom for the guests. The apartment includes a large private double garage of 50 square meters with its own garage door. Today it is divided into an interior storage room and a garage space at the other end. Of course, this division can also be restored if you need two parking spaces. From the parking lot, it is easily up a flight of stairs with the elevator. In the community there are two pool areas and a paddle tennis court. A short distance away is the fantastic and popular restaurant "La Cubana" on the beach of Carvajal.

description: Beautifully renovated townhouse in the village of Moclinejo. The property consists of 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, 1 living-dining room-kitchen and a garage. Roof terrace with fabulous views of the surrounding countryside, of the village and of the sea.  One enters the property from the front door into a spacious and bright, open plan kitchen-living-dining room with double doors that open out on to a small balcony with enchanting views. To the left, is a door which opens into the master bedroom with en suite shower room. To the rear of the living room, a door leads out on to a small landing area, with stairs that lead down into the garage and up to the roof terrace. Heading upwards you will find the delightful roof terrace with wonderful views. Making it the perfect place to enjoy a meal with family or friends while enjoying the Spanish Al-Fresco lifestyle! Heading back towards the landing area the stairs also lead down into the garage. Which could easily be converted into more guest accommodation or even into an apartment to provide a rental income, because it also has it´s own independent access from the street below. Additionally there is parking space next to the garage, allowing you to be able to park right next to the property.  Location: Situated in the village of Moclinejo, a 20 minutes drive from the coast and only a 30 minutes drive to Malaga airport. A dream home in the heart of the village. Ideal for a someone who wishes to escape the hassle of everyday life either as a holiday home or even as a permanent residence!

It is a 408 m2 detached house built on a 1891 m2 plot, completely renovated in 2003. In addition, it includes an independent apartment of 50 m2 on two floors, completely renovated in wenge wood and stone. The house has five bedrooms, highlighting the 35 m2 master suite with a dressing room and large built-in wardrobes, and three full bathrooms. It has a large kitchen, pantry, laundry room, as well as a 390 m2 parking area, set up in 6 covered parking spaces, next to a 60 m2 building for storage. It also has installation of solar panels, oil heating boilers and is equipped with solar panels. Outside the property, you can enjoy three covered porches, an 11X5 m pool with a covered Chill out area, barbecue area, toilet and a 5 m2 wooden house for services for that area. In addition, the house has an office with a full bathroom and terrace, a loft and is equipped with a 24-hour security system. Its south orientation guarantees natural light throughout the day. The house is in an excellent state of conservation, in all concepts, and is only 200 meters from the highway, 900 meters from Pedregalejo beach, 5km away. from the historic center of Malaga and only 4 km. from the El Candado golf course (Málaga) just 15` from Malaga airport and 10 km. of Vialia. Strategically located a few minutes from Arroyo de la Miel, the interior of the house is accessed by crossing a small patio with a storage room. On the ground floor there is the open kitchen, with a window, fully equipped, and the living room with a working fireplace (never used), as well as a toilet. Through the dining room we can go to the terrace with access to the common garden areas and the pool area. On the upper floor are the two bedrooms, with fitted wardrobes, and the complete bathroom. All rooms are exterior, providing light to the house, which was completely renovated a few years ago. The community to which it belongs is a closed complex, with communal gardens and swimming pool, all in a perfect state of maintenance and conservation. Due to its good location, the house has supermarkets, educational centers, and hospitals a few meters away. There is also a golf course very close, ideal for those who practice this sport. description: This luxurious villa is located on a quiet and prestigious residential street and occupies one of the most privileged positions in La Capellania in Benalmadena and probably with one of the very best views on the entire Costa Del Sol, with an excellent natural setting including a private historic rock and a short distance to some of the world’s finest golf courses, local shops and shopping malls, restaurants, 10 minutes from Malaga airport, 25 minutes from the centre of Malaga, 25 minutes from Marbella, 5 minutes from the popular Benalmadena beach and 3 minutes from the main highway – without being able to see or hear the highway, making it one of the most perfectly located properties, if you wish to enjoy some of the most exciting places on the entire Costa Del Sol. This wonderful property was built in 2008 with 450 sqm of built living area plus terraces on a huge 2137 sqm plot. The villa has been recently renovated to meet the demands of modern living, while featuring a unique and luxurious charm. The elegant and contemporary design of the villa is enhanced by the natural light that floods it throughout the day, giving this property a wonderful sense of calm. The garden is spacious and laid out in such a way that there are plenty of areas for entertainment, as well as allowing a very high level of privacy. This property is also incredibly unique, thanks to its own private historic rock in the centre of the oldest urbanisation on the Costa Del Sol, and with a chill out terrace at the top, providing stunning and pure unobstructed 360 views of the sea, Fuengirola bay and mountains.

description: Just 100 meters from the beach, the homes enjoy stunning views over the sea to the horizon from their terraces and spacious glass-walled areas. The homes range from 70 to 190 sqm in size whose modern construction uses clean minimalist lines and a layout open to the light and outdoors. 90 contemporary homes with superior fittings and finishes, and the beach on your doorstep. 2 and 3 bedrooms with spacious terraces and glass walls offering stunning uninterrupted views of the sea. These are homes with lots of natural light, facing south and huge windows to bring the terraces and gardens inside the very home. Comfort and quality living start at the very creation of the living spaces. These homes have been designed to maximize enjoyment of the sea views – the living-dining areas and master bedroom in all properties face the sea with large floor-to-ceiling windows that run the length of the rooms and front terraces. Benalmádena and Torrequebrada boast more than 8km of coastline: some of it rocky with small bays and cliffs that form the start of the Sierra de Mijas mountains as they rise from the sea; others make up the 16 long fine sandy beaches, yours to enjoy at any time of the year. The quality of the materials and contemporary design of the space together with the attention to detail in the finishes and every aspect of the build have created a unique lifestyle in these homes that stand out in both quality and design. The residential development has spacious communal areas, beautiful gardens and manicured green areas that flow towards the sea. The exclusive area for all the family includes a solarium and pools for adults and children. All homes have a private indoor parking space and a large storage room.

description: Large Andalusian-style villa, with the best construction qualities, on a 1,500-meter plot and distributed over 3 floors with many rooms and rooms to enjoy the sea view! Main entrance with design bars, give access to an Andalusian patio that connects with the front door of the house as well as with a staircase that leads directly to the pool and gardens. A spacious distribution hall leads to the main dining room, where the view of the sea and the sun completely invade with their beauty. Marble floors, fireplace, air conditioning and access to a large terrace make the perfect space. The spacious kitchen to the right, with a daily dining room, has a vaulted skylight with colored glass that amazes the senses. Adjacent to the main living room is a large bedroom with sea views and a large office/study with a separate entrance, which can also be converted into a guest apartment as an example of the endless uses. Going down to the other floor are the 3 bedrooms, all with fitted wardrobes and carpets (with original marble underneath). Being one en-suite and with a dressing room, and a large bathroom with a luxury hydromassage bathtub. In the three bedrooms the beautiful view of the sea stands out. On the same floor there is a spacious living room with a library and comfortable sofas, and a dining room for 24 people at a table. A few steps down, the marvelous house with a large hobby room converted into the perfect bar: bar, taps, barrels, tables and piano, make it the ideal place to celebrate with family and friends. And from there you access the magical cellar with touches of collection and good taste. Another bedroom on the same floor with views. From there you can access the great garden and pool, jacuzzi and porch with amenities, and others see a great room or barbecue area to celebrate and accommodate many people around the barbecue, gas plates, oven, taps and tables, all the amenities and more. An impeccable and new Finnish sauna, practically unused, also outdoors. Unique, worth seeing and perceiving its magic and comfort like few villas in Benalmádena. description: Beautiful villa in Benalmádena Costa, with spectacular sea views, swimming pool and independent flat.  We access the property through a large parking area where we have enough space for 6 cars. The Andalusian style villa is distributed on one floor, on entering this beautiful and traditional villa we find an entrance hall that distributes the areas of the house. At the front we find the living room and the dining room, areas that are differentiated from each other by beautiful arches. The living room is spacious and has a beautiful fireplace and wonderful views to the incredible and spacious terrace. From the entrance hall to the right we have the bright kitchen and to the left we can find 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. One of the bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom and the other two share the other large and complete bathroom. The living room leads to the terrace from where you can see the coast, the sea, the mountains and Benalmádena Pueblo. The views are totally unobstructed. The swimming pool is accessed by stairs. In this area we have an outdoor kitchen area where we can enjoy a barbecue while we take a bath, sunbathe during most of the day or simply enjoy the views.  In this same area there is an enclosed area ready to be reformed and used as a totally independent flat.

description: Gilmar Real Estate offers this spectacular independent villa in the high area of Miraflores del Palo, belonging to the East district of the city of Malaga. Without a doubt, one of the best and most fascinating villas in Malaga city, with a majestic entrance hall and an impressive noble wood staircase in front and an elevator with access to all floors. The villa has an area of 2,148 square meters built, on a plot of 3,317 square meters. It has 6 bedrooms, 8 bathrooms, 2 toilets, large kitchen with dining room, 3 living rooms and 4 parking spaces. On the semi-basement floor there is a private gym with a heated indoor pool. Highlight the high qualities of the villa such as marble floors and jatoba noble wood, windows with thermal and acoustic insulation, electric shutters, security system and cellar. It enjoys great luminosity due to its south orientation and has impressive views of the entire Bay of Malaga. A unique villa located an incomparable location. Distribution: Basement: The semi-basement has a distributor hall, gym with covered pool, storage rooms and games room. It also has two bedrooms with bathrooms. It has access to the garden with swimming pool, Jacuzzi, picnic area and barbecue, for leisure or sports use. 600 square meters of office space and a parking area at the main entrance of 490 square meters. Ground Floor: It is located at the garden level and has a large hall with a large stately staircase. Distributed on the right it has a large main living room, elevator, and on the left, with a distributor corridor, it has a living room, kitchen, toilet and dining room. Accessing from the kitchen, you go out to the rear of the house, where there is a large 98 m2 porch, overlooking the garden and pool area. In the front area of the house, separate from it, we have a warehouse and garages. First Floor: It has three bedrooms, each with a dressing room, two bathrooms, an elevator and a hallway. Features: Interior carpentry: noble wood Exterior carpentry: climalit Heating: a / c cold - heat Jatoba wood floors Air conditioning Alarm 24 hour surveillance cameras Indoor and surface pool with waterfall Jacuzzi in your main bathroom.

Just 10 minutes from the beach on foot, the Historic Center of Malaga is 20 minutes away by car. The property, built in 2006, has very good qualities and excellent construction. It is in perfect condition, it is south facing and consists of 195m2 built and 173m2 useful.  It is distributed over four floors: Ground Floor: Spacious entrance hall, a comfortable and sunny living-dining room with access to the private garden with a relaxation area, a large independent kitchen fully furnished and equipped with all electrical appliances, and a complete bathroom that serves the rooms. First floor: consists of three bedrooms, the main bedroom facing south has excellent views of the sea and an en-suite bathroom that also has views of the sea thanks to the large window. From the bathtub, you can enjoy beautiful sunsets and Quetta with large built-in wardrobes lined with wood, the other two bedrooms also have built-in wardrobes lined with wood, and the second bathroom serves the rest of the bedrooms. Basement floor: It has a large room with exterior ventilation, and a complete bathroom. A very large storage room with built-in wardrobes, and a TV socket. Solarium floor: It is the perfect space where you can enjoy the magnificent south-facing terrace with sea views. The property has very good qualities. Among them, we highlight the installation of Hot / Cold air conditioning on two floors, double-glazed windows, and rustic stoneware floors from the Saloni brand of first quality. The common areas offer landscaped spaces and a swimming pool for community use, very sunny. The property has a covered parking space. It is an excellent property ideal for family use or as an investment. With a strategic location, a 10-minute walk from the beautiful beaches in the area, close to schools, public transport, shops, and restaurants, and with all kinds of amenities at your fingertips. Energy Certificates are in process. In compliance with the RD of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of 11 October, we inform consumers that the price indicated does not include the costs derived from the purchase of the property according to the laws in force (ITP, notary fees and in the case of new construction the VAT tax). For more information, do not hesitate to contact us. We will be happy to assist you.

description: Gilmar Consulting Inmobiliario sells this beautiful house 300 meters from the sea in Cala del Moral. It is a very unique plot of 840 square meters, divided into three different levels in which we find two houses that function as independent. It has two entrances with their corresponding garages. There is a staircase that divides the house on the upper floor with that of the middle and lower floors. The total number of meters built amounts to 445 square meters. At street level we find the house above that consists of 3 bedrooms and two bathrooms, with an independent kitchen and a very spacious living room with fireplace and terrace (closed), with unobstructed views of the sea. Going down the stairs we find the other house that has another three bedrooms, two bathrooms, an independent kitchen and a large living room with a fireplace and a terrace with beautiful views. On this floor, outside we have a barbecue area, a laundry room and a small warehouse. The last floor, which in turn is the lowest, is quite open. It is a very large space in which we find a large barbecue area, an orchard with different plants, vegetables and fruit trees and two booths that currently have no use. In this house, its possibilities stand out since it has many meters, its lower area where you can even install a pool, or its location since it is in a very beautiful area of La Cala del Moral with all its services practically on foot.

description: Gilmar Real Estate sells this beautiful semi-detached Villa located in the East area of Malaga, in Lomas de San Anton, in a privileged enclave overlooking the sea and the bay of Malaga.   The property is divided into four different levels: At street level is the entrance through the garage of large dimensions with capacity for up to 5 vehicles, from it we have access to the house.  The garage was reconverted to create a room that can be used as a study with its own independent bathroom.  On the same floor there are two storage rooms of about 8 square metres and a third smaller storage room. On the first floor we find a toilet, a complete kitchen of 16 square meters, which is independent and has an outside terrace with laundry and storage room. Adjoining the kitchen is a dining room, a beautiful living room with fireplace and a 76 square metre terrace ideal for taking advantage of the great climate that Malaga offers and excellent sea views.  On the first floor we finde the bedrooms, they are two and of great size, one of them with dressing room and bathroom en suite. There is also an additional bathroom. The corridor has been used to make the most of the space by installing built-in wardrobes. From this floor there is access to the communal areas of the urbanization, where we find gardens for children to play and a communal swimming pool with good views. Above the first floor we have the attic, which great ventilation with a window. It has the pre-installation to put a bathroom in this room. This room is of a large size, ideal for a playroom, or the perfect room for young people.

description: Gilmar Consulting Inmobiliario exclusively sells this magnificent semi-detached house of 297m2 built, in a privileged area of Málaga-Este, Parque Clavero bajo.This area, next to the Limonar, stands out for its green areas, modernity and group of villas and residential buildings, being undoubtedly the most exclusive in the capital of the Costa del Sol.Unlike other high standing residential areas in major cities, both El Limonar and Parque Clavero are not far from the urban center of Malaga, which allows their residents to enjoy tranquility without sacrificing time when it comes to traveling to the areas of leisure and business in the city, as well as enjoying the proximity to the beach, just a 5-minute walk away. Located in a small, exclusive luxury development of only 15 chalets that share gardens and a saltwater pool, in a private and intimate setting. Wonderful views of the Bay and the Castle of Santa Catalina. Equipped with hot and cold air conditioning through ducts in all rooms and with a 500-liter accumulator tank for domestic hot water powered by city gas. The house is divided into four different levels: When accessing from the street, we find a small garden area at the entrance to the beautiful and pleasant house. On this main floor, a spacious hall gives access to a courtesy toilet, the kitchen with a covered utility room that adjoins a large living room with a fireplace and access to its huge terrace of more than 100 m2 with a grassy area and a covered porch. to enjoy the beautiful Costa del Sol climate both in winter and summer. On the first floor is the master bedroom, with a private terrace, a dressing room with built-in wardrobes and a complete bathroom en suite.On this same level there are two other bedrooms with their corresponding built-in wardrobes and a complete bathroom. The second level has a large solarium terrace with artificial grass, and an attic studio with a full bathroom and a huge office area.This level is ideal for professionals having an office inside the home, or for young people as a playroom-living room or seeking independence inside their home. The semi-basement floor has a guest room with paneled wardrobes and a complete bathroom en suite.In addition two storage rooms.From this floor there is access to the community garage that is shared with five other neighbors, the two spaces closest to its access door corresponding to ownership of this house. In summary, the 297 m2 built house, apart from the garden, living room, kitchen, etc., has five bedrooms and four complete bathrooms and a courtesy toilet. The house is in an optimal state of conservation, highlighting the high quality of the materials used in its construction. The fee to be paid for the community of owners expenses is very low, amounting to €84/month.

description: Gilmar Consulting Real Estate sells this impressive home located in the heart of the Historic Center of Malaga, in the Plaza del Obispo itself and in front of the Malaga Cathedral and the Episcopal Palace, the beginning of Molina Lario street, the most privileged location in the city .The origin of this square dates back to the Muslim era, but it was in its last period, the 20th century, when it was reformed, renovating some of its buildings, such as the one that houses this house in question.This emblematic place has been the scene of feature films imitating a square in colonial Peru, there is no better example of how wonderful it is.We are very close from this location to the most recognized sites in the city, Roman Theater, Pablo Ruiz Picasso and Thyssen Museums, Pier One and Malagueta Beach, we can go to them perfectly a few meters walking. This building was built at the end of the nineties, 1998, by a renowned prestigious construction company, it has a garage with direct access by elevator, 2 spaces, as well as large common areas for the hall, ramps for access for people with reduced mobility. and physical porter. The house occupies 2 floors of the building in a corner format and with 10 balconies to the same square with direct views of the cathedral, its staircase and main entrance, it is about two registered properties linked together, occupying a total built area of 330 between them. square meters, occupying part of the 3rd and 4th floors of the building.It is distributed in a very large living room with a surface area of close to 70 square meters, this room is on the corner of the Plaza del Obispo and originally had a 25-meter terrace that was incorporated into the house, the area of dining room with 4 large balconies also facing the square and with a surface area of close to 40 square meters; the kitchen is furnished with access from another of the entrances to the house as a service; As for the 5 bedrooms that it has, all of them except one have their own bathroom en suite, there are 4 bathrooms plus a courtesy toilet, all of enormous proportions, double and the main one has 2 dressing rooms and a rest area of 30 square meters. , also has a study area or office. The state of conservation is enviable, the house has been treated with great care and its materials are of the highest quality.It is a unique home, due to its location within the city, due to the state of the farm, due to its own characteristics in terms of surface area and quality, and because it allows us to enjoy much more than a home in terms of comfort and well-being. description: Gilmar Real Estate sales this magnificent property of very original architecture, designed in a cosy and functional format, located in Pinares de San Antón, a quiet urbanization, with security service and minibus transport. The property is located in the middle of the forest, in the middle of nature, although not far from the city with all kinds of services at hand. The property is distributed over two floors and has two doors, one main door and one service door, one door leads to the very spacious kitchen. The main door leads to a large entrance hall, the main feature of which is two concrete pillars, accompanying the staircase down to the ground floor. From the hallway, with a built-in wardrobe, you enter the kitchen and the guest toilet, the living room and also the living room (with fireplace) from which you enter the dining room. There are three communicated but independent spaces, for greater comfort. The living room could be converted into fourth bedroom. The staircase leads to the lower floor, where there are three bedrooms, each with en-suite bathroom, two of them with dressing room and one with built-in wardrobe. There is also a large storage room and a storage space under the staircase. All rooms in the house are spacious and have two or three windows. The floors in the kitchen and the three bathrooms on the lower floor are tiled in marble. The rest of the areas have has wooden floors. To enjoy the exterior there are four terraces, the spacious entrance area, the pool area and the entire garden. Outside the Villa there is a large salt water swimming pool with a sliding and folding cover so that it can be kept closed and used as a heated pool, also preventing leaves or dirt from getting inside. The temperature of the property is enviable being immersed in the pine trees, it is cool during the warmer months and pleasant during the winter. There is a parking area for at least two cars. description: Gilmar Consulting Real Estate sells this beautiful Villa in one of the most exclusive areas of Malaga, Pinares de San Antón. It is a magnificent option if what you are looking for is calm, tranquility and above all privacy. The Villa is divided into two totally independent dwellings but which, in turn, are internally connected by a staircase. On the entrance floor of the house we find an entrance hall, a large fully equipped kitchen-dining room with an exit door to the outside, a laundry room, a pantry and a renovated bathroom. In it there is a large bright living room and a large covered terrace. On the upper floor we have the bedrooms, an interior terrace with views and two bathrooms. Four double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, one of them, the main one, has a parador with beautiful views and a recently renovated en-suite bathroom. The upstairs house is very spacious in itself, it is elegant and bright in all its rooms since it is totally exterior. In the lower part of the chalet we have the other house. Here we appreciate three rooms, two bedrooms and one that is used as a dressing room and a large living room with a fireplace. As well as a completely renovated bathroom that has been implanted with an exit door to the outside to facilitate access from the pool area. It has a fully equipped independent kitchen. If we mentioned that the upper part was elegant, this lower part of the house has a more rustic style. The exterior of the house is like an oasis of tranquility, we can find two fountains and a very large garden area with trees. In the lower area of the house we have a covered chillout area with a barbecue and a large swimming pool to enjoy the beautiful summer days and the great climate of the city. At the entrance to the farm we have a large storage room of 30 square meters with the possibility of using it as a parking lot with an entrance right from the street. 13 solar panels have been installed. In addition, it has automatic irrigation, air conditioning and heating. It is located within a private luxury development, Pinares de San Antón. Its proximity to the motorway allows us to reach Malaga in just 15 minutes.  Very close to the neighborhoods of El Limonar, Cerrado de Calderón and Pedregalejo.

The master bedroom also has a comfortable dressing room with access to a loft with a terrace and south-facing views. From the entrance hall, we find a nice skylight that connects with nature thanks to a magnificent central tree that reaches both floors. There is also access to a living room, a guest bathroom and an office kitchen with laundry room and separate exit, as well as a large living room on two levels with direct access, through large windows, to the garden area of the house. In the basement we find another independent apartment, with a spacious living room, a bedroom with dressing room and complete bathroom, as well as storage area, storeroom and a large garage. The property is very well communicated with easy access to the motorway, only ten minutes from the Technological Park, the beach and with double communication both from the access from Churriana and from the access from the area of Cártama, only 10 minutes from the International Airport of Málaga, Plaza Mayor Shopping Centre, Golf Courses, Guadalmar Beach and fifteen minutes from the centre of Málaga and the University area. The outside area has a garage area, consolidated garden and a wonderful swimming pool with barbecue.  Quiet environment, ideal for families or people looking to live in a residential area with all kinds of services, from international schools, supermarkets and all kinds of services for a good quality of life. DISTRIBUTION: Basement: 163,95 m2 Ground Floor: 167,75 m2 First Floor: 84,51 m2 Features: Interior carpentry: wood Exterior carpentry: pvc Heating: a/c hot/cold Air conditioning Swimming pool Barbecue Garden  Large garage for 4 cars At Gilmar Real Estate we have been working to offer our clients the best properties for 37 years. Call us and we will help you find the house of your dreams. The best investment options to make your money profitable.

At present, and also in the past, it has been considered one of the most commercial streets in Malaga, its surroundings are full of outstanding sites of the city such as "La Tribuna de los Pobres" staircase known for being the ideal place to contemplate the Processions of Holy Week, San Felipe Neri Church, Wine Museum, Valdeflores Palace as well as remains of the Arab wall, we can walk a few minutes to all the important places in the Center, Calle Larios, Malaga Cathedral, Roman Theater, Alcazaba.. . In a building that is in a perfect state of conservation, completely rehabilitated in 2008, and that has 7 homes, this property is located on the ground floor, facing a street that has no vehicle traffic and hardly any people, it is The road where it is located is very quiet. The house has a constructed area of 50 square meters, open-plan, with open spaces and has a living area, dining-office area, furnished American kitchen, bedroom with a queen-size bed, full bathroom with shower, and a patio area. -terrace. The property is currently oriented to vacation rentals, it has its corresponding license, which gives it a special attraction for those interested in acquiring a property for investment with great profitability. description: A truly stunning apartment in the luxury development ‘Las Nereidas’, Los Alamos, Torremolinos, on the beachfront, overlooking the sea. The property is located on the 3rd floor and is fully furnished and decorated in a modern and minimalist style by the renowned interior designer ‘Albaida’, Marbella. Constructed to the highest standard with large format Porcelanosa flooring and large floor to ceiling windows that allow to take advantage of natural light. It has 3 bedrooms with sea views, the master with en-suite bathroom and dressing room. Individual room control underfloor heating and aerothermal air-conditioning throughout the property, and suspended sanitaryware. This is a resale property which has never been lived in, therefore the property, appliances and furniture are in new condition.  The fully equipped Gunni & Trentino kitchen included integrated Bosch appliances and wine-cooler, with a design that integrates seamlessly with the spacious living / dining room. From here you can access the wraparound 140 m2 terrace and private pool, where you can enjoy the sunshine throughout the entire day. The communal areas include 24 hour security, several outdoor pools, indoor heated pool, sauna, Turkish bath, multipurpose room, fully equipped gym and jogging circuit; all in an environment of extensive gardens on the beachfront. The property includes 2 private underground parking places and one storage room. In addition to the excellent location on the wide sandy beach of Los Alamos (where you will find numerous exclusive chiringuitos (beach restaurants)) the gated community has very good communications with the main services in one of the most emerging areas of the Costa del Sol. Less than five minutes walking distance from Los Alamos train station, and very close to the Plaza Mayor Shopping Center, Parador Malaga Golf Club and the vibrant city of Malaga.

Apartment for sale in Malaga. 131m², The house has an entrance, distributor hall, living room with access to the terrace with beautiful views of the sea and mountains, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (one of them en suite), fitted kitchen with utility room. The house has built-in wardrobes, white lacquered wooden doors, split air conditioning in the living room and in the bedrooms. It has 2 parking spaces. It is located on the seafront, next to the port of Malaga, surrounded and close to all kinds of services and shops, an unbeatable location. description: UNBEATABLE LOCATION. SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE IN URB WITH POOL IN CHURRIANA TRESOL Inmobiliaria sells EXCLUSIVELY semi-detached house surrounded by all kinds of services on foot, Mercadona, Health Center, sports center, schools, bus stops, schools, etc. A house with an excellent location and at the same time in a quiet street with no traffic and no neighbors in front, in an urbanization with a garden and swimming pool. On a 172 m2 plot, the 130m2 house built on 2 floors is distributed in: living room, kitchen, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 1 toilet. It has a parking area, a terrace at the entrance and a backyard. EXTERIORS: At the entrance a pleasant terrace, on the right a covered parking area and access to the semi-basement-storage room. Ideal for summer dining room and recreation area for the little ones. MAIN FLOOR: Living room, kitchen and toilet. The living room is very bright, measures approx 27m2 and has a nice fireplace. The kitchen, also very bright, has space for an office. It is furnished and equipped with electrical appliances and has direct access to the patio, the perfect tandem for organizing family meals in the patio with the support of the kitchen next door. In addition, on this floor, a toilet with a window. UPPER FLOOR: 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. All bedrooms are bright. The main one has an en-suite bathroom. Two other very spacious bedrooms and the 4th that the owners currently use as an office.
