description: INDEPENDENT CHALET IN URB. MIRAFLORES DEL PALO (EAST AREA MÁLAGA). Comfortable house in impeccable general condition, it is distributed over two floors and has a total built area of 345 m². On the main floor with South West Orientation, we find a spacious living room with fireplace and exit to a pleasant porch that surrounds the entire house and a pleasant recently built pool with a large barbecue area perfect for family gatherings or with friends. On the same main floor, we have a spacious and complete Kitchen with a peninsula, fully equipped and with access to the aforementioned Barbecue and pool area, a complete comfort! The same floor has a toilet and a laundry area with a washer and dryer. On the upper floor, we have 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms; The master bedroom of about 30 m² with views, has a complete dressing room from the firm "Carre Hulsta" with all kinds of details and a large outdoor bathroom with shower and hydromassage bathtub. Everything in impeccable condition! The house has a very large 110 m² garage in the basement, perfect for celebrations or all kinds of hobbies, such as mechanics (it has workbenches), restoration, collecting, or any type of hobbies. The same ground floor has a toilet and a large storage room. The house is equipped with air conditioning through a recently renovated duct, a boiler for hot water and heating throughout the house and a security system assisted by Prosegur. The property has an apartment with an independent entrance, of approximately 35 m² and which is fully equipped and furnished with a kitchen, electrical appliances, small living room, bedroom and bathroom. It is perfect for guests or even to rent it independently from the main house. Fully consolidated area with all kinds of services in its surroundings, such as Mercadona, pharmacy and shops within walking distance. Very well connected to the beaches, the city center and the highway. >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> In compliance with the Decree of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of October 11, we inform that the Property Transfer Tax and Notary and Registry expenses regulated by tariff are not included in the price. description: Gilmar Real Estate has the privilege of presenting 107 Los Almendrales in Limonar Alto, a very modern development of 46 homes located in one of the most desirable areas in recent times in the city of Malaga. Residencial 107 Los Almendrales is located with easy access to the highway and quick communication with the Sancha promenade. This complex is characterized by an avant-garde design, a magnificent southeast orientation in all its homes and a memory of qualities that will make you enjoy the comfort of living in a home designed for your enjoyment. We propose a housing project in a single block with two stair cores, garage and storage room with 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedroom homes. The main bedrooms are en-suite with large living rooms and terraces. In addition, we have homes on higher floors that can be enjoyed in your private garden and enjoy a swimming pool and a solarium that are located on the second floor and that gives you a perspective of the most private area. The kitchens are delivered fully furnished, tiled and cladded toilets in all the homes in finishes from the prestigious Porcelanosa brand, fully installed ducted air conditioning, exterior carpentry with thermal break and efficient construction quality.

description: VILLA ON A 2.564M2 PLOT WITH GUEST HOUSE IN URB.ALHAURIN PINES. TRESOL Inmobiliaria offers this independent VILLA for sale in the upper area of the Urbanization Pinos de Alhaurín, surrounded by nature and with excellent views of the mountains. description: LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION! VILLA ON A SINGLE FLOOR ONE STEP FROM THE MAIN AVENUE. THE MAIN HOUSE.From the hall we enter the living-dining room to the right, in front of the kitchen and to the left to the bedroom area. The kitchen is also a great size with plenty of room for a dining table.It has a large pantry, is fully furnished and equipped with electrical appliances and has access to the backyard where there is a large laundry room. All bedrooms are very spacious and bright with fitted wardrobes.The main one with a dressing room and bathroom en suite.One of them is currently used as a living room and office.In addition there is another complete exterior bathroom and a guest toilet. GUEST HOUSE.The guest house has a spacious living room with an open equipped kitchen, 3 large bedrooms with very large wardrobes and a bathroom. description: BEAUTIFUL INDEPENDENT VILLA WITH SOUTH FACING LOCATED IN THE URB PLATERO TRESOL Inmobiliaria sells bright independent villa in one of the best areas of Alhaurín de la Torre. On a plot of 790 m2, a wonderful house with two floors and a basement of 400 m2 that are distributed in: MAIN FLOOR: Kitchen, living room, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom and interior patio. Upon entering the house we find a hall that to its right leads to a full exterior bathroom and to its left a bedroom with a built-in wardrobe.This bedroom is followed by an interior patio space that gives a touch of nature to the interior of the house. Facing the hall we find two completely independent rooms such as the kitchen, furnished and equipped with appliances and a very spacious living-dining room with a fireplace that has direct access through a large window to a porch and the pool. UPPER FLOOR: 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and terrace. We access the upper floor through some beautiful stairs, giving way to the right to the main bedroom of the house, entering through a large dressing room until we reach the bedroom with access to the outside and views of the pool. To the right of the stairs we also find another bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and an exit to the outside. On the left we have 1 quite spacious and bright exterior bathroom, which is followed by 1 bedroom with built-in wardrobe and exit to the outside. SEMI-BASEMENT: Living room, 1 bedroom, 1 small dressing area and 1 bathroom. Very spacious living room from which to the left we access 1 bedroom with a small dressing room and 1 bathroom with shower. To the right of the living room a very large storage room. OUTSIDE: Swimming pool, terraces, built-in barbecue, porch, surface parking area and covered parking for one vehicle. Quite ample porch and terraces with views of a fantastic pool, it has a built-in barbecue at the back of the house, and parking for several vehicles. DETAILS: - Wooden windows - Background music - Basement adapted for living - Solar panels - Fireplace - Air conditioning in 3 bedrooms, living room and kitchen - Heating in semi-basement bathroom - No community fees - IBI: €1000 approximately - South orientation For more information, do not hesitate to contact us, we will be happy to assist you.SKU: 1761 Phone.: 952 410 333.WhatsApp and Tel.mobile: 662 922 851 (In compliance with the RD of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of 11 October,clients that the prices indicated do not include the expenses derived from the purchase of real estate according to the laws in force: notary fees, registry fees, ITP etc.) The exposed data is merely informative and has no contractual value, the offer is subject to errors, changes in price, availability and/or withdrawal from the market without prior notice.

description: Modern penthouse with stunning panoramic and frontal sea views. The property is located in the area of Montealto, in Benalmádena, an ideal area for those looking for a property in an area with a lot of tranquillity, but close to all the necessary services. It also has easy access to the motorway. The residential has beautiful gardens and communal swimming pool. The penthouse consists of 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen open to the living-dining room with a living area of 72 m2 plus a terrace on the same level of 15,40 m2. On the upper floor, accessible by a private staircase located on the terrace, we find a solarium of 71,15 m2 to enjoy the spectacular view on a sunny afternoon on the sun loungers. At the back of the solarium there is a glazed dining room with barbecue as well as a large space with fridge and place to store outdoor furniture. The property is tastefully furnished and decorated to a very high standard, with top quality Italian furniture, and has been upgraded with various improvements such as heaters in the bathrooms, 150l water boiler with anti-scale system, Miele washing machine and dryer, electric roller blinds in the living room for sun protection, fully domotic, pergola with awning on the terrace, etc. You won't find another property with more quality than this one! In addition to all this, 2 large parking spaces and a storage room are included in the sale price. It is worth visiting this beautiful property that has it all!

description: Mane Residences is an exclusive private urbanization located in a privileged place in Benalmádena. Due to its elevated location, each of its houses offers incredible views of the sea and the coast. The staggered arrangement facing the Mediterranean Sea of Mane Residences allows each and every one of the 49 homes and 2 townhouses to enjoy always bright rooms, thanks to natural light. The Costa del Sol, with its great variety of landscapes from the sea to the mountains, has been for decades one of the favorite areas for visitors from all over the world for tourism or place of residence. Benalmádena is a cosmopolitan city that looks out over the sea from its Marina, an international reference for sailing and leisure, or from the shores of its 9 kilometers of coastline and its 17 beaches, its strategic location and communication with Málaga capital, make it a one of the most coveted locations on the Costa del Sol. Mane Residences is located just 1 km from the Xanit Hospital in Benalmádena. Within a radius of 3 km you will find the Torrequebrada golf course, the international school, Selwo Marina, the public park of La Paloma and the old town. The inclination of the land allows you to enjoy stepped homes where their large terraces gain prominence with their glass railings that seem to merge directly with the sea in front and allow maximum use of the views and the spectacular sunlight. In the surroundings of the plot there is an excellent supply of all kinds of services, medical, educational, sports and commercial. Among them we highlight, Benalmadena Golf with its familiar and relaxed atmosphere, the Vithas Xanit International Hospital with its wide range of medical specialties, the Novaschool Benalmandena private school and the Municipal Sports Center of Benalmadena Pueblo. The promotion has convenient access to the A7 motorway, connection to the main arteries in the area and communication to the main public transport routes.

description: VISIT SHOW HOUSE Turnkey homes, directly to move into. The Cortijo del Conde Urbanization is located in Chilches Costa, one of the most privileged enclaves on the Costa del Sol (one step away from Rincón de la Victoria). The building is located on a plot of more than 21,000 m2, 200 m from the beach, 25 minutes from Malaga, 30 minutes from the airport, with direct access to the N-340 and A7 roads and very close to shopping centers and of golf courses. It is an avant-garde design project, perfectly adapted to the natural environment, made up of 54 semi-detached houses with 4 bedrooms (one of them on the ground floor), 3 full bathrooms and a fitted kitchen.It is distributed in blocks of 20 units and the first phase, with a building permit, will begin to be built immediately. All the houses have large landscaped plots, terraces, private parking and basement – cellar.The complex is endowed with excellent common areas with swimming pools, private gardens, social club, paddle tennis court, sports court and solarium. Residential complex located in an unbeatable environment.High quality materials, optimal use of space, bright houses and warm interiors, will give privacy, tranquility and quality of life to you and your family. Chilches is a town in the municipality of Vélez Málaga that borders Rincón de la Victoria, towards the city of Málaga, close to the N-340.The town is at a distance of 18 km.from Málaga capital, connected by the Autovía del Mediterráneo. It is worth noting its Church of the Immaculate Conception, built in the 17th century, located in the Plaza de la Constitución.And the Chilches Tower, a 16th century Watchtower, located next to CN 340, protected under decree of April 22, 1949 as a Generic Declaration, and special recognition as a Castle in 1993 by the Junta de Andalucía.

description: VISIT SHOW HOUSE Turnkey homes, directly to move into. The Cortijo del Conde Urbanization is located in Chilches Costa, one of the most privileged enclaves on the Costa del Sol (one step away from Rincón de la Victoria). The building is located on a plot of more than 21,000 m2, 200 m from the beach, 25 minutes from Malaga, 30 minutes from the airport, with direct access to the N-340 and A7 roads and very close to shopping centers and of golf courses. It is an avant-garde design project, perfectly adapted to the natural environment, made up of 54 semi-detached houses with 4 bedrooms (one of them on the ground floor), 3 full bathrooms and a fitted kitchen.It is distributed in blocks of 20 units and the first phase, with a building permit, will begin to be built immediately. All the houses have large landscaped plots, terraces, private parking and basement – cellar.The complex is endowed with excellent common areas with swimming pools, private gardens, social club, paddle tennis court, sports court and solarium. Residential complex located in an unbeatable environment.High quality materials, optimal use of space, bright houses and warm interiors, will give privacy, tranquility and quality of life to you and your family. Chilches is a town in the municipality of Vélez Málaga that borders Rincón de la Victoria, towards the city of Málaga, close to the N-340.The town is at a distance of 18 km.from Málaga capital, connected by the Autovía del Mediterráneo. It is worth noting its Church of the Immaculate Conception, built in the 17th century, located in the Plaza de la Constitución.And the Chilches Tower, a 16th century Watchtower, located next to CN 340, protected under decree of April 22, 1949 as a Generic Declaration, and special recognition as a Castle in 1993 by the Junta de Andalucía.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Chilches
suggestedTexts.title: Semi-detached house in Calle Los Cedros  no number

description: LGI puts at your disposal this great purchase opportunity, do not let it escape, visit it to be able to value it. Great house FULLY RENOVATED, ideal to move into. It consists of 2 very well distributed bedrooms with their built-in wardrobes, 1 fully equipped bathroom, well distributed and bright living room, terrace, full kitchen, interior doors in good condition, reinforced exterior door, swimming pool, garden area, etc. Visit it without obligation! You can call us or contact us by WhatsApp. We are an agency specialized in the sale of real estate in Malaga with more than 22 years of experience. We also help you get financing, do not hesitate to contact us. In compliance with the decree of the Junta de Andalucía 2182005 of October 11, the client is informed that notary, registry, ITP, real estate brokerage expenses are not included in the price We will be happy to assist you personally at C/ Héroe de Sostoa, 192 (corner of Av de la Paloma). Customer service schedule: Monday to Friday from 10:00 a. m. to 2:00 p. m. and from 5:00 p. m. to 8:00 p. m. Saturdays from 10:00 a. m. to 2:00 p. m. (by appointment). If this home is not what you are looking for, contact us and we will do a totally personalized search, adapting to your needs without obligation. Lucía Gestión Inmobiliaria S. L.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Parque de la Paloma, Benalmádena
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida de Bonanza

description: BEAUTIFUL MATA HOUSE IN LA BARRIADA DE HUELIN Very close to all types of transport, taxi, numerous bus lines, METRO (Stop EL TORCAL) and 15 minutes from the VICTORIA KENT TRAIN stop. Promenade 8 minutes walk and one step away from the Automobile Museum and the Russian Museum. Nearby you can find all kinds of shops, supermarkets, pharmacies, health center, playgrounds, sports areas. A very comfortable place to live with everything you might need within reach, which greatly facilitates the day to day of the person who buys and values how he deserves this home and its location. Visit it without obligation! In compliance with the decree of the Junta de Andalucia 2182005 of October 11, the client is informed that the costs of notary, registry, itp, real estate brokerage fees, are not included in the price. The consumer who requests it has the right to be given a copy of the abbreviated document of this property. We will be happy to assist you in C / Héroe de Sostoa, 192 (corner with Avd. of the Dove). Customer service schedule: Monday to Friday: 10.00 to 14.00 and 17.00 to 20.30. We also open on Saturdays from 10am. 00 to 14.00. PREVIOUS APPOINTMENT.

description: Spacious penthouse in Los Alamos-Playamar steps from the beach and panoramic views of the beach, mountains, gardens, entrance hall, large living room with window to terrace, a second window to a covered terrace, ideal as a winter terrace, has access to another large terrace with views of the beach, from this terrace we have a staircase that gives access to a 30-meter solarium terrace with open views and the beach, fully equipped kitchen with utility room, 4 bedrooms with wardrobes, the main one en suite, 2 full bathrooms All the rooms have access to a terrace, in the corridors there are two large closets, the garage and storage room in the basement, the urbanization has gardens and a swimming pool, it is steps away from all services, the beach, the commuter train, golf courses, Plaza Mayor shopping center.  We inform consumers that the following expenses are not included in the indicated price: ITP (Property Transfer Tax), Notary, Registration, as well as any other expense inherent to the sale.

suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle Carlos Cano

description: Mane Residences is an exclusive private urbanization located in a privileged place in Benalmádena. Due to its elevated location, each of its houses offers incredible views of the sea and the coast. The staggered arrangement facing the Mediterranean Sea of Mane Residences allows each and every one of the 49 homes and 2 townhouses to enjoy always bright rooms, thanks to natural light. The Costa del Sol, with its great variety of landscapes from the sea to the mountains, has been for decades one of the favorite areas for visitors from all over the world for tourism or place of residence. Benalmádena is a cosmopolitan city that looks out over the sea from its Marina, an international reference for sailing and leisure, or from the shores of its 9 kilometers of coastline and its 17 beaches, its strategic location and communication with Málaga capital, make it a one of the most coveted locations on the Costa del Sol. Mane Residences is located just 1 km from the Xanit Hospital in Benalmádena. Within a radius of 3 km you will find the Torrequebrada golf course, the international school, Selwo Marina, the public park of La Paloma and the old town. The inclination of the land allows you to enjoy stepped homes where their large terraces gain prominence with their glass railings that seem to merge directly with the sea in front and allow maximum use of the views and the spectacular sunlight. In the surroundings of the plot there is an excellent supply of all kinds of services, medical, educational, sports and commercial. Among them we highlight, Benalmadena Golf with its familiar and relaxed atmosphere, the Vithas Xanit International Hospital with its wide range of medical specialties, the Novaschool Benalmandena private school and the Municipal Sports Center of Benalmadena Pueblo. The promotion has convenient access to the A7 motorway, connection to the main arteries in the area and communication to the main public transport routes.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Montealto, Benalmádena
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida Rocas Blancas 14 Bl 8, Esc. 1, 1

description: Magnificent apartment in the historic center of Malaga in the Plaza de la Constitución. 108m² located on the top floor of the building, completely renovated and distributed in a large dining room, very spacious with 3 balconies that overlook the Plaza de La Constitución. ; independent equipped kitchen, utility room, 4 bedrooms, one of them with bathroom en suite, 2 bathrooms, 1 toilet. The large living room has 3 spacious, very spacious balconies that fully overlook the Plaza de La Constitución, enjoying unobstructed views and surrounded by the most emblematic buildings of Malaga in the historic center of the city. The house is located next to Calle Larios, surrounded by all services as well as transportation, everything is at hand. It is an ideal apartment for both residence and investment. IT IS AN IMPRESSIVE APARTMENT, DO NOT LET YOU VISIT IT! We inform consumers that the following expenses are not included in the indicated price: ITP (Property Transfer Tax), Notary, Registry, as well as any other expense inherent to the sale.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Centro Histórico, Málaga
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Plaza de la Constitución

address: Calle Doctor Gustavo GarcÍa Herrera Teboul
description: Spectacular penthouse with sea views in Playamar with 280m² distributed over two floors: the ground floor of 150m², large hall, large living room of 62m², with windows on all walls and access to the spacious terrace of 30m², independent fitted kitchen, laundry room, two double bedrooms, the master bedroom with bathroom en suite and large dressing room, second full bathroom, both bathrooms with window. ; first floor 130m² distributed in living room with stove, full kitchen with storage room, 3 bedrooms with velux windows, 2 full bathrooms, from the living room there is access to a 21m² terrace with artificial grass and views. The whole house has fitted wardrobes in the rooms and air conditioning. The ceilings on the first floor are high. The entrance hall gives the possibility of having a 5-bedroom penthouse with two living rooms, two kitchens, 4 bathrooms and two terraces or two houses with separate entrances, with the ground floor having 2 bedrooms and the first floor with 3 bedrooms. The house has an elevator inside to access the upper floor if you do not want or cannot use the access stairs. The house includes two parking spaces and a storage room. The house is located in a closed area, surrounded by gardens and has a swimming pool. It is located a few meters from the beach, and is located in an area with all services at hand, pharmacies, department stores, supermarkets, all types of business, bars, restaurants, etc. IT IS AN IDEAL HOME TO RESIDE ALL YEAR ROUND AND ALSO AS AN INVESTMENT, DUE TO ITS CHARACTERISTIC OF BEING ABLE TO BECOME TWO INDEPENDENT HOMES! REQUEST YOUR VISIT! We inform consumers that the following expenses are not included in the indicated price: ITP (Property Transfer Tax), Notary, Registry, as well as any other expense inherent to the sale.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Playamar - Benyamina, Torremolinos
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle Doctor Gustavo GarcÍa Herrera Teboul

description: Urbea Gestión Inmobiliaria gives you the opportunity to live in an exclusive property on the beachfront with frontal views of the sea in the stately area of La Malagueta, just 10 meters from the beach and in a charming place within the historic center of Málaga Capital, Surrounded by all services. The property is strategically located on the beachfront in the stately area of La Malagueta, next to several landmarks in the city such as the Gran Hotel Miramar, the Plaza de Toros, Muelle Uno, the Alcazaba and the beautiful courtyards of the Gibralfaro Castle, among others. Due to its location, it has a wide range of restaurants, culture and leisure, in addition to being just a short walk from the Historic Center and it should be noted how excellently it is connected by public transport with the rest of the city. It is a totally exterior corner house on the top floor, which makes it more interesting due to noise issues and allows most of the rooms to have spectacular views. The house has a constructed area of 180 square meters and 160 m2 useful with wide corridors and high ceilings, it has 5 bedrooms, two bathrooms, separate kitchen with pantry and clothesline-laundry area that connects directly from the entrance to the kitchen and a large living room with terrace and spectacular views of the sea. Both from the lounge area and terrace, as well as from four of the bedrooms, you can enjoy the best of this home, its incomparable views of the entire Malagueta Beach, without a doubt the most special and differentiating feature of this home. The apartment is to be reformed, it has a parking space in a closed and unassigned area and two large storage rooms. The building is from the 1950s, with its magnificent high ceilings and thick walls. The block has been rehabilitated and updated, so that new elements such as the video intercom or a modern elevator are now integrated. Do not miss this opportunity because you think you cannot buy it, for that URBEA GESTIÓN INMOBILIARIA will advise you free of charge to be able to obtain the best market conditions in mortgage loans. Decree Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of October 11, customers are informed that notarial, registration, administrative expenses, taxes (ITP ADJ or VAT), brokerage fees and other expenses inherent to the purchase, do not are included in the price. Royal Decree 235/2013, of April 5, which approves the Basic procedure for the certification of the energy efficiency of homes and buildings.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Malagueta - Monte Sancha, Málaga
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Gutenberg

description: Mane Residences is an exclusive private urbanization located in a privileged place in Benalmádena. Due to its elevated location, each of its houses offers incredible views of the sea and the coast. The staggered arrangement facing the Mediterranean Sea of Mane Residences allows each and every one of the 49 homes and 2 townhouses to enjoy always bright rooms, thanks to natural light. The Costa del Sol, with its great variety of landscapes from the sea to the mountains, has been for decades one of the favorite areas for visitors from all over the world for tourism or place of residence. Benalmádena is a cosmopolitan city that looks out over the sea from its Marina, an international reference for sailing and leisure, or from the shores of its 9 kilometers of coastline and its 17 beaches, its strategic location and communication with Málaga capital, make it a one of the most coveted locations on the Costa del Sol. Mane Residences is located just 1 km from the Xanit Hospital in Benalmádena. Within a radius of 3 km you will find the Torrequebrada golf course, the international school, Selwo Marina, the public park of La Paloma and the old town. The inclination of the land allows you to enjoy stepped homes where their large terraces gain prominence with their glass railings that seem to merge directly with the sea in front and allow maximum use of the views and the spectacular sunlight. In the surroundings of the plot there is an excellent supply of all kinds of services, medical, educational, sports and commercial. Among them we highlight, Benalmadena Golf with its familiar and relaxed atmosphere, the Vithas Xanit International Hospital with its wide range of medical specialties, the Novaschool Benalmandena private school and the Municipal Sports Center of Benalmadena Pueblo. The promotion has convenient access to the A7 motorway, connection to the main arteries in the area and communication to the main public transport routes.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Montealto, Benalmádena
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida Rocas Blancas 14 Bl 8, Esc. 1, 1

address: Calle Doctor Gustavo GarcÍa Herrera Teboul
description: Spectacular penthouse with sea views in Playamar with 280m² distributed over two floors: the ground floor of 150m², large hall, large living room of 62m², with windows on all walls and access to the spacious terrace of 30m², independent fitted kitchen, laundry room, two double bedrooms, the master bedroom with bathroom en suite and large dressing room, second full bathroom, both bathrooms with window. ; first floor 130m² distributed in living room with stove, full kitchen with storage room, 3 bedrooms with velux windows, 2 full bathrooms, from the living room there is access to a 21m² terrace with artificial grass and views. The whole house has fitted wardrobes in the rooms and air conditioning. The ceilings on the first floor are high. The entrance hall gives the possibility of having a 5-bedroom penthouse with two living rooms, two kitchens, 4 bathrooms and two terraces or two houses with separate entrances, with the ground floor having 2 bedrooms and the first floor with 3 bedrooms. The house has an elevator inside to access the upper floor if you do not want or cannot use the access stairs. The house includes two parking spaces and a storage room. The house is located in a closed area, surrounded by gardens and has a swimming pool. It is located a few meters from the beach, and is located in an area with all services at hand, pharmacies, department stores, supermarkets, all types of business, bars, restaurants, etc. IT IS AN IDEAL HOME TO RESIDE ALL YEAR ROUND AND ALSO AS AN INVESTMENT, DUE TO ITS CHARACTERISTIC OF BEING ABLE TO BECOME TWO INDEPENDENT HOMES! REQUEST YOUR VISIT! We inform consumers that the following expenses are not included in the indicated price: ITP (Property Transfer Tax), Notary, Registry, as well as any other expense inherent to the sale.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Playamar - Benyamina, Torremolinos
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle Doctor Gustavo GarcÍa Herrera Teboul

description: 96 homes with 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms with magnificent terraces, penthouses with a solarium and ground floor apartments with a sun terrace, where the outside world enters through the large windows. All the homes have a magnificent terrace, up to 200 m2, where you can feel, throughout the year, the wonderful climate of the city of Malaga. Homes reinforced by the best qualities: aerothermal air conditioning, double laminated plasterboard, wardrobes dressed with textile finishing, fully equipped kitchens, fully tiled bathrooms.. . They also have a storage room and garage space, with pre-installation for charging electric car, and option to a second place, for greater comfort. At La Reserva de El Limonar we are committed to enhancing the natural environment with its generous common areas: a large open space with manicured gardens and a swimming pool with an overflowing waterfall of salt water, a multipurpose room with an equipped gym, where you can complement your healthy lifestyle, and gastroteca, which will facilitate social gatherings. The El Limonar Reserve has a high energy rating, so that you not only contribute to caring for the environment, but also benefit from the advantages of doing so, thanks to the use of quality construction materials and thermal comfort systems, such as aerothermal energy, which contribute to energy savings. Located on Avenida Arrigo Boito 1, in Las Colinas del Limonar, in the eastern part of the capital of the Costa del Sol. A privileged location next to the exclusive and noble villas of El Limonar and the prestigious residential area of El Mayorazgo. An enclave that allows you, without giving up nature, to enjoy all the services: schools that cover all educational stages, health centers, supermarkets, gastronomic, cultural spaces and, very soon, the El Mayorazgo Shopping Center. Its exceptional situation is also highlighted by its proximity to the lively urban center of the city, the leisure and business area of Malaga, and La Malagueta beach. With a bus stop a few meters away, to communicate with the city, and connected to the outside of it due to its easy and quick access to the A-7 motorway and the AVE station, just 12 minutes away by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Limonar, Málaga
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida Arrigo Boito, 1

description: Beautiful apartment in one of the best Urbanization of Torremolinos. Magnificent apartment in Torremolinos distributed in a very bright living-dining room with access to a terrace, 2 spacious bedrooms, kitchen with access to the laundry room, 2 bathrooms. The Olas de Procusan Residential complex with a private area It has a communal area with a garden, swimming pool and children's area. . The price includes 2 large parking spaces and a storage room 15 minutes by car from the Center of Malaga and surrounded by all kinds of services.

description: SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE IN MIRAFLORES ALTO, EL PALO, MALAGA WOULD YOU LIKE TO HAVE MALAGA AT YOUR FEET? REDPISO SELLS a wonderful villa WITH BEAUTIFUL VIEWS TO THE SEA AND MÁLAGA! In a very quiet area, is this great couplet, ready to move into. This house has 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, 1 toilet, fitted kitchen, living room, 1 terrace, 1 porch, 1 patio, garage spaces, storage room, solarium, solar panels, community pools, paddle tennis court and children's areas. On the GROUND FLOOR you find a spacious, bright living room with a cozy fireplace and incredible views of the sea and a large part of Malaga, 1 toilet and 1 beautiful fully furnished kitchen with access to a 5 m² side terrace. From this floor you can access a large 18m² terrace and a 75m² patio. On the FIRST FLOOR, 3 wonderful bedrooms await us, all with built-in wardrobes, and the main one with access to a terrace with sea views and 1 complete bathroom en suite with a hydromassage Jacuzzi and shower tray. On the LAST FLOOR / PENTHOUSE we have access to a 10 m² solarium with amazing views of the sea and the possibility of making an extra room on this floor. On the BASEMENT FLOOR we access a large 30 m² parking area with an automatic gate and 1 large 40 m² storage room. High Quality Property in excellent condition facing South, East and West. Central hot-cold air conditioning with individual control per room. Solar panels. Basic Home Automation. Electric shutters. It has a 264 m² plot, 280m² built (220m² useful). I rediscover the confidence of working with the leader. You can find us at Calle Alonso Carrillo de Albornoz 7, (in front of the Municipal Market) Málaga. Telephone contact Redpiso-DCredit's own FINANCIAL DEPARTMENT: our financial department will be able to advise you FREE of charge on all financing options, thanks to agreements with financial entities, depending on your employment and economic situation, having many more economic options. FINANCING UP TO 100%. According to the Royal Decree of 218/2005 of October 11, the prices offered do not include taxes (Property Transfer Tax), notary and registration expenses related to the purchase and sale, or the brokerage commission paid by the buyer.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Pinares de San Antón, Málaga
suggestedTexts.title: Semi-detached house in Calle Antón Chéjov

description: INFINITY BLUE by Carpe Homes BUILDING PERMIT OBTAINED FEBRUARY 2023, WORK STARTED Can you imagine living in the heart of the Costa del Sol, enjoying the Mediterranean climate, surrounded by nature and with panoramic sea views? INFINITY BLUE offers you that possibility, thanks to the exceptional location between Benalmádena Pueblo and the sea Mediterranean, combining the tradition of the Andalusian people with the modernity of its coastal area with its renowned marina, its extensive beaches and its wonderful gastronomy. The houses are all south facing with Exceptional panoramic views where the blue of the sky blends with the blue of the sea. INFINITY BLUE has 19 spacious and exclusive homes, with 3 or 4 bedrooms, all of them designed to improve your quality of life, thanks to the optimal distribution of its spaces, functionality, brightness and quality of materials of construction that are going to be used, highlighting its large terraces. In addition, each home has 2 parking spaces. garage. In INFINITY BLUE, avant-garde architecture virtually eliminates any division between interior and exterior. to be able to embrace the horizon. In addition, it offers a wide variety of community spaces designed for your well-being. The complex has a saltwater infinity pool, a gym equipped with state-of-the-art machines, sauna with changing rooms and shower and a chill out area with pergola outside. INFINITY BLUE is the ideal option for those looking for a high standing home, a high level of comfort and impressive views without abandoning having all the shops and services in the area nearby.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Montealto, Benalmádena
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle teide no number

description: Available for sale, 523m2 urban land with two houses next to Santa Rosalía-Maqueda. Located in the neighborhood of El Pilarejo, very close to all the services and shops necessary in our day to day. Paved road to the door, a few minutes by car you are in the urban center, and 5 minutes from the access to the highway and 15 minutes from Malaga capital. An excellent opportunity since the sale price includes two independent houses and an urban land with the possibility of building more buildings, expanding or modifying. The 523m2 plot has a parking area for three vehicles, a large entrance patio for both properties, another backyard that has a laundry room and access to a piece of land of approximately 30m2 intended for a vegetable garden. The first house is on the entire ground floor, which consists of 42m2 built distributed in a spacious living room with a kitchenette, a good-sized master bedroom and a bathroom with a bathtub. The second house, next to the first, has 50m2 built and two floors. The ground floor has a spacious living room with an open concept kitchen, a bedroom and a complete bathroom with a bathtub and a shower tray. The upper floor (currently not connected to the lower floor) with a large room and access to a wonderful terrace with views of the area. You want to know more? We will be happy to help you choose the best option for you. If you want to ask any questions we are at your disposal. NOVAhome Real Estate. We finance up to 100%. More information on our website: Office at calle José Calderón, nº 236, Campanillas (Málaga). 952 437 565. In compliance with the Decree of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of October 11, the client is informed that notary, registry, ITP, real estate brokerage and other expenses inherent to the purchase are not included in the price.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Estación, Cártama
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: The house has terraces on three levels with views of the entire bay of Malaga. From the living room there is access to a first terrace from which you descend directly to the large covered terrace on the ground floor that also has a barbecue and kitchen with stove and sink. From there you descend to another level where you will find the third terrace with a wooden hut and plants. The price does not include purchase and sale expenses (Itp, Registry and Notary), it does include professional fees.

description: Spectacular apartment in the Churriana area with 198 m², with spectacular views of the sea and overlooking Malaga. The variety of Churriana is a very exclusive area because it has all the shops, just 15 minutes from the center of Malaga and a few minutes from the beach, with different types of bus lines at street level, with different types of super markets at street level, with banks in the area, bakery at street level, with playground, both in front of the building and in the residences, library a few steps away, health center, leisure area, shopping center, with wide Community pool and a large common area. The apartment consists of a large terrace, a large living room with large windows and lots of light, a main room with an en-suite bathroom, three rooms with plenty of light and windows, a large kitchen with a pantry and large windows, with a separate laundry room, a Common bathroom, it is a third with access to the elevator, it is digital and very modern, with all the potential to live like in paradise, with all the comforts in the world.   We have a mortgage financing department. "In compliance with the decree of the Junta de Andalucía 218-2005 of October 11, customers are informed that notary, registry and I. T. P. expenses are included in the price. We remind you that as a consumer you have the right to be informed and deliver the corresponding informative documentation, as the case may be, based on the provisions of Decree 218/05 of October 11 that regulates the Regulation of Consumer Information in the purchase, sale and lease of homes in Andalusia.

The house is located in the town of Benalmadena and has an area of one hundred and eighty square meters on two floors and is distributed in an entrance hall, living room with fireplace, separate kitchen with access to the plot, separate dining room, bedroom or office and a fourth bathroom with shower tray. On the upper floor we find three bedrooms, one of them with access to a solarium terrace with sea views, a hall and a bathroom with a bathtub. The house is located on a plot of approximately six hundred square meters, with a swimming pool. We also find a private parking space and office. description: Do you want to live in an exclusive penthouse with spectacular views of the sea in Malaga? Do not look any further! This property in Torre de Benagalbón has everything you need. The first thing you will notice when you arrive at this penthouse is that you can enter directly from the elevator, which gives you great privacy and comfort. Upon entering, you will find a spacious and bright space that invites you to relax and enjoy the panoramic views of the sea from every corner of the penthouse. This property features three large bedrooms and two full bathrooms, making it perfect for families or those looking for extra space for visitors. In addition, the living room is spacious and has large windows that provide plenty of natural light at all hours of the day and spectacular views. There is also a lot of outdoor space on the terraces and solarium, where you can enjoy your relaxing moments while contemplating the beauty of the sea. The luxury urbanization in which this penthouse is located has five swimming pools, which gives you the opportunity to enjoy the sun and the water at any time of the day. In addition, the property includes two parking spaces and two storage rooms, so that you have enough space to store bicycles and other belongings. This is a unique and exclusive property in the best location, perfect for those most demanding buyers looking to have the best of the best. Don't miss the opportunity to make your dream of living in a penthouse with sea views in Torre de Benagalbón come true. Do not hesitate to come and visit it. REF. DCC0069.

description: This luxurious house is a true masterpiece, featuring a covered surface area of approximately 355 m², with ample space to accommodate all your needs. The main house has 2 bedrooms, each with en-suite bathrooms, and there are an additional 2 bedrooms for service staff and guests.  The main bedroom is particularly impressive, boasting a spacious dressing room and bathroom with lavish amenities such as a hydromassage bathtub, shower cubicle, and sauna. The villa also has 2 fully equipped kitchens, a magnificent living room with a cosy fireplace, and special spaces such as a billiard and games room with its own fireplace or a heated indoor pool (which is currently used as a gym).  This villa is a true testament to luxury living, with many comforts and details that make it stand out from the rest. It is equipped with a lift for easy access to all floors, air conditioning to keep you comfortable throughout the year, and automated blinds that can be controlled with a touch of a button. The walnut root carpentry and Arabesque marble floors with friezes add to its opulent appeal. For added security, there is surveillance equipment installed throughout the property, and there is a garage for several vehicles with direct access from the lift.  If the interior of the house is impressive, the outdoor areas are equally breathtaking. The property is surrounded by a stunning garden with towering trees that are over 4 decades old. The garden also features porches, marble benches, and a stately balustrade that enhances its grandeur. A saltwater pool adds to the outdoor oasis, from which you can enjoy the breathtaking city views. With all these features and more, this house is truly a dream come true.  Please contact us for further information and to arrange a viewing.

description: Apartment on the beachfront, in the Castillo de Santa Clara Building, located between Carihuela beach and Bajondillo beach, with an unbeatable location, next to the sea, a step away from the center and on the Torremolinos promenade. The building has full accessibility: -The entrance door to the building is automatic opening, -There are 2 elevators to access the apartment -There is 1 panoramic elevator to the level of the promenade The building has a concierge and 24-hour surveillance, a room for community use with WI-FI, covered parking, an accessible pool with a ramp, a children's pool, a private tennis court, a bar-restaurant, a garden area and a solarium with umbrellas and sun loungers. The 122 m2 house is totally exterior and has just been renovated in every detail. It has a large terrace (30 m2) with frontal views of the sea and Carihuela beach. It has a double orientation to the south-east and to the west, achieving with its distribution that all the rooms are exterior and have direct access to the terrace. Large windows have been installed both in the living room and in the bedrooms that allow natural light to enter throughout the day. It consists of 2 large bedrooms, both with en-suite bathrooms, a courtesy toilet and a kitchen open to the living room. Each bedroom has a custom-made wardrobe, with folding doors and a large chest of drawers. Both bathrooms have XXL-size shower trays, with rain-effect taps, natural stone washbasin cabinets and embedded lighting. The kitchen is fully furnished, made to measure and equipped with lighting under the wall units. It has been equipped with all the integrated appliances: Refrigerator, washing machine, dishwasher, microwave oven, designer extractor hood, ceramic hob and wine cellar. The house has bamboo wooden floors, custom-made pivot doors to access the bedrooms, a ducted air conditioning system that distributes hot/cold air in each room. All the electrical and plumbing installation in new. Furniture valued at €23,250. In compliance with the Decree of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of October 11, we inform that the Property Transfer Tax and the Notary and Registry expenses regulated by tariff are not included in the price. If agency fees are included.

It has a very spacious kitchen with a good outdoor laundry room, it is fully equipped and included in the price of the house, as is some of its furniture. Without a doubt, its terrace is a great attraction, we all know after the pandemic what meaning and use we know how to give to an outdoor space with so much light and sun, and when we want shade we will have the large awning to achieve it. The house is in perfect condition. The urbanization has a very quiet and safe enclosed area, it has large common areas, gardens and a swimming pool enjoying many hours of sun and light. The price includes a parking space with direct access to the house by elevator. It is surrounded by a wide commercial offer with numerous services: shops of a wide variety, shops, restaurants, supermarkets, shopping centers, etc. Remember, we are only 200 meters from the beach and promenade. description: 96 homes with 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms with magnificent terraces, penthouses with a solarium and ground floor apartments with a sun terrace, where the outside world enters through the large windows. All the homes have a magnificent terrace, up to 200 m2, where you can feel, throughout the year, the wonderful climate of the city of Malaga. Homes reinforced by the best qualities: aerothermal air conditioning, double laminated plasterboard, wardrobes dressed with textile finishing, fully equipped kitchens, fully tiled bathrooms.. . They also have a storage room and garage space, with pre-installation for charging electric car, and option to a second place, for greater comfort. At La Reserva de El Limonar we are committed to enhancing the natural environment with its generous common areas: a large open space with manicured gardens and a swimming pool with an overflowing waterfall of salt water, a multipurpose room with an equipped gym, where you can complement your healthy lifestyle, and gastroteca, which will facilitate social gatherings. The El Limonar Reserve has a high energy rating, so that you not only contribute to caring for the environment, but also benefit from the advantages of doing so, thanks to the use of quality construction materials and thermal comfort systems, such as aerothermal energy, which contribute to energy savings. Located on Avenida Arrigo Boito 1, in Las Colinas del Limonar, in the eastern part of the capital of the Costa del Sol. A privileged location next to the exclusive and noble villas of El Limonar and the prestigious residential area of El Mayorazgo. An enclave that allows you, without giving up nature, to enjoy all the services: schools that cover all educational stages, health centers, supermarkets, gastronomic, cultural spaces and, very soon, the El Mayorazgo Shopping Center. Its exceptional situation is also highlighted by its proximity to the lively urban center of the city, the leisure and business area of Malaga, and La Malagueta beach. With a bus stop a few meters away, to communicate with the city, and connected to the outside of it due to its easy and quick access to the A-7 motorway and the AVE station, just 12 minutes away by car.

description: Nueva Hilera is the new Avantespacia promotion in the urban centre of Malaga. 40 exclusive homes consisting of 1 and 2 bedrooms with parking and optional storage room in a modern designed architectural building which reflects new trends, including a pleasant central space community. A true haven of peace to enjoy every day, in a perfectly consolidated environment, well communicated and connected. A wise choice for living or investing in Malaga. Nueva Hilera offers a privileged location, in the heart of the city and close to the historic centre, with its pedestrian streets full of charm and dominated by the Alcazaba, a medieval Moorish citadel built on ancient roman ruins. Next to Marqués de Larios Street, known for its select shops in 19th century buildings or the Plaza of the Constitution, full of restaurants and terraces. Nueva Hilera is located at number 13 Peso de la Harina street and enjoys direct access to the Corte Inglés through Don Cristian Street. Close to the AVE train station and with good connections to any point of the city the location is ideal, especially when combined with the close proximity of Malaga airport known as the Gateway to the Sun.

description: Farm with house built in 2019 and restored in 2020. For lovers of living in the countryside who want to feel free and with total autonomy, this property offers us the possibility of having our own garden. Abundant orange, lemon, avocado, grapefruit, date and other fruit trees. It has 1403 square meters of fully fenced plot and with entrance for motorized vehicles. Parking inside the property covered for one vehicle and uncovered for four more. The house completely renovated with modern and quality materials, we will have a kitchen furnished with enough furniture to store, a large sink with a special hotel kitchen-type faucet. The house consists of a large living room and kitchen open to the living room, we also have a wrought iron fireplace and hot-cold air conditioning. Full bathroom decorated vintage, with a large shower tray and a cabinet with a designer sink and a designer faucet. Three bedrooms, the main one with a dressing room. All the bedrooms are exterior with large, sunny windows, and that allow having a clean and ventilated resting place. The property has a large pool plot with a treatment plant and chill out area, barbecue and covered and closed porch. It is located next to one of the most emblematic golf courses on the Costa del Sol (Lauro Golf) and close to a restaurant. In Alhaurin de la Torre. The property is sold fully furnished and with all electrical appliances, practically all brand new. Wood floors and tiles. Doors lacquered in white. Large walk-in closet with two closets. Designer sink and faucet in the bathroom. Large sink and hotel kitchen tap. Air conditioning and wrought iron fireplace. Before deciding to buy, visit this property, we are sure that it is what you are looking for. description: CLAROSAN REAL ESTATE GROUP exclusively sells this large country house with mountain views, with a 3,200 square meter plot with fruit trees and an orchard. The villa has a north-south orientation, with a cool environment in summer and warm in winter. The tranquility of living in nature, with the advantage of being close to the city center (just 10 min) and all its services. The villa has two buildings separated by a patio. The first building houses a laundry room, an equipped kitchen next to a dining room with a fireplace and a shed for supplies and tools. The second building has the house, arranged on two floors. On the first floor we will find, from the entrance hall, a kitchen with a very large dining room, a 40-meter living room with a fireplace, three large bedrooms and two bathrooms (one of them en suite). On the second floor we have three large bedrooms, a living room with a terrace with views of the mountains and a bathroom. Due to the breadth of the plot, it has parking space for several vehicles. Great space for both family and friends to socialize, ideal for a rural hotel or any activity that requires a large space both in the home and in the open air. description: We are pleased to present you this spectacular property on the beachfront and the port, in the wonderful Puerto Marina of Benalmádena. This exclusive property, located in a privileged enclave, is distributed as follows: Modern open plan kitchen with an island, integrated into an impressive very spacious and warm living-dining room, thanks to the light it has, and from which you can access its comfortable west-facing terrace, with views of the beach and /or the bay of Benalmádena, where you can sit down to eat, chat or have a cocktail, enjoying the Mediterranean. As we enter the house, we enter the corridor, where we find a full bathroom, a double bedroom with built-in wardrobes and access to another terrace, facing east and with impressive views of the Puerto Marina dock, giving the feeling of being on top of the water. Continuing the tour of the property, we arrive at the master bedroom, very large, with a very spacious bathroom en suite, and also with access to the eastern terrace. Included in the price are a large and sought-after garage space, and a storage room. The building has an infinity pool on the roof of the building, which gives the sensation of merging with the Mediterranean Sea, and which is kept open and heated to 28º every day of the year. The community also has a concierge, maintenance, private security and the port itself 365 days a year, which make it a safe and secure place. In Puerto Marina we have a large number of businesses, restaurants, leisure areas, supermarkets, parks, beaches, and all kinds of amenities and facilities. Just like we can find it throughout the municipality of Benalmádena, a town of tourist interest, located 10 minutes from the airport, 15 minutes from Malaga capital or 30 minutes from Marbella. Do not hesitate to contact us if you have any doubts, questions or wish to arrange a visit.

suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house in Calle Manuel Rivera Vera , 21

description: DID YOU THINK YOU WOULD NOT FIND IT? WHAT WOULD BE IMPOSSIBLE TO FIND A HOME TO LIVE IN THE COUNTRYSIDE, VERY CLOSE TO THE HIGHWAY EXIT, JUST 10 MINUTES FROM THE CENTER OF MALAGA, AND A FUNCTIONAL AND SELF-SUSTAINABLE HOUSE WITH GREEN ENERGY? You are in luck because we have worked hard for you, and we already have it available to visit. It is a villa with 4,100 m2 of flat land like the palm of your hand, fully fenced with an automatic main gate and another access to the back of the plot. With a main house on two floors of 246 m2 with access to two porches facing east and west, and a third terrace on the first floor with all the afternoon sun. Covered outdoor storage area of about 20 m2, covered outdoor parking for four vehicles and a field area where you can find fruit trees and a 5-meter-deep well that pumps irrigation water for the plants and trees. It is important that you know that this house is designed by its engineer owner who put all his wisdom and use everything in his power to make his house as functional and self-sustaining as possible. I am talking about solar panels on the roof of the house, the construction of the roof of the house with great insulation naturally, in such a way that you do not need to use air conditioning in the house, this makes the house have an excellent degree of thermal resistance both in summer and winter. Wastewater treatment and many more things that we will tell you during the visit to the property. It is a home of those that no longer remain, with a market study carried out so that you can buy at its fair price. We offer you financial advice so that the current situation of the banks is not a problem for the purchase of this house. If you are interested in visiting it, do not hesitate to call me, I will be happy to assist you at the Mary Rosa.

description: Grupo Torres sells this spectacular house, a home with class, which takes care of its construction in detail! Designed with the best qualities, both in its architecture and in the materials used (aged marble floor, double-glazed closures and frame with thermal break, thermal insulation by façade lining, etc. ), this house has 823 m2 of plot, in which there are 591 m2 built and garden, porch and pool areas. The constructed area distributes 310 m2 of living space, on a main floor with a hall and access to a living room, a kitchen, a bedroom and a bathroom, the upper floor contains four bedrooms, a bathroom and a large terrace common to all the rooms, a Through a staircase you access the roof area, where, as a patio, there is a solarium, the installation of Solar Thermal Energy and enough space for sunbathing. On the lower floor or basement, there is a spacious living room with a bar-style kitchen, living room, dining room and cellar, as well as a large room, a bathroom and a garage with a capacity of up to 4 cars. REF. JGG0022.

description: MODERN DETACHED VILLA IN XANIT-BENALMADENA In one of the best areas of Benalmádena and next to the Xanit International Hospital, we find this fantastic modern villa of recent construction. Built on three floors, and with a possible lift shaft, it has 4 bedrooms on the first floor, all of them with built-in wardrobes, and 2 bathrooms (1 en suite). On the ground floor, living-dining room, 1 guest bedroom with bathroom en suite, kitchen of 20m2 with first qualities. The basement has a flat which could be used as a guest or staff area. It could also be used as a games room-cinema, offices, consulting rooms,.. . It consists of kitchen and bathroom with shower cabin, surface area 80m2. Private swimming pool, garage for 4 cars and parking for at least 2 cars on the side of the house. Good qualities, rock sanitary ware, floor and Porcelanosa tiles in modern style and compatible with any type of decoration. Very quiet urbanisation with green areas, children's playground, beach at 7 minutes by car, near the golf course, 5 minutes from Arroyo de la Miel and Benalmádena Pueblo. Surrounded by schools, ideal for large families or professionals who want to have their business at home. In compliance with the Decree of the Junta de Andalucia 2182005 of the 11th of October, we inform the client that the notary, registry, ITP and other expenses inherent to the sale are not included in the price. The professional fees of the real estate agency are included in the price.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Montealto, Benalmádena
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Icaro no number

description: Now the opportunity that you have wanted so much has arrived, DO NOT LET IT ESCAPE! EXCLUSIVE HOUSING! Property located in the center of Malaga, in a building with character and with a perfect orientation to enjoy the sun of our beautiful capital of Malaga. This house we are talking about is located on the semi-attic floor and is distributed as follows: Entrance hall that will give way on the right hand side to a spacious living room with access to a sunny terrace with unobstructed views, and in front we find the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom (shower tray) and access to the same terrace as the living room. Next we will go to a corridor that will distribute the rest of the house. On the left side of the corridor we have a complete bathroom and a laundry room, and on the right hand side we will find a kitchen with a pantry, a double bedroom, another double bedroom and a room that could be triple, and that gives access to a very large terrace with wonderful unobstructed views in which you can enjoy the sunsets of Malaga in the center. On the terrace we will also find a good storage room that is perfect to be able to store everything that you have left over in the house. It should be noted that the house is built with very good qualities, there are only two neighbors per floor, there are multiple lined built-in wardrobes and that everything is exterior, which makes light another of the main factors that push you when it comes to purchase this property. The building also has a concierge and good access for people with disabilities. Let's NOT forget another of the super important extras to take into account when you live in the center of a city, its own large parking space. COMPLETE AVAILABILITY FOR VISITS. Possibility of redistributing the house to convert it back into a five-bedroom.

Nice house of 230 m2 distributed on three floors with 4 bedrooms. It consists of basement, ground floor and first floor. Its backyard for barbecues and its sunny porch will delight you. The basement consists of a large room and a storage room.  The first floor consists of toilet, hall, kitchen and living room.  Upstairs consists of 3 bedrooms, two bathrooms, one of them en suite. Front porch and parking space  Auxiliary building for bicycles and motorcycle  Backyard of 30 m2 with barbecue  Fully furnished and equipped kitchen  Living room with fireplace  Porcelain tile floor  Air conditioning in living room and master bedroom  Fitted closets in bedrooms  Wooden doors  No community fees  VIvienda totally exterior with lots of light  Surrounded by nature and all kinds of services Next to the Technology Park of Andalucia  ***ASK FOR AN APPOINTMENT WITH YOUR IAD AGENT FROM MONDAY TO SATURDAY***.  ***DO YOU NEED FINANCING? WE OFFER YOU THE BEST CONDITIONS FOR YOUR MORTGAGE FROM THE HAND OF OUR PARTNER PROHIPOTECA******  AGENCY FEES INCLUDED, NOT INCLUDING EXPENSES DERIVED FROM THE SALE, NOTARY, REGISTRY AND TAXES*** ***SERVICE.

description: Fantastic semi-detached house for sale, located in the area known as Puerto de la Torre, with very good communications and consolidated services. It is distributed in different floors with different environments, depending on the floor. FLOOR 0: Entrance porch that gives access to the main door of the house, fully equipped independent kitchen, toilet, very spacious living room with fireplace, dining area and access to a 26-meter terrace. It has solar panels. FLOOR 1: We find three double bedrooms and a bathroom with a shower, bathtub and double sinks and a main room with a wonderful dressing room and access to a terrace with wonderful views. FLOOR 2: Leisure room of the house with access to the barbecue area, with enough space to put a pool and even a Chill out area, to enjoy events and family gatherings. This house has enough interior space to install a lift and thus adapt it to people with reduced mobility or various needs. Real possibility of getting more bedrooms to the house. An excellent option to combine the proximity to the city and the tranquility of a semi-detached house. It is located 10 km from "Playas de Málaga", 14 km from the golf course "Parador de Málaga Golf", 3 km from the city "Málaga Centro", 200 m from the supermarket "Multiples supermarkets", 14 km from the airport "Aeropuerto de Málaga - Costa del Sol AGP", 6 km from the train station "AVE train station - María Zambrano", 6 km from the bus station "Málaga bus station". FEES ARE INCLUDED IN THE PRICE In compliance with Decree 218/2005 of October 11 of the Junta de Andalucía, the client is informed that the notary, registry, I. T. P. and other expenses derived from the sale are not included in the sale price. If you want to visit this magnificent home, do not hesitate and call us, we will be happy to assist you! Also by WhatsApp Alice Do not miss this opportunity!

description: CLAROSAN REAL ESTATE GROUP sells a rustic house of 175 m² built on a 16,500-meter plot in Casabermeja, Málaga. Just 20 minutes from Malaga capital. The house consists of a cozy 34 m² living-dining room, with a fireplace, next to which is the kitchen and a small pantry for storage. On this same floor there are four bedrooms and two complete bathrooms with shower trays. This cozy house also has a 68m² attic that has a small toilet, this floor offers many possibilities to the house, since it can be arranged as a guest room, games or leisure room for the family or even set up an area for telework. It is worth noting the hermas windows, ceilings and wooden beams that the house has. In the outdoor area, the house has a fenced pool next to which is the barbecue area, where you can enjoy great moments of fun with family and friends, it also has ample parking spaces, fruit trees and an irrigation well. own, all this just a few minutes from the capital of Malaga, all of which makes this property an ideal place for both a first or second residence. description: BEAUTIFUL VILLA IN MONTE ALTO Distributed: 3 bedrooms, which includes a separate 2-bedroom apartment, located in Monte Alto de Benalmádena, with impressive unobstructed views of the sea, on clear days you can even enjoy the views of the mountains, the villa is distributed on one floor and accessed by a very spacious car park and terraced gardens, it is made up of 3 bedrooms, which share a large and complete bathroom, a main bathroom en suite, living room, dining room, hall and spacious kitchen. From the main living room, outfitted with a beautiful stone hearth, the floor-to-ceiling glass door provides incredible views of the sea, and access to the home's enormous outdoor terrace/garden. Below the outside living area, a very well maintained pool and outdoor kitchen area, also boasting amazing 270 degree views of the Benalmádena, Sierra and Pueblo coastline. Due to the position of the house, situated on a high elevation with totally unobstructed views, one can be sure that the views will be preserved, regardless of future developments in this very popular destination. Below the main villa, a second residence was built in the last decade and features a full kitchen, living room with panoramic ocean views, 2 additional bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The construction was built with reinforced support beams and piles, ensuring a truly solid foundation. That being said, any future expansion of the spaces above can be planned without additional support construction.

description: CLAROSAN REAL ESTATE GROUP sells 2 independent villas on the same plot in El Atabal (Puerto de la Torre), Málaga. The houses are divided as follows: The first house, built in 1995, has an area of 130 m² distributed in an entrance hall, a spacious living-dining room, a fully equipped independent kitchen, a closed 25 m² terrace currently used as an office area and the possibility of reopening or converting in an extra bedroom, in addition to two double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, a toilet and a complete bathroom with a bathtub en suite in the master bedroom. The second home built in 2010.It has an area of 140 m² distributed in an entrance hall, a spacious living-dining room with direct access to its 25 m² outdoor terrace and views of the pool and gardens of the house, a fully equipped and furnished independent kitchen, two double bedrooms with wardrobes built-in wood and two full bathrooms, one of them with happiness and the main one en suite with a bathtub. Both houses have an open garage area with capacity for 3 vehicles. As a point to highlight, there is the possibility of unifying both houses in a single property.In addition, they have marble floors, split air conditioning in living rooms and bedrooms, centralized hot water with electric water heater and solar panels. Both houses are located on a 1,120 m² plot with impressive unobstructed views of the city of Malaga, large garden areas and a freshwater pool. Located in El Atabal, a quiet urbanization with hardly any noise with 24-hour security and surrounded by vegetation.Close to schools, shops and bus stop.A few minutes from the area of Teatinos and Puerto de la Torre. Ideal to allocate to habitual residence, or for investment. Brokerage fees are not included in the price. If you want more information, call us and we will be happy to assist you. description: Welcome to paradise in Torremolinos! This charming apartment on the ninth floor of the Vistasol building offers you a unique life experience with spectacular views of the bay and the mountains of Malaga. Can you imagine waking up with the warm rays of the sun caressing your face and enjoying a delicious breakfast on the completely open terrace while contemplating incredible panoramic views? This apartment has 1 bedroom, a bathroom with a shower, a kitchen and a balcony, which makes it the ideal investment with high profitability, whether for tourist or long-term use. Its location in the center of Torremolinos offers you comfort and easy access to all the services you may need. Just 400 meters from the Renfe commuter station and the emblematic shopping center, you will have access to shops, restaurants, health centers and public transport at your doorstep. If you are looking for a resting place for your vacation, this apartment is perfect. Just 10 minutes from the famous Bajondillo beach, you can enjoy hours of pleasure and relaxation under the warm sun of southern Spain. Also, if your option is a vacation rental, your guests will find everything they need in this strategic location. Do not miss this opportunity to have your own dream corner in Torremolinos! Come visit this intimate apartment on the 9th floor of the Vistasol building and discover the dream life that awaits you. We are waiting for you with open arms to help you turn this property into your perfect investment! description: Designed with a contemporary layout and a generous internal space, this south-facing villa is built on 3 levels consisting of basement, ground floor, first floor and features, besides, a rooftop solarium. The ground floor comprises large open plan living area with dining room, modern fully-equipped kitchen with island and a guest toilet. The living area, with huge windows and double-height ceilings, opens out to the porch connected to the garden with a swimming pool. The first floor is reached by a staircase that leads to the sleeping area consisting of 3 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms. The master bedroom incorporates an ample walk-in closet. One of the bedrooms can be transformed into 2 bedrooms.  The basement hosts an extensive open plan living space that can serve for multiple purposes including games area, office and much more. There is also a bathroom with shower on this level.  Situated at the entrance of Torremolinos and only 5 minutes’ drive from Malaga international airport, the property enjoys excellent communications and proximity of diverse restaurants, commercial centres and a wide range of other amenities. The beach is just a 15-minute stroll away.

description: ! Available now! If you are looking for a spacious and beautiful house in a quiet and picturesque location, then this property is ideal for you.This two-story house is located in a gated community in Torrequebrada, on the coast of the province of Malaga, in Spain. The urbanization itself is old-style, with cobbled streets and beautiful gardens, giving it a sense of tranquility and elegance.The property has two bedrooms and two bathrooms, making it perfect for a couple or a small family. On the first floor is a spacious living room with large windows offering stunning panoramic views of the golf courses, mountains, sea and nearby forests.The living room is connected to a private enclosed terrace where you can enjoy a cup of coffee or dinner al fresco.There is also a modern and fully equipped kitchen on this level. On the second floor are the two bedrooms and the two bathrooms, which offer plenty of space and comfort.Both bedrooms have fitted wardrobes and large windows with panoramic views.The main room also has an en-suite bathroom and a small private terrace. The garden of the house has been carefully designed to be an ideal space for barbecues and enjoying life in the open air.In addition, the urbanization has a community pool, so you can enjoy the sun and cool off on the hottest days. The property also comes with two private garage spaces, meaning you won't have to worry about finding street parking.And if you're interested in golf, you'll be happy to know that the home is located near several world-class golf courses. In short, this two-story home is an impressive property in an enviable location.If you are looking for a house on the coast of Malaga with lots of space, comfort and stunning views, look no further!

description: In the heart of the Sierra de Mijas as it passes through Alhaurín de la Torre and two minutes from the Sierra de Jarapalos, 15 minutes from Malaga Airport and shopping centers, is this incredible house with a unique style and exclusive finish. Whoever is living in this wonderful Scandinavian-style single-family house, built with imported wood from Iceland, will enjoy all the comforts of living on the Costa del Sol without the pressure of big cities and the typical hustle and bustle of these, since it is located in a natural environment surrounded by mountains, fruit trees, and only 15 minutes from the Mediterranean Sea. The structure of the main house is on two levels, on the first floor we find a living room, dining room and open kitchen, two spacious and bright bedrooms, a large bathroom, and stairs that lead us to the upper floor where A spacious and beautiful attic with bathroom has been designed, used as a room, play area, storage and from which you can access a fantastic balcony with impressive views of the mountains. Outside the house, we can enjoy two terraces: A large main terrace with dining room, living room, games area, which leads directly to a recently built kitchen and barbecue, gardens and swimming pool. The second terrace invites us to rest, enjoy the landscape and from which we can access a second beautiful wooden house with a bathroom currently used as a guest house. The image of the global design of the house is reaffirmed in a 5000 mtr2 plot, in a privileged environment planted with fruit trees, orange, lemon, avocado, mandarin, grapefruit, pacimos, cherimoyas, olive trees and a vegetable garden. Other features: -Mosquito nets on all windows. -Transparent side porch awnings. -Barbecue area with water tap. -Covered parking for 3 cars. -Storage area. -Darkness blinds in living room and attic. -Wooden shutters in the rooms. -Cold air and heat in the rooms. -Natural parquet floor. -Folding security bars. -Solid wood kitchen cabinets. -Own cistern -Automatic irrigation throughout the land.

description: Five-bedroom Villa with separate guest apartment near Málaga This traditional charming villa, located in the popular community of Puerto de la Torre, a short walk from a selection of shops, bars and restaurants is perfect for those seeking a private and secluded property within easy reach to the centre of Málaga. The entrance of the plot is set just off the curb, grand in appearance with mature vegetation offering shade and privacy. As the gates open, a sloped driveway leads down to the main courtyard where you will find ample parking for several cars, car port and a spacious garage and storeroom. The courtyard has retractable sunshades spanning the front of the property. A lovely feature here is the retaining wall with the blooming Bougainvillea.  The villa is distributed over two levels, with an independent one-bedroom apartment. As you enter the main part of the property, you are immediately welcomed by a traditional arch with Greek style columns and traditional Spanish covings. To the right is a good-sized kitchen diner, with pantry and direct access to the terrace, a perfect spot for alfresco dining. To the left a guest WC/Utility room. Directly ahead, you are drawn into a bright and spacious living space, with open fireplace and lovely views above the canopy of trees that surround this community. From the living room you access the internal hallway. Here you will find three double bedrooms, family bathroom and a master suite with an impressive en-suite bathroom which includes its own plunge pool.  Downstairs with its own independent entrance is the guest accommodation. A spacious open plan living space with fully fitted kitchen, bathroom and bedroom. There is scope to re-configure this space into a three-bedroom apartment subject to planning consent.  Outside has a lot to offer. A large, covered swimming pool sits comfortably within its surroundings, surrounded by lush mature vegetation, offering lovely shade on those hot summer days. The plot has various terraces and storerooms with ample storage. It is a lovely low maintenance garden perfect for entertaining family and guests.  The Villa is south facing, and in good condition. It does require modernisation and offers the perfect opportunity for a potential buyer to place their own stamp on the property. The pool is covered which allows use all year round. There is hot/cold air conditioning installed, an open fireplace, has town water and mains electricity.  All the events, culture, and facilities Málaga has to offer is just a short 10-minute drive away.  The Listing agent for itself and as agent for the vendor gives notice that:  1.
