description: ¡GRAN OPORTUNIDAD A UN PASO DEL CENTRO DE ALHAURIN DE LA TORRE! Precioso chalet independiente muy bien situado, a tan sólo cinco minutos andando de supermercados, restaurantes. y de todo lo que se necesita en el día a día.  Vivienda única para las familias que necesitan una gran casa con cuatro habitaciones dobles, dos baños completos, uno con bañera y otro con ducha, un bonito aseo, una gran cocina totalmente equipada con barra perfecta para comer y con una distribución muy amplia, que hace el hacer de comer una experiencia única con vistas a la gran terraza con piscina. El salón comedor totalmente independiente con aire acondicionado y con chimenea, lo hacen muy acogedor y perfecto para recibir a la familia. En ésta casa han pensado en cada detalle, dejando la zona de lavadora y secadora tapada y muy cerca de la terraza. Con aire acondicionado en todas las habitaciones y en el salón, y con chimenea tanto en el salón como en la bodega (sótano). Lo que hacen único este chalet es la gran piscina independiente y la gran zona de barbacoa con zona para la TV, y para comer, perfecta para disfrutar del verano de la mejor forma. Tiene zona de aparcamiento cerrada para dos coches en el porche exterior y para otros dos coches en la parte del sótano donde están techados. en esta misma zona hay otra habitación perfecta para fiestas, zona de juegos, o usos múltiples. Las fotos no hacen justicia a esta gran casa, solicite una visita hoy mismo, y se sorprenderá. ¡PODRÍA SER LO QUE SUEÑAS, NO LO DEJES ESCAPAR! "Le informamos que los gastos inherentes a la compra de una vivienda, (IVA, o ITP, gastos notariales, registro. no están incluidos en el precio publicado. ".

description: A house with a lot of exterior space and lots of natural light. Divided into 4 floors, it has 5 bedrooms, two patios, a roof terrace, two bathrooms, a toilet, and a garage with storage and parking functionality.  When you enter the house you first pass through the front patio with lots of plants all around, here you can enjoy meals with friends and family. The patio connects directly to the living room through glass doors, you can enter the house through the glass doors or through the front door. Once inside you will find a large space that is divided into a dining room and a living room. On the same floor, further down is the guest toilet, a sitting room that can be used as an office and finally the kitchen. The kitchen comes fully equipped and is connected to a separate space that functions as a laundry room, passing through this you reach the back patio of the house where you can take shelter in the hotter summer months to enjoy some al outside meals.  When you go to the first floor, you will find three bedrooms, the master bedroom with a balcony and en-suite bathroom. Two further bedrooms, one of them with a balcony as well. All three bedrooms have fitted wardrobes. On the same floor there is a complete bathroom.  Going up to the top floor, there is the last bedroom which connects directly to the roof terrace, perfect to make a chill-out area to enjoy the views to the bay of Malaga.  The lowest floor, the garage, also serves as a storage room as the parking is private thanks to the doors that separate the space from the rest of the garage. The house is located in an urbanisation with a community swimming pool. It is in a quiet area, surrounded by several urbanisations. It is only a few minutes drive from Benajarafe and Rincón de la Victoria, you will find everything you need, supermarkets, restaurants, small shops, pharmacies. It is also close to an access to the motorway, being only 25 minutes from Malaga.  Check out the videos of the property! Contact us for more information!

description: Are you looking for a quality private house in Alhaurín de la Torre? We offer an independent villa located in the lower part of Pinos de Alhaurin, which will win you over for its originality, its luminosity and its outdoor spaces, as well as its warm finishes, which make it a unique property. With a plot of 1,520 m2, the exterior consists of a swimming pool, barbecue and chill-out area at the front, with a large area of natural grass and lined with plants, flower beds and tropical trees (banana trees, palm trees, etc. ). It is completed at the rear by an orchard area and fruit trees. The rear area has an artificial pond, with water lilies and fish, decorated with sculptures and a wooden bridge, as well as ornamental arches. It is completed with a rest area, like a small oasis that can be enjoyed all year round. The interior of the house will surprise you with its large windows and high ceiling, which bathes the rooms in light and with its ideal distribution, separating the common areas from the private ones. The common rooms are designed to enjoy the views to the outside, erasing the interior-exterior border, thanks to the light and the warmth of the finishes. The first floor consists of a large dressing room, a dining kitchen with a central island and all the comforts, as well as a dining room with a wooden mezzanine. It consists of two independent rooms with two bathrooms, and a master suite with a dressing room, toilet and shower. On the same floor we find underfloor heating, air conditioning and wood stoves. On the semi-basement floor, it is distributed with a cellar-room, two bedrooms, a bathroom, a storage room and a large recreation room, with space for a rest area and a pool table. The outdoor area has parking for several vehicles with a direct access gate. Do you want to know more details about this fantastic home? Do not hesitate and contact us, we are looking forward to introducing you to your new home! IBI - €1421/year Water, garbage, sewerage and purification - €100/month.

description: Do you have a family, do you like the countryside, tranquility and having a lot of outdoor space?. Then you want to live in "La Gloria", in the municipality of Alhaurín de la Torre, 5 minutes from the highway and only 15 minutes from Malaga. This wonderful Villa consists of 2 independent houses in the Romeral area, it has everything you are looking for. It is a plot of 3004 square meters, it has a main house and a second house perfect for visitors, a huge pool, a playground, a sports court and to all this we add more than 2,000 m2 of land with all kinds of fruit trees. The main house has 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, a living room with a fireplace to spend the winter nights, a large kitchen with spectacular unobstructed views of the mountains of Malaga and direct access to a large terrace. In the outdoor area there is a children's area with swings, slide, sports court (football / basketball) and ample space for parking. On the lower floor we find an ideal house as a guest house for family, visits and celebrations. With a totally independent entrance, it consists of 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a living room with an integrated kitchen. Next to it, there is a large barbecue room with a bar, kitchen and direct access to the pool. It also has an outside toilet to access directly from the pool. Both houses have electric water heaters and independent air conditioners. The plot enjoys a plantation of organic fruit trees with an irrigation system, where you can enjoy orange, mandarin, pomegranate, lemon, avocado, grapefruit and a huge space to plant your own garden. DO NOT MISS THIS GREAT OPPORTUNITY AND CALL ME TO SEE IT.

The area has easy access to the highway and other ring roads, located 10 minutes from the city center and about 15 minutes from the sea by car, near the La Rosaleda Soccer Field, the Rosaleda Shopping Center and a multitude of services and shops that you will have one step away, this house is a good starting point to create your home. Housing qualities: the floors are terrazzo and stoneware in the bathroom and kitchen, building with 2 elevators and access ramp for the disabled, 4th floor apartment, facing west, armored door, intercom, butane gas heater, security doors, white lacquered passage, building with private enclosure where the parking area is located. If you are interested in more information or a visit, do not hesitate to contact us at or at If you need to apply for a mortgage, consult our financial department without any commitment.

description: APARTMENT in El Palo, the most charming neighborhood in the EAST district of Malaga. Located in one of its main arteries and counting in a radius of 300 m. With all the services: public transport, educational centers of all levels, health center, library, large and small shops, sports centers, etc. A few meters from the beach and its unique Paseo Marítimo, known for maintaining its traditional seafaring essence with its vast and highly demanded gastronomic and leisure offer. The seaside neighborhood of El Palo is synonymous with life! Located on the seventh floor of a building built in 1975, in which the entrances, common areas and the elevator have been completely rehabilitated and renovated. The HOUSE has a total area of 83 m2 built. Practical and very functional, exterior and bright, with a charming terrace facing an area with no car traffic and no hustle and bustle. Bright and cheerful, the apartment consists of a living-dining room from which you can access the terrace, with unobstructed views. Independent kitchen, equipped and furnished to measure, in which the space is used optimally. Equipped with top brand appliances. Distributor corridor and three bedrooms, all of a good size. Full bathroom with shower. QUALITIES / EXTRAS / EQUIPMENT: Sold furnished and equipped (see details) Wooden flooring, except in kitchen and bathrooms. Moldings. White lacquered interior doors. Exterior carpentry in white aluminum and shutters. bars. Kitchen fully furnished and equipped with appliances. Wardrobe in main room with large capacity and 4 bodies. Awning on the terrace. It does not lack detail. Ready to enter! Following the Regulation of information to the consumer in the sale and rental of homes in Andalusia (RD 218/2005 of October 11) we inform that THERE ARE NO ADDITIONAL FEES TO THE SALE PRICE. It does NOT include the expenses derived from the purchase of real estate according to the current laws: ITP, notary expenses, agency and Registry.

description: Lucas Fox presents this beautiful 138 m² built apartment, in the upper area of Cerrado de Calderón, one of the most sought-after urbanizations in Malaga, next to the shopping centre in this area.  Outside the property, we are greeted by the pool and garden area, adorned by various plants.  Upon accessing the interior we will find the entrance hall, which leads to the rest of the rooms. To our right, there is the spacious living-dining room, with access to the terrace, which allows the entry of natural light throughout the day, thanks to its east orientation, and offers us beautiful sunrises.  We continue the corridor and to our left, we will have a full bathroom that serves the entire property. In the background and right, the master suite is offered, with access to a beautiful terrace where we can enjoy pleasant views of the well-kept community garden. This has a large wardrobe and a private bathroom with a shower. In this part of the house we have two other bedrooms: one of them is currently enabled as a dressing room with a large custom-made wardrobe and the other as a secondary double bedroom.  The large kitchen has a north orientation and pleasant views of the mountains, as well as a second access door to the property. It is an ideal kitchen for daily use and with space for a breakfast and snack table. Later, we will have a functional utility room space to store various household objects, taking advantage of every corner.  The property has a designated parking space, connected to an lift to make the entrances from the garage more comfortable.  In this apartment you can enjoy the captivating sunrises and sunsets of the beautiful city of Malaga and the tranquility of the Cerrado de Calderón development, a few steps from shopping areas, international schools and close to the beach.  Get in touch for more information.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cerrado de Calderón - Hacienda Paredes, Málaga
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Olmos

description: Lucas Fox is pleased to present this wonderful independent villa in one of the best areas of Malaga, Cerrado de Calderón. It is a villa with great characteristics, with fantastic views, plenty of natural light and wide spaces.  It has an area of more than 500 m² distributed over three floors, with a total of five bedrooms, five bathrooms, a toilet, two kitchens, a swimming pool, a garage and an incredible summer area.  Upon entering through the main door, we are greeted by a bright living room, with a seating area and a dining area, and access to different terraces. To our left, we will see the open kitchen, fully equipped with high-quality appliances. From here, we can also access the spacious terrace, with incredible views.  If we go to the lower floors, on the mezzanine we will see a room, currently designated as a second living room, with a full bathroom and access to the exterior of the house.  On the middle floor of the property we have a full bathroom and three bedrooms with two private bathrooms. In addition, on this floor we will find the master suite, with a dressing room and private bathroom.  Going down to the garden floor, we have a wonderful summer area, fully equipped to enjoy gatherings with friends and family. Here we will find a kitchen with barbecue, a chill-out area with Lumon closures and the well-kept green garden that surrounds the pool.  The villa has a closed garage, with space for one car and an open area with space for two cars.  Get in touch for more information or to arrange a visit in one of the best houses, one step away from the best schools and restaurants and with unbeatable views.

description: Lucas Fox is pleased to present an exclusive villa from which you will be able to contemplate the exceptional sunsets over the bay of Malaga, the fashionable city in Europe.  This villa is divided into two floors and benefits from easy access. It has seven bedrooms, five bathrooms and a swimming pool and sits on a 1,600 m² plot, something unusual in the city of Malaga.  The property is accessed directly from the garage for three vehicles, crossing a small patio, which is on the same level. It has a double entrance, the service one, directly through the kitchen, and the main one.  From the main entrance, we arrive at a large hall. Towards the front is the large dining room living room with sea views and which has a fireplace and access to a terrace that also has views. To the right, there is access to the large master suite, which has a private bathroom and large closets, as well as views to the south and which would allow you to live on one floor. In the hall there is also a guest toilet.  To the left, there is access to another hall, used as a dining room, from which the circular stairs lead to the lower floor and to the tower, which functions as a study. From this hall, you access the kitchen, which is exterior and on the corner. The kitchen is very bright and has a laundry area as well as a pantry. From this hall you can also directly access the huge living room of more than 60M²  On the lower level, going down some beautiful circular stairs, you access the bedroom floor, which is divided into three wings. In each of them there are two bedrooms that share a bathroom. In the centre of these three wings, there is a large space in the centre of which is an elegant fireplace that enhances the entire space.  Outside, there is another terrace with sea views that leads to the pool, with separate toilets, perfect to enjoy all year round. From the living room, the two terraces, the master suite and some of the auxiliary bedrooms you can contemplate the impressive views of the sea. And in the eastern area, there is a large patio of almost 150 M² in which to celebrate events.  This villa requires renovation, but enjoys great renovation potential, thanks to its views, its high quality construction, its large plot and its fantastic and practical layout. Thus, it would be ideal as an investment as a family-friendly home or as a boutique hotel.  Get in touch for more information.

description: GILMAR Real Estate puts at your disposal this luxury housing development, located in one of the most representative and exclusive areas of Malaga. Clarity is a high-end residential located in the exclusive neighborhood of El Limonar, which began its urban development at the end of the 19th century, when luxurious residential villas began to emerge, such as Villa Suecia or the Monte Miramar Palace. The development has 16 homes distributed in two buildings with four and three bedrooms, with large terraces and penthouses with solariums. All units are equipped with air conditioning and fully equipped kitchen with electrical appliances. Its qualities, spaciousness, luminosity and views of the bay of Malaga stand out. It also has a parking space, infinity pool, chill-out area and playground. Clarity is light and sea, it is serenity and joy, it is to activate the senses and live naturally. Concepts and sensations that are perceived from this magnificent promotion, synonymous with quality, tranquility, security and comfort. Undoubtedly one of the noblest neighborhoods in Malaga, next to the Monte Miramar Palace, where palatial houses with a Mediterranean flair coexist in an environment bathed by La Caleta beach. Clarity is the exclusive luxury development that you were looking for in Malaga. Do not miss this magnificent opportunity to come visit it.

description: Hábitat Mediterránea offers you this magnificent apartment for sale in the coastal town of Benalmádena, in the province of Málaga, located on the first floor of a residential building with an elevator, with a built area of 152m², distributed between: 4 spacious and bright bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, spacious living-dining room with direct access to the terrace, an independent kitchen that, although it needs some reform, has great potential to become the kitchen of your dreams (it currently has base units and a ceramic hob), with access to the laundry room and terrace closed, laundry room and 2 bathrooms (one of them en suite with the master bedroom). Located in the heart of Arroyo de la Miel, it has a garage and storage room included in the price, as well as a community pool and garden, which will make your life more comfortable and relaxed, having access to all the resources you may need, services and facilities very nearby as educational centers (C.AND.I.P El Tomillar, Ovoide Municipal Center for Permanent Training, Pasito a Pasito Nursery School), health care (Arroyo Clinic), supermarkets, various shops (bazaar, pastry shop, construction materials, hardware store, clothing store, computer store, mobile phone store,...), nursing home, pharmacy, a variety of hotels and restaurants (cafeterias, bars, restaurants, grills, churrería), oil recycling point, sports facilities (El Tomillar soccer field, Benalmádena Sports Palace) or parks (Pocoyo Parque Games, Children's Park Public Medina Azahara, Calisthenics Park-Outdoor Gym) and leisure areas, among others. It has excellent communication by road (access to the AP-7, and E-15, its main communication route being the A-368), and by public transport: 800m away is the Arroyo de la Miel train and commuter station, taxi rank and several urban and line bus stops very close (a 3-minute walk has the lines: M-125, M-103, M-107, M-112, M-116 and M-121). If you prefer, you can enjoy the wonderful beaches of Benalmádena Costa, since its excellent location makes these beaches very accessible (Santa Ana Beach, Malapesquera Beach, Arroyo de la Miel Beach or Bil Bil Beach), you will be guaranteed to enjoy a relaxed and fresh atmosphere for summer stays. A home both for those who want to live in a quiet, well-connected area and for those looking to invest for lease, with a very good return. Benalmadena Pueblo is situated in the foothills of the mountains and about 5km from the coast. Most areas of this village offer spectacular views of the Mediterranean from Fuengirola to Malaga. The village attracts many visitors as it has managed to keep its traditional Spanish village look with white washed walls, narrow flower filled cobbled streets and small plazas (squares) where traditional Spanish café bars reside. Many visitors enjoy the tranquillity of the village taken in a real taste of Spanish life whilst enjoying local cuisine and tapas.

description: YOU CAN NOT ASK FOR MORE...THE BEST HOME FOR SALE IN MANANTIALES! THE MOST UPDATED AND BEST LOCATION...CHECK IT! IT WILL BE YOUR FAVORITE BECAUSE OF ITS BRIGHTNESS, WITH LARGE WINDOWS IN ALL ROOMS, BECAUSE OF ITS SIZE, WITH A TOTAL OF 4 BEDROOMS, 3 BATHROOMS AND 1 OUTSIDE TOILET, BECAUSE OF ITS OUTLET, WITH A SEMI-BASEMENT FLOOR OF ALMOST 70 M2; FOR YOUR COMFORT, WITH THE BEST QUALITIES, FOR ITS CONDITION, IMPECCABLE TO ENTER TO LIVE...HAS IT ALL! LIVING PLACE: Plot surface: 1405m2 Constructed area: 306 m2. It consists of one floor above ground level and a semi-basement, linked by a staircase that is accessed from the covered and glazed porch and distributed as follows: MAIN FLOOR: Large glazed porch with Lumon, entrance hall, designer kitchen where you can enjoy magical family moments due to its functionality and large spaces with its large dining room.Spacious and bright living room where the large window and access to an incredible terrace of about 14m2 with views of the private garden and Malaga stand out, 3 double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes to highlight the size of all, the light thanks to the huge windows, 2 bathrooms (high design shower tray and bathtub), the main one, as not en suite and a large dressing room. SEMI-GROUND PLANT: With 63 m2, a relief above the average for the size of many homes.Distributed in a living-dining room with spaces open to the kitchen, 2 bedrooms (one of them currently used as a sports area or gym), a large bathroom with a shower and a storage room. ABROAD: With an area of 1405 meters of plot in 2 terraces with little height and divided by the house, in the main terrace is where the sports area is located, which consists of a swimming pool surrounded by natural vegetation and a barbecue and toilet area and the rest is planted with fruit trees and mature vegetation. Outdoor parking: Roof for 3 cars. QUALITIES: Interior carpentry: solid brown wood; exterior carpentry: aluminum with double glazing (maximum insulation), porcelain stoneware floor (wood effect); Centralized air conditioning/heat pump throughout the house, fitted kitchen (without electrical appliances).High ceilings and solar panels for hot water.All exterior.COMPLETE! RECENT REFORMS: Comprehensive reform in practically the entire house such as floors, solid wood doors in brown in accordance with new trends, plumbing, electricity, kitchen, walls, windows, large outdoor barbecue office and guest toilet, installation of LUMON on the terraces, You cannot ask for more for winter days. LOCATION: springs.One of the most demanded urbanizations due to its proximity to the urban center of Alhaurín de la Torre, with all services at hand and surrounded by nature.An urbanization with large extensions, incredible views and that will allow you to enjoy your favorite activity outdoors. There are only a few townhouses left, this one is  11 and has a constructed area of 211 m2 and is only a few months away from being ready, which means that it can be visited and its qualities can be appreciated. It is included in the price also a storage room and 3 parking spaces. Torremolinos is located about 3 km from Malaga-Costa del Sol airport, it is connected by road to other parts of the Costa del Sol via the Mediterranean motorway and the N-340, as well as by the suburban railway network Malaga and the beaches of Los Alamos and Playamar are only 5 minutes away and it is very close to the centre with leisure areas, water parks and international schools and all kinds of services such as shopping centres, schools and golf courses.

Mediterranean Habitat offers you a wide range of studio apartments with 1 and 2 bedrooms (those with two bedrooms duplex type) with parking space garage (€9,900) and storage room (€3,300) in the beautiful coastal town from Benalmádena, in the province of Málaga. On this occasion, for this price, we offer you a home, type duplex, with an area of 62m² built, distributed between: kitchen with electric boiler, two bathrooms (one of them with shower tray and screen), two bedrooms (with a large closet built-in with large storage capacity and the upper bedroom with sloping ceiling), living-dining room with a large window and terrace with open views and lateral sea view. A garage space and a storage room are included. The building has an elevator. Well located in the hills of Benalmádena Pueblo and close to the Benalmádena Town Hall, enjoy easy access to countless amenities, including the World Class Golf Club Torrequebrada and the beaches of Benalmádena Costa, as well as have in its vicinity facilities and services of all type (Sanna Nuevo park, Jardines del Muro park, Church of Santo Domingo de Guzmán, Arco Iris Nursery School, Public School Jacaranda, panoramic elevator-lookout, Rafael Estrada Dentista, Montebello Clinic, Vitas Xanit International Hospital, Art Museum Pre-Columbian Felipe Orlando or the Justice of the Peace of Benalmádena, among others). It has an excellent road connection (the AP-7, A-7, E-15, being its main route of mobility the A-368) and nearby bus stops (lines M-103, M-112, M-121 and M-126), with the beach less than 20 minutes. description: We present the Excellence Building consisting of 30 high-quality 2- and 3-bedroom homes, parking spaces and storage rooms. Gated community with infinity pool and roof solarium. 6-storey building where you can choose between 2 and 3-bedroom homes, from ground floors with gardens to penthouses with large terraces and private solariums. New home on the Costa Del Sol, in Arroyo de la Miel, Benalmádena, an urban and quiet area with all services. One step away you will have schools, institutes, a pharmacy, supermarkets.. . 900m from the Cercanías Train station, and with easy access to the Autovía del Mediterráneo, just 10 minutes from the airport. The EXCELLENCE BUILDING stands out for its beautiful community pool with views of the sea and the mountains in the solarium, where we will also find showers and changing rooms. Given its location, you will be able to enjoy the sun all day and all year round. Solarium and community pool with great views of the sea on the 6th floor. All the houses are exterior, spacious and bright, as well as wonderful terraces. Your vehicle will be protected, thanks to the garage in the basement, from which you will have easy access to your home. Ventilated façade made up of ceramic plates, which stands out for its high quality, durable finishes, high aesthetic possibilities and indisputable advantages of thermal and acoustic insulation. Aerothermal system that works with a state-of-the-art heat pump designed to provide cooling in summer, heating in winter and hot water all year round. American kitchen fully furnished with a modern design and LED lighting under the wall units and equipped with all energy-efficient appliances according to current times. Modern design and LED lighting in the master bedroom and living room, indirect lighting footlights are placed in ceiling recesses by means of led strips equipped with intensity regulator in both rooms. Aluminum carpentry with thermal bridge and double glazing type "Climalit". In the hall, living room, distributor and bedrooms: laminated floating flooring Very comfortable, open, spacious and bright spaces Expected delivery mid-2024 VERIFIED QUALITY: ALL HOMES ARE SUBJECT TO STRICT SUPERVISION BEFORE THEY ARE DELIVERED. Do not hesitate to contact us for more information. TU INVERSIÓN INMOBILIARIA.

description: MAGNIFICENT INDEPENDENT VILLA IN PUERTO DE LA TORRE, WITH 5 BEDROOMS, INDEPENDENT POOL, BARBECUE AREA, AND LARGE BASEMENT. LOCATION VILLA located in the Fuentealegre area in Puerto de la Torre, in a super quiet area, with all the services at your fingertips in a comfortable and practical way, public transport, supermarkets, schools and institutes, with easy access to the ring road, and from there to the A7 motorway, 15 minutes from the beach and the airport. QUALITIES: House in perfect state of maintenance. Porcelain terrazzo floors. All the doors are made of Oak wood. Climalit windows lacquered in wood color with mosquito nets and bars on all windows. The house has 2 electric hot water heaters. Osmosis in the kitchen. Alarm in pool area and basement. description: LOCATION: Very quiet and easily accessible house in a typical street in the center of Churriana.It has all the services at your fingertips, municipal market, supermarkets, all kinds of shops, restaurants, cafeterias, a pharmacy, a health center, schools, an institute, banks, and a bus and taxi stop. On the GROUND FLOOR, we have the main entrance at street level, which gives access to a large hall that serves as a distributor to the living room, kitchen, toilet and stairs to the upper floor.The living room has a large window that overlooks the main street.It is a spacious and comfortable space that is completely independent from the other rooms in the house.It has split hot and cold air conditioning.At the end of the distributor, we have a large kitchen with a window to the back street.Its distribution allows you to enjoy this large space and make life in your own kitchen.It also has a large pantry where you can store food.The ground floor toilet is located next to the kitchen.A comfortable staircase leads us to the first floor. FIRST FLOOR: In this, we have the bedroom area.The first one is on the left.It is a very bright double bedroom, with plenty of space, a built-in wardrobe and a west-facing window to the street behind.Next to it is the bathroom, with a window to the street.In front of the stairs, as we go up, we have the master bedroom.It is one of the largest rooms in the house.It has access to a balcony and its orientation is to the east.And right next to it, we have the third of the bedrooms.Very spacious and also double as the previous ones.Like the main one, it has views and a terrace overlooking the street.All bedrooms have recently installed hot and cold air conditioning. SECOND FLOOR: And if this house has something spectacular apart from what has already been discussed, it is the large terrace on the top floor.Before accessing it, we find a fully covered laundry and clothesline area inside the house.When we go outside from here, we are amazed at the spectacular views we can enjoy.The entire bay of Malaga and the entire city are within reach of our vision.a large terrace, which will allow you to enjoy the sun and the pleasant temperature of this city. description: Fabulous opportunity! Excellent semi-detached house with a comfortable location in El Romeral. 145 m2 plot, 207 m2 built on 3 floors. 3 bedrooms, 3 baths. Upon entering this beautiful house from the ground floor, we arrive at a spacious hall that leads to a living-dining room, a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast area, a family bathroom with a shower and the stairs that lead to the semi-basement and the first floor. On the first floor we have three bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, two with a private balcony facing the street and one with an en-suite bathroom with a bathtub, plus another family bathroom with a bathtub. The basement consists of two open spaces. One of these is a play room for the family and the other contains the laundry rooms and storage areas. From the kitchen we can go out to a side terrace with a barbecue and in front there is another outdoor recreation area with beautiful palm trees. It was built in 2008 and is very well preserved. The access route is in perfect condition and there is one parking space inside the property. The orientation of the house is west, all the windows are Climalit with mosquito nets and security bars. The air conditioning is centralized with independent air management units per floor and the living room has a wood-burning fireplace. The water heater is electric and the house has photovoltaic solar panels that significantly reduce electricity consumption. Certain services and amenities, such as schools, bus stops, parks, restaurants and other shops are walking distance. Alhaurín De La Torre and Cártama Estación are 12 minutes away. The airport just 15 minutes and the center of Malaga 22 minutes.

The Pinos de Alhaurín urbanization is one of the most protected, with more green areas, it has a minibus service, school bus routes and a wonderful Social Club with paddle tennis and a multitude of sports and social activities.Located 5 minutes from the main avenue and bus stop to Malaga, University, etc., and from the Maruja Mallo School, El Pinar private school, Nursery, pharmacy, restaurants, Comerco supermarkets, Supeco and the center of Alhaurín de la Torre. The house built in 2021 has very low electricity costs thanks to the photovoltaic panels that its owners have installed (€18/month).It is a house with a modern, cozy air and with a sunny and private outdoor area.It has the garden and the pool to finish. OUTSIDE: At the entrance, access to the 30m2 garage and land for landscaping. At the rear is the pool and garden area with direct access from the living room. HOUSING: Its 230m2 built on two floors, are distributed in hall, living room with open kitchen, 3 bedrooms, dressing room, 2 bathrooms and garage. GROUND FLOOR: 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom On this floor there are 2 bedrooms, one of them large, and a full bathroom with a glass-enclosed shower.From this floor we can access the outside and go up to the pool located at the back of the plot. UPPER FLOOR: Living-dining room-kitchen, 1 bedroom, dressing room and bathroom The living room with open kitchen is very bright and with views of the mountains and the Guadalhorce Valley.It has a cozy fireplace with an oven and large glass doors that open onto the pool. The bedroom has a terrace with great views, a dressing room and a large bathroom with a shower with a Turkish bath. DETAILS: Year of construction 2.021 PCV windows with thermal break and double glazing Hot/cold air conditioning in all rooms Photovoltaic panels: electricity bills of €18/month on average IBI: €1,670/year For more information, do not hesitate to contact us, we will be happy to assist you.REF: 1811 Phone: 952 410 333.WhatsApp and mobile phone: 662 922 851 (In compliance with the RD of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of 11 October,clients that in the indicated prices are not included the expenses derived from the purchase of real estate according to the current laws: notary expenses, registration, etc.) The exposed data is merely informative, the offer is subject to errors, price changes, availability and/or withdrawal from the market without prior notice.

Fortuny Hogares Únicos offers for sale this spacious and very bright flat located in the heart of the historic centre of Malaga, with excellent views of the Alcazaba and the Plaza de la Merced. One of the most emblematic squares in the city, close to all services: shops, pharmacies, schools, nursery schools and a range of tourist and leisure activities. The property is very well connected to public transport: taxi ranks and the public car park.  The property, with south orientation, consists of 196m2 built and 155m2 useful distributed in an entrance hall, a spacious and sunny living room with access to two balconies with stunning views, a large independent kitchen with dining area and access to a balcony, a hallway, three bedrooms in total, the master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom, two more bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a guest toilet.  The property was built in 1883 and has elements and materials of great value due to its antiquity, such as floors and windows with stained glass windows.  The building where the flat is located is emblematic of the city, has a lift and is adapted for people with reduced mobility.  At Fortuny Hogares Únicos, we have a Technical Service specialising in Projects, reforms, interior design, licenses, energy certificates and everything you need to carry out any project you need. Contact us without obligation. The property is a magnificent opportunity for people who want to enjoy urban life in the heart of the city and with all the services at hand. Next, there is a charming reading room and a spacious and perfectly distributed living-dining room that could be used as an event area. This area is completed with two small rooms that can be used as a storage room or as a seasonal wardrobe.  On the first floor, there is the family living-dining room and the large kitchen, which has an office and a living area. These two rooms open directly onto one of the two terraces with sea views, where there is a barbecue area and a wooden pergola from which you can enjoy the views of the bay of Malaga and its wonderful sunsets.  The bedrooms are located on the second floor. The first two, which share a bathroom, are located to the southwest and are spacious and bright. In the background, there is the master bedroom that has a comfortable open dressing room and a private bathroom. However, it stands out for its charming terrace from which you can also enjoy relaxed views of the sea.  On the upper floor there is a discreet laundry room, as well as another large terrace where there is a complete outdoor Jacuzzi with night lighting and a secluded and discreet lawn area with hammocks where you can enjoy those moments without being seen.  This elite urbanization has landscaped areas, a paddle tennis court and a wonderful swimming pool, as well as 24-hour security with a doorman. This urbanization is a true luxury, a haven of peace and elegance. A wonderful way to start living in Malaga.

description: EXCLUSIVE.REFURBISHED LUXURY VILLA IN AN UNBEATABLE LOCATION.OUTDOOR AND INDOOR HEATED SWIMMING POOL, OUTDOOR JACUZZI/SPA, DISCOTHEQUE, CINEMA ROOM, BAR, SUMMER KITCHEN….IN ALHAURIN DE LA TORRE UNIQUE IN THE AREA.QUALITY, EXCLUSIVITY AND COMFORT define this VILLA. TRESOL Inmobiliaria presents this IMPRESSIVE VILLA completely renovated with luxury qualities and located a stone's throw from the main avenue, all kinds of services and with quick access to the A7. On a 1,195m2 plot, with 683m2 built on 3 floors with: entrance hall, living-dining room, kitchen, porch with glazed barbecue area, laundry room, 7 bedrooms, 7 bathrooms, apartment, indoor pool, gym, large disco/bar room and cinema room, dressing room in the basement, living room, office, bar in the pool area and storage rooms. Note that the house has been recently renovated and equipped with 1st facilities: home automation throughout the house, electronic locks on all doors, blinds, lights with synchronized touch switches, internal and external surveillance system, underfloor heating, hot / cold air centralized, installation of music equipment in leisure areas, natural gas barbecues with tank ducts and much more. OUTSIDE: The exteriors of this VILLA are designed to be enjoyed with great detail and easy maintenance.The pool area (58m2 with waterfall and salt chlorination), is surrounded by spaces designed for leisure: covered porches, fully equipped bar, Lumon-type glass-enclosed dining room with barbecue, glass-enclosed living room and a room used as an office. At the rear, with access from the kitchen: a glazed summer kitchen and one of the jewels of the house, a huge heated swimming pool Jacuzzi/luxury spa with a bar area. To the right of the VILLA and with access with a motorized gate, space for several vehicles. MAIN FLOOR: Hall, living-dining room, kitchen, utility room, 5 bedrooms with bathrooms en suite and toilet. An elegant hall with high ceilings gives way to this exclusive VILLA. The immense living-dining room of approximately 90m2 with space to divide the living, dining, reading areas, etc... The kitchen, furnished in premium quality, has an office area and an island for breakfast, a pantry room and a laundry room.From it we access the outside and summer kitchen. The 5 bedrooms on this floor have en-suite bathrooms.Two of the bedrooms are large, with a dressing area and a terrace in one of them.In addition, a courtesy toilet. UPPER FLOOR: 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and terraces Two large bedrooms with built-in bunk beds and terraces with spectacular views.Each room has 4 double beds.They share a very spacious full bathroom. BASEMENT: Disco, cinema room, heated spa pool, gym, apartment, dressing room and storage room. The spacious disco room has all the necessary facilities: lights, music, bar.The fully equipped cinema room with 8 reclining seats.A large glazed heated swimming pool to the gym.And also, on this floor an apartment. Storage area and utility room DETAILS: Radiating floor Centralized air zone Solar panels PVC windows with thermal break 1st quality porcelain floors 3 pools Discotheque Cinema Apartment newly renovated No community fees IBI: €1,630/year (In compliance with the RD of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of October 11, it is reported that the price does not include the expenses derived from the purchase of real estate according to current laws: notarial expenses, registration, ITP, etc.) The exposed data is merely informative and has no contractual value.

description: Very EXCLUSIVE 145m2 corner penthouse with a large bedroom (originally 2 bedrooms), a work area and 3 bathrooms, fully furnished with top quality finishes and with 2 very spacious garage spaces included in the price. The property offers a spacious en-suite master bedroom with space for a large king-size bed, en-suite bathroom with double washbasin, 1.90 cm shower with rain shower head and a smart technology Roca toilet/bidet. Included in the master suite area is a custom dressing room including desk for office or dressing table. Spacious living room with dining area and open plan kitchen where wonderful sea views are enjoyed from all rooms and perspectives. This space has folding sliding doors to the +25 m² terrace, combining both areas and making this space one of the most attractive places in the house. The kitchen is made to measure, using different materials from the initial project. With DEKTON ceramics for back splash and worktops, BOSCH appliances and ELICA worktop with built-in extractor. On the main terrace you can enjoy long hours of sunshine. This property has one of the best sun exposure spaces in the Privilege Residence building. The main terrace on the ground floor has a fully covered awning. The system for the awning is intelligent and automatic wind sensitive, it can be controlled via a smartphone. The upper floor terrace includes a 12m² private saltwater swimming pool. Natural wooden planks cover the beamed ceiling along with other design elements to create an intimate and private lounging area, giving the feeling of an open plan living area. This area has approval to be converted into a secluded living space throughout the year, as a second bedroom. On the same floor, a third bathroom with washer and dryer and outdoor hot/cold water shower by Porcelanosa.  Privilege has been designed as a sustainable building with a high energy efficiency rating. To maximise the use of the sun, 8 solar panels have been installed drastically reducing energy costs. All products are guaranteed and are less than one year old. The building allows rentals providing the owners with a great source of income. The building offers a strategic location, 15 min drive from Malaga international airport, 20 min from Malaga city centre.

This villa has 120 sqm built distributed in two floors as follows: 1st floor has a double bedroom with private terrace, also a single bedroom and a bathroom with shower. This floor has beautiful sloping ceilings. Going down the stairs we find the ground floor, which is distributed in a spacious double bedroom with built-in wardrobes, fully fitted and equipped kitchen, a complete bathroom with bathtub and a very luminous living-dining room with exit to the private terrace of approx. 20 m2, where you can enjoy barbecues. description: WARM AND SPACIOUS PENTHOUSE WITH VIEWS TO THE SEA AND THE MOUNTAIN, GARDEN AND COMMUNITY POOL IN MÁLAGA EAST. Fortuny Hogares Únicos offers this warm, spacious and bright home for sale, located in a quiet urbanization on Calle Estrella del Mar in Málaga Este. Just 1 km from the Peñón del Cuervo and Candado beaches where you can enjoy all the services around you: El Candado Royal Golf Club and its Marina and a wide range of leisure activities, restaurants, schools, etc. The Historic Center of Malaga is 20 minutes away by car. The penthouse, facing southwest, has a total built area of 100m2 including common areas, 96m2 useful and 57m2 of a terrace. It is distributed in an entrance hall, a spacious living-dining room with access to the terrace of the house, a kitchen furnished and equipped with a hob, extractor hood, oven and mixer tap, with a laundry area open to the living room. A corridor gives access to the three bedrooms. The master bedroom has a dressing room and an en-suite bathroom and the other two bedrooms have fitted wardrobes and a complete bathroom that serves the rest of the rooms. On the large terrace of the property, you can relax enjoying the views of the sea and the mountains. The house has magnificent qualities: among them, we highlight wooden floors in the living room and bedrooms and porcelain stoneware floors in the bathrooms and kitchen, pre-installation of hot/cold air conditioning, solar panels for hot water, windows with Climalit double glazing, thermal and acoustic insulation. The common areas are equipped with large garden spaces with topsoil and a community pool for the enjoyment of the whole family. The price of the house includes a covered parking space and storage room. The second outdoor parking space is optional (€9,000). The information provided is indicative, is not binding and has no contractual value. Said information may have undergone modifications that have not yet been incorporated. Energy Certificates are in process. In compliance with the RD of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of 11 October, we inform consumers that the price indicated does not include the costs derived from the purchase of the property according to the laws in force (ITP, notary fees and in the case of new construction the VAT tax). description: COMFORTABLE, SPACIOUS, BRIGHT AND FUNCTIONAL TWO-BEDROOM APARTMENT WITH TERRACE, PARKING AND STORAGE ROOM IN ALHAURÍN DE LA TORRE, MÁLAGA. Fortuny Hogares Únicos offers this warm and functional apartment for sale located on Avenida de las Palmeras in Alhaurín de la Torre. Due to its central location, the house is close to shops, restaurants, pharmacies, schools, supermarkets and all the necessary services. In addition, in the surroundings, you will find wide gastronomic and leisure offers. The Historic Center of Malaga is only 30 minutes away by car. The property is located on the first floor of a building with a total of 34 homes, the building is three heights. The apartment, facing south, has a constructed area of 85m2 including common areas, 66m2 useful housing and 2.5m2 of a terrace and is distributed in an entrance hall, a spacious and sunny living-dining room with access to the terrace with drying area, a fully furnished kitchen open to the living room, a master bedroom with built-in wardrobes and an en-suite bathroom with a bathtub and two bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, a complete bathroom with a shower tray that serves the rest of the stays. The house has very good qualities. Among them, we highlight an armoured entrance door with a security lock, white lacquered plywood doors, polysynthetic floor imitating wood, porcelain stoneware floors in the kitchen and bathrooms, aerothermal energy in the living room and bedrooms, Windows with double glazing and hot water with solar panels, thermal and acoustic insulation, fully furnished kitchen equipped with extractor hood, ceramic hob, oven and monochrome tap. The price includes a parking space and the possibility of acquiring a storage room with an additional amount of €7,000 plus expenses and taxes. Energy Certificates are in process. description: Detached modern style villa located in the lower area of Pedregalejo at 350 meters from the beach. This is a designer villa in a quiet street, ideal for families due to its proximity to the beach, the best schools in the area and all the services you may need from transport, commerce, market and supermarkets, gyms, restaurants etc.  This villa was totally refurbished and renovated in 2015 to transform it into a spacious and comfortable contemporary style house with open spaces and double height ceilings. The property has been built to the highest standards of quality, security and design that make it unique.  With a new iron structure, this property has 3 floors including the basement (290 m2 of living space), a 45 m2 patio and two terraces in front of the house (one of which could be converted into a parking space). On the ground floor (120 m2), the house boosts a spacious living-dining room of more than 65 m2, a nice kitchen with laundry room and direct exit to the patio and an office/bedroom with bathroom en suite. Going up to the first floor, we have 2 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 1 bathroom and the primary bedroom ( 18 m2 plus a large walk-in wardrobe and a complete bathroom with shower and bathtub). The 70 m2 basement has also been renovated and has a small kitchenette, a bedroom and bathroom and living room/games room or Gym. this space offers many options and could also be converted into an independent flat.  Highlights:  The quality construction of the house, the comfortable distribution of spacious and luminous spaces. Air conditioning in the whole house and heat pump.  Solar panels for hot water. Mosquito nets throughout the house.  Security double glazed windows throughout the house  Incredible natural light.  The perfect house for those who want a villa within walking distance to the beach and the city of Malaga! Feel free to contact me for more info or if you'd like to organize a private showing ( Monday. Saturday ) Celine ABADIE: Agency fees included in the price.

description: Detached house of 220 m² built on a plot of 261 m², in a private residential development. The villa is located in the lower area of Cerrado de Calderón, one of the most sought-after developments in Malaga.  Outside the house, there is a large porch, adorned by various plants. Walking alongside the façade, we will come across a garden, the barbecue area and different entrances until we go around the house.  Upon entering the property, we will find the hall, which leads to the rest of the rooms. In front, the living room is located, with a very relaxing work area, to the left. At the bottom of this, we will have a room with an en-suite bathroom and an independent entrance.  To the right of the living room, we can go down some stairs that lead us to the kitchen, which is very bright and spacious, with even a table to enjoy breakfast or lunch.  Returning to the living room, we go up the stairs and we will find another living-dining room, with access to a beautiful terrace, with views of the mountains and all the green areas of the neighbourhood. In this part of the house we have a complete bedroom, with an en-suite bathroom, a cabinet and a built-in wardrobe.  Finally, the jewel of the house: The master bedroom. We go up some solid wooden stairs that lead us to a landing, the first thing we see is our reflection, since a cupboard with glass doors welcomes us. To the left, we have a large bathroom, with a double sink and a bathtub.  To the right of this landing is a large master bedroom, which stands out for its brightness, with a good built-in wardrobe, it leads us to the upper terrace of the villa, from which we can enjoy the captivating sunrises and sunsets of the beautiful city of Malaga, and the tranquility of the closed neighbourhood of Calderón.  The house also has a fourth room, currently used as a storage room, which could be converted into a separate apartment or an extra bedroom.  Living one step away from the best international schools in Malaga, in a lively area full of shops and leisure options, and at the same time being close to the beach, is possible in this detached villa.

It is located in a quiet area and close to the school El Atabal, bus stop, shops, etc... The property is divided into 3 floors. Entering from the street, we access it through a beautiful and large Andalusian style garden that surrounds the house, with covered barbecue area for those family and friends gatherings that we like so much and has shade on hot summer days. Entering the house we find an entrance hall with a large window, which leads to a very bright patio, we continue and to the right of the hallway we have a bedroom on the left, which overlooks the garden and wardrobe. Next is a full bathroom with shower, and to the right of this a second bedroom also with fitted wardrobe and overlooking the street. Continuing through the hallway we reach the large, spacious, air-conditioned and bright living room with open plan fully fitted kitchen in perfect condition. Through the living room we have access to the garden and to the eye-catching courtyard of the house. We go upstairs, with sloping ceilings, which has 3 spacious bedrooms. We start accessing them through a long corridor, where the bedrooms are and we arrive at the master bedroom, large, with terrace, dressing room and a fantastic en suite bathroom with half moon bathtub. We end up on this floor with two more bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a large terrace where you can sit down to read, rest and see beautiful views. It should be noted that the entire first floor has air conditioning and radiator heating throughout the house. Finally the ground floor where we access by stairs and we arrive to the large semi basement, which has entrance from the street by a gate where you can put up to 5 cars. The property has bars on all windows and glass doors, solar panels, parquet flooring and alarm. Pre-installation of air conditioning in all the first floor. Do not hesitate to come and visit it and contact us for any information about this wonderful property. With you always in the search for your home 3 reasons to buy with Zome + Accompaniment With a unique preparation and experience in the real estate market, Zome consultants put all their dedication offering you the best accompaniment, guiding you with the utmost confidence, in the right direction to meet your needs and ambitions. From now on, we will create a close relationship, listening carefully to your expectations, because our priority is your happiness! Because it is important that you feel that you are accompanied and that we are always with you. + Simple Zome consultants have a unique training in the market, based on the exchange of practical experience and strengthened by the knowledge of Applied Neuroscience, which will allow them to simplify and make your real estate experience more effective. Leave behind the bureaucratic nightmares because at Zome you will find full support with an experienced and multidisciplinary team that will give you practical support in all the fundamental aspects, so that your real estate experience exceeds your expectations. + Happy Free yourself from all the worries and get the quality time you need to dedicate to what makes you happiest.

description: Malaga is known for its effortless blend of tradition and modern sophistication.  Living Tower echoes this with its unique 21st century architecture, focus on sustainability and respect for its environment.  This development is comprised of 3 towers of 22 floors each, amongst which we find this exceptional 3-bedroom apartment. With a built area of 302m² and an incredible 108m² terrace, this stunning home provides vast interior and exterior living spaces designed to make the most of the stunning sea views and natural light.  Interior design by the prestigious Beriestain Studio places emphasis on exquisite materials and light tones, with wood adding a touch of warmth throughout.  Residents can enjoy the exceptional communal facilities including a gym, solarium, infinity pool, pool bar, co-working space, games room, cinema, nursery and spa.  A very special beachfront home offering an unparalleled quality of life in Malaga.

description: COMFORTABLE, SPACIOUS, BRIGHT AND FUNCTIONAL TWO-BEDROOM APARTMENT WITH TERRACE, PARKING AND STORAGE ROOM IN ALHAURÍN DE LA TORRE, MÁLAGA. Fortuny Hogares Únicos offers this warm and functional apartment for sale located on Avenida de las Palmeras in Alhaurín de la Torre. Due to its central location, the house is close to shops, restaurants, pharmacies, schools, supermarkets and all the necessary services. In addition, in the surroundings, you will find wide gastronomic and leisure offers. The Historic Center of Malaga is only 30 minutes away by car. The property is located on the first floor of a building with a total of 34 homes, the building is three heights. The apartment, facing south, has a constructed area of 85m2 including common areas, 66m2 useful housing and 2.5m2 of a terrace and is distributed in an entrance hall, a spacious and sunny living-dining room with access to the terrace with drying area, a fully furnished kitchen open to the living room, a master bedroom with built-in wardrobes and an en-suite bathroom with a bathtub and two bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, a complete bathroom with a shower tray that serves the rest of the stays. The house has very good qualities. Among them, we highlight an armoured entrance door with a security lock, white lacquered plywood doors, polysynthetic floor imitating wood, porcelain stoneware floors in the kitchen and bathrooms, aerothermal energy in the living room and bedrooms, Windows with double glazing and hot water with solar panels, thermal and acoustic insulation, fully furnished kitchen equipped with extractor hood, ceramic hob, oven and monochrome tap. The price includes a parking space and the possibility of acquiring a storage room with an additional amount of €7,000 plus expenses and taxes. Energy Certificates are in process. In compliance with the RD of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of 11 October, we inform consumers that the price indicated does not include the costs derived from the purchase of the property according to the laws in force (ITP, notary fees and in the case of new construction the VAT tax). For more information, do not hesitate to contact us. We will be delighted to assist you.

description: This luxurious property is situated in a building that was specifically designed to cater to high-end clients. It boasts a concierge service and not one, but two elevators for the convenience of residents and their guests.  The building's layout is truly unique, with two separate entrances. One entrance is exclusively for service staff, providing direct access to the kitchen. On the other hand, the main entrance leads to a grand hall, which sets the tone for the opulence that awaits inside.  Upon entering the property, one is greeted with a spacious living/dining room that is perfect for entertaining guests. Double doors lead to a large, south-facing terrace that offers stunning views of the surrounding area.  The property also features four bedrooms, two of which face the exterior while the other two face the interior. This ensures that residents can enjoy both privacy and natural light. Two bathrooms are conveniently located nearby.  The large, fully-equipped kitchen is located opposite the living room and features an additional bathroom and a nearby bedroom. This extra room can be used as a guest room or as a staff room, depending on the owner's preferences.  All in all, this property is a true gem that perfectly captures the essence of luxury living.

description: Lucas Fox is pleased to present this sunny and elegant villa. Built during the 1980s, it faces south, directly towards the bay of Malaga. It has marble floors and a central staircase crowned with a glass window that provides natural light throughout the interior.  On the ground floor, at street level, there are two parking spaces. Upon entering, to the left, a separate bedroom with walk-in closet and full bathroom currently used as a study. Next to this, there is the spacious and bright living-dining room, with relaxing views of the sea. To the right is the large kitchen, which has a laundry room and pantry, as well as a separate dining area for ten people, which is located between the kitchen and the living room and opens onto the porch facing south.  On the upper floor, there are two large single bedrooms, which share a bathroom and on the opposite side, there is the master bedroom with a private bathroom and a spectacular terrace where you can enjoy the sea views.  From the distributor, going down to the semi-basement floor, there is a large storage room, a full bathroom and a pleasant bar area, with a bar and direct access to the pool and the barbecue area, which has a porch with capacity for between twelve and fourteen people.  This family villa has everything for you to start enjoying life in the south of Andalusia, where sunny and clear days follow one another uninterruptedly and where you will be able to infect all the cultural and gastronomic life of Malaga, the jewel of the Costa del Sun.

description: Century21 Puerta8 presents this semi-detached house with three floors located in Cantal Bajo, a few meters from Cala del Moral beach and Rincón de la Victoria El Cantal is one of the quietest and most beautiful areas to live in Cala del Moral. Imagine waking up on the seafront and taking incredible walks along the beach at sunset. Ideally located, very close to Rincón de la Victoria, where you can also find all kinds of services and only 15 minutes from Malaga. The orientation is mainly East, which makes it very bright, with which you can enjoy the best hours of sun in the morning, although the first and last floors are also West facing with incredible views of the sea, with beautiful sunsets. It has a large entrance porch, partly covered and partly outdoors with total privacy, while reading a book or enjoying a cup of coffee, eating, having barbecues, etc. On the ground floor, we will find a front patio with its porch, a large living room attached to a large multipurpose room that is open to both the living room and the kitchen, this floor also has a bathroom with a shower. On the second floor we find three bedrooms, the main one with a very large en-suite bathroom with a Jacuzzi and a dressing room. The rooms are spacious and bright. On the top floor, we find a large room next to a small laundry room and the exit to a wonderful terrace with incredible views of the sea where you can enjoy great summer nights. The house is in a private urbanization next to the beach, with a swimming pool and private parking. Do you want her? Come see it and make your offer. We remind you that you should NOT pay any type of management fee or real estate advice. description: Are you ready to wake up every morning to the peaceful sound of nature and the smell of fresh flowers?  Look no further, this charming two storey semidetached house is located in the heart of Benalmadena, between Arroyo de la Miel and the old town of Benalmadena Pueblo.  This is a perfect location for those who want to live in an area of houses only, surrounded by lush greenery and a cosy atmosphere, yet just a few minutes' drive from all amenities, including supermarkets, train station, schools and hospitals, the beach and even Malaga airport. Upon entering, you will immediately feel at home, thanks to its abundant natural light, the greenery of the garden, its colourful plants, and a sense of peace and privacy that will awaken all your senses. With 3 spacious bedrooms, there is ample space for raising a family or for those who enjoy entertaining guests. One of the unique features of this home is the fully independent bedroom located on the ground floor. This room is the perfect space for a gym, office, or even a separate studio. The possibilities of this room are many, and it is sure to meet your expectations. Upstairs, you will find the main house, with 2 double bedrooms, each with their own wardrobe, and 2 full bathrooms. The living room is spacious and has a terrace with mesmerising sea views. Can you imagine waking up every morning with these blue views of the Mediterranean? The kitchen is independent and is connected to a beautiful dining room that was added to the house. This space is surrounded by fresh green gardens, giving it a peaceful and cosy atmosphere. Although this house is in need of a total renovation, the most important features of the house will prevail. They are the charming ambience, the relaxing sea views and the total peace and tranquillity, which make this property truly special. It is the perfect project for someone who wants to put their own personal touch on the property while maintaining its unique charm and character. If you are looking for a property that you will fall in love with for all its potential, look no further, this beautiful two storey house in Benalmadena is sure to captivate your heart and leave a lasting impression. Don't miss the opportunity to make this house your new home!

On the ground floor, there is a living room with a fireplace, from which there is access to another living room on the left, although both can be joined. On this floor, there is also the kitchen and a bathroom. Outside, there is a laundry room and storage room room. On the upper floor are the four bedrooms, three of them facing south, as well as another bathroom.  In front of the two living rooms, there is a spacious terrace with sea views. Going down some stairs, there is another terrace of about 30 m² in which another relaxation area could be installed, since it has enough space and also with beautiful views.  This house can have all the comforts and is ideal for its size, comfortable for both a family and a couple. This house is built to enjoy Malaga and the unique neighbourhood of Pedregalejo.

Close to the bus stop, schools, nurseries, gyms, shops in the area, bars, University, Hospital Clínico Universitario and Hospital Carlos de Haya, green areas. The HOUSE is a two-story townhouse.On the first floor it is located at the entrance in a small hall that leads directly to the living room where there is a small office and a large dining table, connecting the living room and kitchen we have a large closet where you can take advantage of it according to taste.Next we find the kitchen, where access to the outdoor patio predominates, in said kitchen is the laundry room, and we also have a pantry room.On the upper floor there are 3 single bedrooms and one double, the double room has a dressing room and a full private bathroom.All the closets in the rooms have built-in wardrobes and large windows. QUALITIES: Perfect state of maintenance. Wooden doors. Hot water with electric thermos. OTHER DATA OF INTEREST IBI 480/year approx. Transmission regime: free. Call us 9️⃣5️⃣2️⃣4️⃣3️⃣9️⃣6️⃣4️⃣7️⃣ to go to see the house, it may surprise you.Remember that it is not the same to see the photos than reality!! description: Local house for sale in Colmenarejo Campanillas The house has 120 m² distributed in: Living room Dinning room Full kitchen full bathroom 4 bedrooms Balcony The local has 55 m², fully ready to set up your business. And 300 meters buildable, next to the garage of 30 meters. Benefits The house is located in the neighborhood of Colmenarejo (Campanillas). Ideal housing to set up your business below and your home above, hostels, supermarkets and also for the increasingly demanded investment of apartment rentals. Campanillas is located a few minutes from Malaga, it is a residential neighborhood in Malaga, although it is not lacking in services such as a health center, schools, library, supermarkets and other shops. Just 10 minutes from Malaga capital and 5 minutes from the access to the highway. This neighborhood has all kinds of shops such as: Supermarkets, clothing stores, cafes, restaurants, etc. Regarding shopping centers, we have the option of the center of Malaga, or those located on the outskirts of the city. TECHNOLOGICAL PARK OF ANDALUSIA In Campanillas you will find the Andalucía Technology Park (PTA) just 5 minutes away. That is why our neighborhood is usually a very desirable residential option for workers from other towns and provinces who come to work for companies in the park, for example to avoid taking the car to go to work. THE BEACH AND THE MOUNTAINS Campanillas is not far from these types of areas, for example we have the beaches of La Malagueta about 30 minutes away on bus line 25, or Los Álamos in Torremolinos, 10-15 minutes by car, compared to the mountain, about 25-30 minutes by car we have Los Montes de Málaga, where, in addition, we can enjoy magnificent sales with exquisite food. PUBLIC TRANSPORT AND AIRPORT Undoubtedly the bus predominates, the Malaga bus lines that pass through the Campanillas area are 18, 19 and 25, the latter two being the ones that connect with the metropolitan center, they usually pass regularly. Do not miss the opportunity, call us and our colleague Lucas Luque will accompany you to visit it. �Carmen Rosa (I.e. address: Calle Decano Ignacio Alaminos no number
description: Magnificent home located in a unique enclave in the city.Facing South, it has a cadastral area of 390 m² built and 206.76 m² useful according to the project, in addition to approximately 205 m² between gardens and terraces.The entrance from the street gives access to the spacious front porch and an ornate garden.Entering through the main door, we find a spacious hall that leads to three bright bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, lined on the inside and with air conditioning, as well as a bathroom, which has a bathtub and shower.On the other side, the main room of the house, a 30 m² living room with a fireplace and a 7.5-meter-high skylight with direct access to the porch and an office that has natural light from the skylight throughout the day and with direct access to the terrace.The kitchen is equipped with large storage cabinets, has all kinds of appliances.Attached to the kitchen is the office, which has air conditioning, views and direct access to the garden.Outside, we find a fountain in a well-kept garden in which an impressive araucaria and a chorisia stand out.It also has a shed to store garden tools. On the upper floor, we find a comfortable dressing room with three large-capacity closets and a full bathroom with shower.Next, the master bedroom with direct access to the terrace and spectacular views of the entire city of Malaga.Next we find a large ironing room and the laundry room.The terrace, in addition to a large open space with great possibilities, has a staircase through which you access a spectacular viewpoint, from where there are incomparable and unobstructed panoramic views of the entire city and the bay of Malaga. The basement has a projector with its corresponding screen anchored to the ceiling as well as a shower room and a spacious storage room almost 3 meters high.For more comfort, it has a direct exit to the community garage where the two large parking spaces are located. The entire house is built with top quality materials, such as double-glazed windows, PVC exterior carpentry, automatic blinds with individual controls and laminated flooring in most of the house.The two gardens have programmable and adjustable automatic irrigation according to the area.It also has two new solar panels that have just been installed and whose system has just been reviewed in September.It also has the installation of the Securitas Direct alarm system. The urbanization has a Día supermarket, a soccer and basketball court and a children's play area, as well as the San Pablo School, which is right at the entrance. >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> In compliance with the Decree of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of October 11, we inform that the Property Transfer Tax and Notary and Registry expenses regulated by tariff are not included in the price.If agency fees are included.We have in our team a Lawyer (Registered 6208), Property Administrator (Registered 2307) and Real Estate Agent (Registered 813) who will advise you throughout the purchase process.We Speak English.On Parle Français.

description: We present this spacious home in La Roca, a step away from the highway and just 15 minutes from the center of Malaga. Your future home has a very cozy living room, kitchen with utility room, 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, as well as a terrace. It is located in an area close to shops, schools, shopping centers, easy access to the highway and the city center. Do not wait any longer and book an appointment to visit it! *Intermediary expenses not included in the price, as well as those inherent to the sale. In compliance with the Consumer Information Regulation on the sale and rental of homes in Andalusia, it is reported that notary and registration fees, financial intermediation, representation and/or personal shopper services are not included in the price. real estate that is contracted, the expenses of management and presentation of documents before the public administrations, supply companies (water, electricity, gas, etc.) and community of owners, taxes subject to transfer such as ITP for second-hand properties (or VAT and AJD in the case of newly built properties) and other inherent expenses.In addition, the price of the fees will have to add the VAT corresponding to the service provided, except in those cases in which said application of VAT is exempt, as established for some services such as financial intermediation. It is also reported that the owners of real estate may freely accept, reject or ignore the offers/proposals they deem appropriate, for which the agency in its functions of brokerage and real estate advice is not responsible for the decisions that the parties could make or for the agreements reached between them. In the case of the sale of real estate, it is recommended to submit offers / proposals in writing that are not lower than the published price and delivering in advance at least 10% or 30% of the total price as proof of the intentions to consummate the transaction.The owner party may also take into account the financing needs of the buying party, therefore, the lower the financing need, the higher the price offered and/or the greater the quantity delivered in advance, the greater the probability that the owner party will accept the offer made by the buyer. In addition, for greater security, the amounts delivered in advance may be kept by the agency until the moment the offer is accepted by the owner or, otherwise, they will be returned to the buyer when requested in the event that the offer has been rejected or ignored. The agency is aware of the reality of the current real estate market and, therefore, we only have at the disposal of consumers the best homes at updated prices. Call now and register as a customer to receive advice and information firsthand.One of our consultants will help you in a personalized way to make this important decision.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat in La Roca

description: Located on a 6th floor and in one of the most desired districts of the centre of Malaga, a stone throw from the historical centre, the Malagueta beach and the Touristic Port, this property has been complely renovated with a contemporary and luxurious design. The renovations have finished at the end of November 2022 and today the property is ready to move in.  When entering the property, on your left hand side, a small corridor with fitted wardrobes leads to the impressive and very bright 47m2 living room. The large windows allow in plently of sunlight, as well as offering the beautiful urban views and the mountains in the background.  Walking back towards the front door, there is the modern 25m2 open plan kitchen, with a large 3,60 metres island located in the centre of the space. The kitchen is fully equipped, all sockets are concealed under the worktop and all white goods and materials are top quality.  The property counts with 3 bedrooms.  The spacious 24m2 masterbedroom is very bright and includes fitted wardrobes and indirect lighting system. From this bedroom, you access the 16m2 ensuite bathroom with double sink, shower and rainshower.  There are two additional bedrooms in the property that measure approximately 16m2 and 13m2.  There is also a second bathroom with shower and rainshower.  Additional informations of the property and the building:  All rooms have ivory coloured microcement floors, double glazed windows with solar filter. Central air conditioning and heating with heat pump. Entrance door lined on the inside with electronic peephole. Hallway with concealed doors to the rooms in exclusive wooden design and modern lighting. PROSEGUR alarm installed in the flat. Doorman and camera surveillance system in communal areas. Two lifts: main and service. Possibility of renting a garage in the same building.

description: FABULOUS INDEPENDENT HOUSE WITH POOL AND GARDEN IN MÁLAGA EAST Fortuny Hogares Únicos sells this fantastic independent house located in the Miraflores del Palo area, a quiet residential area where you will find all kinds of services, such as schools, restaurants, shops, a good connection to the highway, and in just five minutes by car you can reach the beaches of El Palo and the promenade. The property sits on a 1323m2 plot, and has a built area of 458m2, distributed over two floors. Ground floor: it has a bright 45m2 kitchen and a spacious 100m2 living room with large windows and a fireplace. First floor: it has a large entrance hall and a living area, and four fantastic bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and views of the garden. The main bedroom has a dressing room. Outside, the house has a beautiful garden with centenary trees, a 4x8m swimming pool, and a jacuzzi. The qualities that the property has are excellent, and among them we highlight sirocco wooden windows and doors, marble flooring on the ground floor and wood in the bedrooms, solar panels, security windows and air conditioning. It has three parking spaces and a storage room. This beautiful independent house is the ideal opportunity to live enjoying tranquility, surrounded by nature, but with everything you need at your fingertips. Some of the images in the ad are infographics made virtually to offer examples or ideas of decoration or reform in rooms of the property. Fortuny is at your disposal to advise you on everything you need. Energy Certificates are in process. In compliance with the RD of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of 11 October, we inform consumers that the price indicated does not include the costs derived from the purchase of the property according to the laws in force (ITP, notary fees and in the case of new construction the VAT tax). For more information, do not hesitate to contact us, we will be happy to assist you.
