description: EXCELLENCE BUILDING FROM TODAY FOREVER We present the Excellence Building consisting of 30 top quality 2 and 3 bedroom homes, parking spaces and storage rooms. Closed urbanization with swimming pool and solarium on the roof. 6-storey building where you can choose between 2 and 3-bedroom homes, from ground-floor apartments with a garden to penthouses with large terraces and a private solarium. Brand new home on the Costa Del Sol, in Arroyo de la Miel, Benalmádena, an urban and quiet area with all services.One step away you will have, schools, institutes, pharmacy, supermarkets... 900m from the Cercanías Train station, and with easy access to the Mediterranean Highway, just 10 minutes from the airport. The EXCELLENCE BUILDING stands out for its beautiful communal pool with views of the sea and the mountains in the solarium, where we will also find showers and changing rooms.Given its location, you can enjoy the sun all day and all year. The promoter is committed to the lifestyle of the community and the comfort of its neighbors, creating spaces that stand out for their exclusivity and that favor personal relationships between them, for which the common areas have taken a leading role, going one step further with spaces designed to provide maximum comfort and entertainment for owners and their loved ones. Typologies: Ground floor with garden with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms 1st, 2nd, 3rd and 4th floors with apartments with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, all with a terrace Penthouses on the 5th floor with homes with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with large terraces and all orientations with sea views. Solarium and community pool with great sea views on the 6th floor. All the houses are exterior, spacious and bright, as well as wonderful terraces. Your vehicle will be protected, thanks to the basement garage, from which you will have easy access to your home.Option to garage from 15.€000 and storage room from 3.€000 (not included in the price). Ventilated facade formed by ceramic plates, which stands out for its high quality, durable finishes, high aesthetic possibilities and indisputable advantages of thermal and acoustic insulation. Aerothermal system that works with a state-of-the-art heat pump designed to provide cooling in summer, heating in winter and hot water all year round Fully furnished American kitchen with a modern design and LED lighting under the high cabinets and equipped with all energy efficient appliances according to current times. Modern design and LED lighting in the master bedroom and living room, indirect lighting footlights are placed in the ceiling holes by means of led strips equipped with a dimmer switch in both rooms. Aluminum carpentry with thermal bridge and double glazing type "Climalit". In hall, living room, hallway and bedrooms: laminate floating flooring Very comfortable, open, spacious and bright spaces Expected delivery 1st quarter 2.024 VERIFIED QUALITY: ALL HOMES ARE SUBJECT TO A STRICT SUPERVISION BEFORE BEING DELIVERED. Do not hesitate to contact us for more information. YOUR REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT.

description: GILMAR Real Estate exclusively sells this magnificent Residencial Bisso development, located in the heart of the west of Malaga, in the Girón-Las Delicias neighborhood.Urban nature area where its streets exude tradition and preserve the familiar atmosphere of a lifetime. Residencial Bisso is an urban building conditioned for today's lifestyle, where the functionality of your home, the optimization of spaces and light are aimed at improving your life.Quality and design come together to create 23 apartments with 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms.And homes on the first floor with private patios. They have a storage room and parking space for greater comfort.In addition to well-kept common areas.The distribution follows the trends that best adapt to the current lifestyle, with a dining room connected to the kitchen and many details that make Residencial Bisso a dream home. The Residencial Biso facilities are designed for a relaxed and comfortable life adapted to all tastes.Indoor pool with a solarium area to enjoy almost all year round.A space for family, couples or friends where you can disconnect and have a good time. At Residencial Bisso you can choose between different styles of flooring, doors, tiles, kitchen furniture or separate the living room from the kitchen.Create warm spaces tailored to your needs. Residencial Bisso is designed seeking greater efficiency to reduce energy consumption, take care of the environment and provide climatic comfort within the home. It has a careful thermal envelope with state-of-the-art insulation solutions that are also combined with efficient and high-performance installations such as aerothermal energy for DHW and LED technology with a presence detector in common areas.Getting the building to have reduced energy consumption and is low in CO2 emissions.Quality standards that guarantee the comfort and enjoyment of the home. The Girón - Las Delicias neighborhood offers endless possibilities to enjoy the sea and the beach, just 800 meters from the Paseo Marítimo Antonio Banderas, and leisure, its gastronomy and its culture.Its excellent connections stand out, a few meters away we find several bus stops, the Metro and train station.10 minutes from the center of Malaga and the airport. A neighborhood that has it all, great commercial activity such as restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacies and large facilities such as public schools, libraries, health center, sports spaces.Resources that make life easier and more comfortable. Without a doubt, this is a magnificent purchase opportunity for investment or for a finalist client who wants to live in a quiet, well-connected neighborhood in the city of Malaga that is constantly being renovated.

description: Gilmar Real Estate has the privilege of presenting 107 Los Almendrales in Limonar Alto, a very modern development of 46 homes located in one of the most desirable areas in recent times in the city of Malaga. Residencial 107 Los Almendrales is located with easy access to the highway and quick communication with the Sancha promenade. This complex is characterized by an avant-garde design, a magnificent southeast orientation in all its homes and a memory of qualities that will make you enjoy the comfort of living in a home designed for your enjoyment. We propose a housing project in a single block with two stair cores, garage and storage room with 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedroom homes. The main bedrooms are en-suite with large living rooms and terraces. In addition, we have homes on higher floors that can be enjoyed in your private garden and enjoy a swimming pool and a solarium that are located on the second floor and that gives you a perspective of the most private area. The kitchens are delivered fully furnished, tiled and cladded toilets in all the homes in finishes from the prestigious Porcelanosa brand, fully installed ducted air conditioning, exterior carpentry with thermal break and efficient construction quality.

description: Unbeatably located geographically, the promotion is in a consolidated and quiet area, in an environment of wide avenues, large garden areas and sports areas. The “Taró Residential Complex” is made up of two buildings with an elegant and modern design. It is located a short distance from the beaches of Los Álamos. It has 63 homes, with 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms spread over two buildings where you can enjoy its garden areas, its paddle tennis court and its swimming pools for children and adults as a family. The "Taró Residential Complex" also has storage rooms and underground and surface parking.

description: Sancha 32 View is a private, luxury and exclusive residence, with frontal sea views, it´s the only new development on the first line in Malaga East. Sancha 32 View is located in a privileged area, between Paseo de Sancha and La Caleta Beach, on the front line, overlooking the sea, with all kinds of amenities nearby. The residence is very well connected to the main roads and the public transport of the city. One step away from the Center, from La Malagueta, Muelle Uno and Calle Larios. SANCHA 32 VIEW is a project with clean and careful lines, respecting the original through a façade restoration, which helps us to regain the value of the building in the East area. With modern and functional design and distribution, with wide spaces. With access both from Paseo Sancha and Paseo Marítimo Pablo Ruiz Picasso, it's a house with four luxurious apartments of 2; 3 or 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a terrace, with sea-views. Luxury finishes, with details such as illuminated niches in the shower, built-in taps, flush shower tray, decorated ceilings with coves, embedded skirting boards, continuous large-format flooring throughout. Special design packs for upgrades are available to customize the apartment even further. The apartment comes with a private parking space, with electric[ charger, as well as storage room, there is also the possibility of acquiring a space for a second car. Our clients are offered a premium service with a personal home decorator for interior design of your home. A 10% VAT is added to the prices published All images offered are for indicative purposes and not binding. The decoration, furniture, lighting and customization packs undertaken are not included in the sale price of the apartment. The design packs for personal customization might increase the published price of the apartment.

Great comforts and style await you in every corner of this project of 25 homes with 1 to 4 bedrooms. description: Totally renovated Ground Floor Apartment with large private terrace in one of the most sought-after communities in Torrequebrada, Benalmádena Costa! The apartment has a fantastic partially covered terrace with plenty of space for outdoor dining, sun bathing and more, a large lounge with dining area, separate kitchen, master bedroom with ensuite bathroom, a second bedroom and a second bathroom. Both bedrooms and the lounge have direct access to the terrace. All floors are brand new, as well as the central air-conditioning, bathrooms and kitchen and modern, tasteful materials and finishes have been used throughout. The apartment comes with two private parking spaces and two storage rooms included in the price. A real gem of a property that will sell fast, so book a viewing today!

description: Spacious Townhouse in Rincón de la Victoria, Magnolia street. On the entrance porch there is a barbecue and a relaxation area. The house is distributed on the main floor, first floor and basement. It has a large living room with fireplace and extraordinary views! On this floor there is also a fully independent kitchen equipped with all its appliances, and a toilet. Next, the first floor consists of 4 large bedrooms with wardrobes and a bathroom. The basement is currently all open-plan, with a work area, games, laundry room and separate bathroom and could be adapted for any purpose. The house is located in an urbanization with common areas and a community pool. It is a great opportunity to enjoy a spacious chalet! Everything will be very close, shops, restaurants, health center, pharmacies, beach bars, schools... Very quick access to the Autovía del Mediterráneo. Come see it, you will love it! I will be happy to be able to guide you for free, throughout the purchase process and if you need to finance the purchase of this property, we have an experienced mortgage advisory department to offer you the best financing on the market. In compliance with R. D. of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of October 11, which approves the regulation of consumer information in the purchase, sale and lease of homes in Andalusia, the client is informed that in our office the Abbreviated Information Document is available ( d. I. TO. ). The price of the house does not include the purchase and sale expenses (notary, registry and I. T. P. ). There are no additional real estate brokerage fees to the sale price.

description: EXCELLENCE BUILDING FROM TODAY FOREVER We present the Excellence Building consisting of 30 top quality 2 and 3 bedroom homes, parking spaces and storage rooms. Closed urbanization with swimming pool and solarium on the roof. 6-storey building where you can choose between 2 and 3-bedroom homes, from ground-floor apartments with a garden to penthouses with large terraces and a private solarium. Brand new home on the Costa Del Sol, in Arroyo de la Miel, Benalmádena, an urban and quiet area with all services.One step away you will have, schools, institutes, pharmacy, supermarkets... 900m from the Cercanías Train station, and with easy access to the Mediterranean Highway, just 10 minutes from the airport. The EXCELLENCE BUILDING stands out for its beautiful communal pool with views of the sea and the mountains in the solarium, where we will also find showers and changing rooms.Given its location, you can enjoy the sun all day and all year. The promoter is committed to the lifestyle of the community and the comfort of its neighbors, creating spaces that stand out for their exclusivity and that favor personal relationships between them, for which the common areas have taken a leading role, going one step further with spaces designed to provide maximum comfort and entertainment for owners and their loved ones. Typologies: Ground floor with garden with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms 1st, 2nd, 3rd and 4th floors with apartments with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, all with a terrace Penthouses on the 5th floor with homes with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with large terraces and all orientations with sea views. Solarium and community pool with great sea views on the 6th floor. All the houses are exterior, spacious and bright, as well as wonderful terraces. Your vehicle will be protected, thanks to the basement garage, from which you will have easy access to your home.Option to garage from 15.€000 and storage room from 3.€000 (not included in the price). Ventilated facade formed by ceramic plates, which stands out for its high quality, durable finishes, high aesthetic possibilities and indisputable advantages of thermal and acoustic insulation. Aerothermal system that works with a state-of-the-art heat pump designed to provide cooling in summer, heating in winter and hot water all year round Fully furnished American kitchen with a modern design and LED lighting under the high cabinets and equipped with all energy efficient appliances according to current times. Modern design and LED lighting in the master bedroom and living room, indirect lighting footlights are placed in the ceiling holes by means of led strips equipped with a dimmer switch in both rooms. Aluminum carpentry with thermal bridge and double glazing type "Climalit". In hall, living room, hallway and bedrooms: laminate floating flooring Very comfortable, open, spacious and bright spaces Expected delivery 1st quarter 2.024 VERIFIED QUALITY: ALL HOMES ARE SUBJECT TO A STRICT SUPERVISION BEFORE BEING DELIVERED. Do not hesitate to contact us for more information. YOUR REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT.

description: The Cortijo del Conde Urbanization is located in Chilches Costa, one of the most privileged enclaves on the Costa del Sol (a step away from Rincón de la Victoria), where the new Marinsa Cortijo del Conde complex will be built, which will soon be a reality. The building will be made on a plot of more than 21.000 m2, 200 m from the beach, 25 minutes from Malaga, 30 from the airport, with direct access to the N-340 and A7 roads and very close to shopping centers and golf courses. Marinsa Cortijo del Conde is an avant-garde design project, perfectly adapted to the natural environment, consisting of 54 semi-detached houses with 4 bedrooms (one of them on the ground floor), 3 full bathrooms and a fitted kitchen. It is distributed in blocks of 20 units and the first phase, with a building permit, will begin construction immediately. All homes have large landscaped plots, terraces, private parking and a cellar - cellar. The complex is equipped with excellent common areas with swimming pools, private gardens, social club, paddle tennis court, sports court and solarium. Marinsa Cortijo del Conde is a residential complex located in an unbeatable environment. High quality materials, optimal use of space, bright houses and warm interiors, will give privacy, tranquility and quality of life to you and your family. ** General information_ The consumer has the right to obtain a copy of DIA in accordance with Decree 218/2005, at our office located at Calle del Río 3 in Vélez Málaga. * In compliance with Decree 218/2005, of October 11, which approves the Consumer Information Regulation on the sale and lease of homes in Andalusia, the client is informed that the notarial, registry and tax expenses that are of application (ITP or VAT + AJD) and other expenses inherent to the sale are not included in the price. The agency's professional fees are included. Validity of prices 7 days, subject to availability and confirmation by owners. It is considered that the description and prices indicated for the properties for sale on this website are correct. However, the information contained in this website may be subject to errors or omissions. Properties may be subject to price change, sale or withdrawal from the market.

description: GILMAR Real Estate exclusively sells this magnificent Residencial Bisso development, located in the heart of the west of Malaga, in the Girón-Las Delicias neighborhood.Urban nature area where its streets exude tradition and preserve the familiar atmosphere of a lifetime. Residencial Bisso is an urban building conditioned for today's lifestyle, where the functionality of your home, the optimization of spaces and light are aimed at improving your life.Quality and design come together to create 23 apartments with 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms.And homes on the first floor with private patios. They have a storage room and parking space for greater comfort.In addition to well-kept common areas.The distribution follows the trends that best adapt to the current lifestyle, with a dining room connected to the kitchen and many details that make Residencial Bisso a dream home. The Residencial Biso facilities are designed for a relaxed and comfortable life adapted to all tastes.Indoor pool with a solarium area to enjoy almost all year round.A space for family, couples or friends where you can disconnect and have a good time. At Residencial Bisso you can choose between different styles of flooring, doors, tiles, kitchen furniture or separate the living room from the kitchen.Create warm spaces tailored to your needs. Residencial Bisso is designed seeking greater efficiency to reduce energy consumption, take care of the environment and provide climatic comfort within the home. It has a careful thermal envelope with state-of-the-art insulation solutions that are also combined with efficient and high-performance installations such as aerothermal energy for DHW and LED technology with a presence detector in common areas.Getting the building to have reduced energy consumption and is low in CO2 emissions.Quality standards that guarantee the comfort and enjoyment of the home. The Girón - Las Delicias neighborhood offers endless possibilities to enjoy the sea and the beach, just 800 meters from the Paseo Marítimo Antonio Banderas, and leisure, its gastronomy and its culture.Its excellent connections stand out, a few meters away we find several bus stops, the Metro and train station.10 minutes from the center of Malaga and the airport. A neighborhood that has it all, great commercial activity such as restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacies and large facilities such as public schools, libraries, health center, sports spaces.Resources that make life easier and more comfortable. Without a doubt, this is a magnificent purchase opportunity for investment or for a finalist client who wants to live in a quiet, well-connected neighborhood in the city of Malaga that is constantly being renovated.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Girón - Las Delicias - Pacífico, Málaga
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle José Bisso, 3

description: Villa in Torremolinos with private pool at 200m walking distance to El Pinillo train station and all amenities. El Pinillo in Torremolinos is a very quiet area close to Benalmadena Pueblo and Playa Mar. This area has all kinds of shops, restaurants, and very good communication.  Distance to the airport is 5km, Malaga Coast, and Capital with Ave connection at 10km. This Villa stands out for its excellent location and the tranquillity of this particular area, also within walking distance of all amenities.  The villa is distributed over 2 floors with 4 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 2 bathrooms, and 1 guest toilet, in addition, this villa includes an independent 1 bedroom flat located at the back side of the villa.  On the main floor of the Villa are an independent kitchen, 1 bathroom with shower, 1 toilet, and the living-dining room with fireplace and access to a large terrace that adjoins the garden with a swimming pool and a nice porch. The garden offers a good variety of different plants and the pool, the garden is sunny most of the year as is a corner Villa that enjoys a south west facing. On the upper floor, there are 4 double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and an exterior bathroom with a bathtub. All the bedrooms have air conditioning hot and cold. The windows are originally wooden but in a good state of conservation. The independent flat offers 1 bedroom with bathroom en suite and terrace; the living room has a French kitchen and a storeroom.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Pinillo, Torremolinos

description: EXCELLENCE BUILDING FROM TODAY FOREVER We present the Excellence Building consisting of 30 top quality 2 and 3 bedroom homes, parking spaces and storage rooms. Closed urbanization with swimming pool and solarium on the roof. 6-storey building where you can choose between 2 and 3-bedroom homes, from ground-floor apartments with a garden to penthouses with large terraces and a private solarium. Brand new home on the Costa Del Sol, in Arroyo de la Miel, Benalmádena, an urban and quiet area with all services.One step away you will have, schools, institutes, pharmacy, supermarkets... 900m from the Cercanías Train station, and with easy access to the Mediterranean Highway, just 10 minutes from the airport. The EXCELLENCE BUILDING stands out for its beautiful communal pool with views of the sea and the mountains in the solarium, where we will also find showers and changing rooms.Given its location, you can enjoy the sun all day and all year. The promoter is committed to the lifestyle of the community and the comfort of its neighbors, creating spaces that stand out for their exclusivity and that favor personal relationships between them, for which the common areas have taken a leading role, going one step further with spaces designed to provide maximum comfort and entertainment for owners and their loved ones. Typologies: Ground floor with garden with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms 1st, 2nd, 3rd and 4th floors with apartments with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, all with a terrace Penthouses on the 5th floor with homes with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with large terraces and all orientations with sea views. Solarium and community pool with great sea views on the 6th floor. All the houses are exterior, spacious and bright, as well as wonderful terraces. Your vehicle will be protected, thanks to the basement garage, from which you will have easy access to your home.Option to garage from 15.€000 and storage room from 3.€000 (not included in the price). Ventilated facade formed by ceramic plates, which stands out for its high quality, durable finishes, high aesthetic possibilities and indisputable advantages of thermal and acoustic insulation. Aerothermal system that works with a state-of-the-art heat pump designed to provide cooling in summer, heating in winter and hot water all year round Fully furnished American kitchen with a modern design and LED lighting under the high cabinets and equipped with all energy efficient appliances according to current times. Modern design and LED lighting in the master bedroom and living room, indirect lighting footlights are placed in the ceiling holes by means of led strips equipped with a dimmer switch in both rooms. Aluminum carpentry with thermal bridge and double glazing type "Climalit". In hall, living room, hallway and bedrooms: laminate floating flooring Very comfortable, open, spacious and bright spaces Expected delivery 1st quarter 2.024 VERIFIED QUALITY: ALL HOMES ARE SUBJECT TO A STRICT SUPERVISION BEFORE BEING DELIVERED. Do not hesitate to contact us for more information. YOUR REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT.

description: The Cortijo del Conde Urbanization is located in Chilches Costa, one of the most privileged enclaves on the Costa del Sol (a step away from Rincón de la Victoria), where the new Marinsa Cortijo del Conde complex will be built, which will soon be a reality. The building will be made on a plot of more than 21.000 m2, 200 m from the beach, 25 minutes from Malaga, 30 from the airport, with direct access to the N-340 and A7 roads and very close to shopping centers and golf courses. Marinsa Cortijo del Conde is an avant-garde design project, perfectly adapted to the natural environment, consisting of 54 semi-detached houses with 4 bedrooms (one of them on the ground floor), 3 full bathrooms and a fitted kitchen. It is distributed in blocks of 20 units and the first phase, with a building permit, will begin construction immediately. All homes have large landscaped plots, terraces, private parking and a cellar - cellar. The complex is equipped with excellent common areas with swimming pools, private gardens, social club, paddle tennis court, sports court and solarium. Marinsa Cortijo del Conde is a residential complex located in an unbeatable environment. description: GILMAR Real Estate exclusively sells this magnificent Residencial Bisso development, located in the heart of the west of Malaga, in the Girón-Las Delicias neighborhood.Urban nature area where its streets exude tradition and preserve the familiar atmosphere of a lifetime. Residencial Bisso is an urban building conditioned for today's lifestyle, where the functionality of your home, the optimization of spaces and light are aimed at improving your life.Quality and design come together to create 23 apartments with 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms.And homes on the first floor with private patios. They have a storage room and parking space for greater comfort.In addition to well-kept common areas.The distribution follows the trends that best adapt to the current lifestyle, with a dining room connected to the kitchen and many details that make Residencial Bisso a dream home. The Residencial Biso facilities are designed for a relaxed and comfortable life adapted to all tastes.Indoor pool with a solarium area to enjoy almost all year round.A space for family, couples or friends where you can disconnect and have a good time. At Residencial Bisso you can choose between different styles of flooring, doors, tiles, kitchen furniture or separate the living room from the kitchen.Create warm spaces tailored to your needs. Residencial Bisso is designed seeking greater efficiency to reduce energy consumption, take care of the environment and provide climatic comfort within the home. It has a careful thermal envelope with state-of-the-art insulation solutions that are also combined with efficient and high-performance installations such as aerothermal energy for DHW and LED technology with a presence detector in common areas.Getting the building to have reduced energy consumption and is low in CO2 emissions.Quality standards that guarantee the comfort and enjoyment of the home. The Girón - Las Delicias neighborhood offers endless possibilities to enjoy the sea and the beach, just 800 meters from the Paseo Marítimo Antonio Banderas, and leisure, its gastronomy and its culture.Its excellent connections stand out, a few meters away we find several bus stops, the Metro and train station.10 minutes from the center of Malaga and the airport. A neighborhood that has it all, great commercial activity such as restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacies and large facilities such as public schools, libraries, health center, sports spaces.Resources that make life easier and more comfortable. Without a doubt, this is a magnificent purchase opportunity for investment or for a finalist client who wants to live in a quiet, well-connected neighborhood in the city of Malaga that is constantly being renovated.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Girón - Las Delicias - Pacífico, Málaga

description: Villa in Torremolinos with private pool at 200m walking distance to El Pinillo train station and all amenities. El Pinillo in Torremolinos is a very quiet area close to Benalmadena Pueblo and Playa Mar. This area has all kinds of shops, restaurants, and very good communication.  Distance to the airport is 5km, Malaga Coast, and Capital with Ave connection at 10km. This Villa stands out for its excellent location and the tranquillity of this particular area, also within walking distance of all amenities.  The villa is distributed over 2 floors with 4 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 2 bathrooms, and 1 guest toilet, in addition, this villa includes an independent 1 bedroom flat located at the back side of the villa.  On the main floor of the Villa are an independent kitchen, 1 bathroom with shower, 1 toilet, and the living-dining room with fireplace and access to a large terrace that adjoins the garden with a swimming pool and a nice porch. The garden offers a good variety of different plants and the pool, the garden is sunny most of the year as is a corner Villa that enjoys a south west facing. On the upper floor, there are 4 double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and an exterior bathroom with a bathtub. All the bedrooms have air conditioning hot and cold. The windows are originally wooden but in a good state of conservation. The independent flat offers 1 bedroom with bathroom en suite and terrace; the living room has a French kitchen and a storeroom.

description: Sancha 32 View is a private, luxury and exclusive residence, with frontal sea views, it´s the only new development on the first line in Malaga East. Sancha 32 View is located in a privileged area, between Paseo de Sancha and La Caleta Beach, on the front line, overlooking the sea, with all kinds of amenities nearby. The residence is very well connected to the main roads and the public transport of the city. One step away from the Center, from La Malagueta, Muelle Uno and Calle Larios. SANCHA 32 VIEW is a project with clean and careful lines, respecting the original through a façade restoration, which helps us to regain the value of the building in the East area. With modern and functional design and distribution, with wide spaces. With access both from Paseo Sancha and Paseo Marítimo Pablo Ruiz Picasso, it's a house with four luxurious apartments of 2; 3 or 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a terrace, with sea-views. Luxury finishes, with details such as illuminated niches in the shower, built-in taps, flush shower tray, decorated ceilings with coves, embedded skirting boards, continuous large-format flooring throughout. Special design packs for upgrades are available to customize the apartment even further. The apartment comes with a private parking space, with electric[ charger, as well as storage room, there is also the possibility of acquiring a space for a second car. Our clients are offered a premium service with a personal home decorator for interior design of your home. A 10% VAT is added to the prices published All images offered are for indicative purposes and not binding. description: BEAUTIFUL, COZY, LARGE INDEPENDENT HOUSE WITH GARDEN AND SWIMMING POOL WITH MAGNIFICENT SEA VIEWS LOCATED IN RINCÓN DE LA VICTORIA, MÁLAGA. IT HAS A TOURIST LICENSE FOR THE HOLIDAY ACTIVITY. Fortuny Hogares Únicos presents this comfortable and sunny independent house in Torre de Benagalbón, Rincón de la Victoria. The location of the house is ideal, just five minutes from the motorway towards Malaga, 15 minutes from the Historic Center of the Capital and 30 minutes from the international airport of Malaga - Costa del Sol. In the surroundings of the property, you will find all kinds of services such as schools, nurseries, shops, park areas, supermarkets, and sports centres such as Padel Añoreta Golf and very popular golf courses. The southeast-facing property sits on a 648m2 plot and has a total built area of 266m2 and 230m2 useful distributed over two floors that we detail below. Main floor: We access the house through a large entrance hall, spacious, bright and comfortable living room with a fireplace and multiple oval windows with wonderful views of the sea and Andalusian nature, a fully furnished American kitchen equipped with appliances, a dining room with access to the exterior terrace of the property, two large bedrooms and a complete bathroom with a shower. Ground floor: This floor is accessed from the staircase in the living room on the main floor. Here we find an apartment, distributed in a spacious and very bright living room with large windows and direct access to the private garden, a large bedroom with access to the pool and a complete bathroom. The qualities of the house are excellent. Among them, we highlight double glazed windows, a fireplace in the living room, a kitchen equipped with high-end furniture and appliances, and fitted wardrobes. Outside the house, we find a large and very pleasant garden area with mature vegetation, where you can enjoy the barbecue with your family and friends and the beautiful pool with a chill-out area. The covered terrace is the ideal space for Sunday meals, contemplating the splendid views of the sea and the sunsets. In the garden area, we find a storage room, a laundry room and a bathroom with a shower, very well-studied spaces for storage, a service area for a holiday activity or as a way to dispose of household cleaning. The property has a large garage with an automatic gate on the main street level. The house has a tourism license and is currently rented for the summer season. It is a great opportunity for investment with excellent profitability or as a family home in a privileged area. In compliance with the RD of the Junta de Andalucía 218/2005 of 11 October, we inform consumers that the price indicated does not include the costs derived from the purchase of the property according to the laws in force (ITP, notary fees and in the case of new construction the VAT tax). For more information, do not hesitate to contact us. We will be happy to assist you.

description: "TERRACED HOUSE WITH GARDEN IN THE BENALGOLF URBANIZATION" Nice semi-detached house with garden, located in the Benalgolf - Torrequebrada urbanization in Benalmádena, on the second line of the beach with shops, businesses and a bus stop nearby. This urbanization, with large gardens and community pool, has surveillance and maintenance of both the common areas and the private gardens of private homes. South orientation. It has a large corner garden with barbecue area. The townhouse is distributed over 2 floors, (possibility of building a basement) with a terrace in the main room with excellent views of the sea. From the main entrance, you access the ground floor that is distributed in a full bathroom with shower, laundry room, room on this floor, with direct access to the garden. Full kitchen with serving hatch and very bright living room with fireplace with access to the back garden. On the upper floor, we find 2 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes. The main one with a terrace overlooking the sea. Bathroom with bathtub on this floor. Fantastic common areas, with a large swimming pool with a lawn area and a beach bar area with a lifeguard. * In compliance with the Decree of the Junta de Andalucía 2182005 of October 11, the client is informed that notary, registry, ITP expenses and all those expenses inherent to the purchase are not included in the price. * *Agency fees are included in the advertised price*.

description: Magnificent villa! , in the heart of Malaga, is located a few minutes from the well-known and fantastic beaches of Torremolinos, just two kilometers from the airport, next to the Plaza Mayor shopping center, in an incredible enclave to enjoy each sunrise and sunset, while in the background you can see the sea, the entire bay of Malaga and the port, a spectacle of colors that now you too can experience and be the protagonist. It is a villa built on one floor initially, but it has undergone a reform in which every corner has been used and which can be accessed from different areas of the house, avoiding the stairs if you wish, which has spacious rooms all personalized, with different accents that make you enjoy every corner that is presented and transport you creating a home at every step. It has 4 rooms-living rooms in the upper part of the house and 2 more in the lower part of the plot (house), the two main rooms open in front of a magnificent terrace with a balustrade, it also has 8 double rooms, all with wardrobes. built-in, (4 of them in the highest part of the house and 4 in the lowest part of the house) 5 bathrooms, (3 complete and a toilet in the highest part and two bathrooms and two toilets in the lowest part of the house), two dressing rooms in the upper part and in the lower part we discover a play area, cinema, gym, laundry room, basement and two kitchens plus one inside and one outside in the private pool area that appears impressive next to chill area and bar where you can enjoy family gatherings, friends, events. It has a garden area to enjoy the long hours of sunlight, which the Costa del Sol offers us, in addition, the plot has a tennis and multi-sports court, it is an idyllic home that does not leave you indifferent and invites you to enjoy and celebrate every day. What if it is the home of your dreams? ✷✴? description: We present this beautiful and magnificent Duplex Penthouse in the Añoreta area, where you can enjoy the space it offers with unbeatable views. We directly access the main floor of the house, where we find a bright and spacious living-dining room with a fireplace where, from it, we access a large terrace with impressive views. It has a modern open kitchen and a charming toilet. The ground floor has an impeccable and large master bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and an en-suite bathroom. In addition, two beautiful bedrooms, one of them with a small dressing room and the other with a built-in wardrobe. In the common area there is a large bathroom and a storage closet. On its highest floor, it has a room for laundry and a spectacular solarium, adapted with a bar and barbecue area to continue enjoying the privileged panoramic views that this property offers us. The house has a garage space included in the price and another optional space. It is located within a well-kept urbanization, ideal for individuals or families seeking tranquility, close to all kinds of services and with immediate access to the Mediterranean highway, 3 minutes from the beach, approximately 20 minutes from the center of Malaga and 25 minutes from your international airport. Do not hesitate to visit it and be surprised! I will be happy to be able to guide you for free, throughout the purchase process and if you need to finance the purchase of this property, we have an experienced mortgage advisory department to offer you the best financing on the market. description: We present this exclusive property built on a completely level plot of 942m2, the villa is made up of 3 floors, it has views of the sea and the mountains, it has 5 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, 2 extra bathrooms, a spacious living-dining room with a wood-burning fireplace, gas with remote control, open to a covered and closed terrace with lighting system, large fully equipped kitchen with access to the pool and garden, barbecue area with thatched African reed, outdoor play area for children, Finnish sauna, Turkish bath with chromotherapy, poker room, massage room with access to an extraordinary terrace with sea views, in the basement there is a large games room, cellar area, machine room, large storage room and closed garage. It also has a laundry room and a totally independent 74m2 apartment that has 1 bedroom, living room, bathroom and kitchen. It has pre-installation to install an elevator. All the materials are of the highest quality with an infinite number of details, such as the windows with electric shutters and mosquito nets, led lighting, independent air conditioning by plants. The pool has a counter current swimming system, a spa jet, saline water and an automatic bottom cleaning system. It has armored doors, interior and exterior alarm with surveillance, drinking and river water tanks, solar panels, water softener system, osmosis system and much more. The location is quiet and has a quick connection to the highway and the Malaga International Airport, very close to Plaza Mayor and golf courses. It has a private school a few minutes walk away and the urbanization has 24-hour surveillance. The beach is a 5-minute drive away.

description: Penthouse located in the Arenal Golf second phase urbanization in the Montealto area, 5 minutes by car from the Center of Benalmádena, 5 minutes from the Malaga and Marbella highway, 20 minutes walk from the sea. Privileged south orientation, privacy and away from noise. Year of construction 2006. Third last floor with elevator. It has two parking lots. Ceiling height 2.6m. A 6m2 corridor leads to a spacious 21m2 living room with access to a large 49m2 terrace with panoramic views of the sea and golf courses. Two rooms: 9 and 12m2. Two bathrooms: 5 and 3m2. Furnished and equipped kitchen of 8m2. Built-in cabinets. Terrace, living room, bathroom and two rooms facing south, the sun enters in winter from 8:00 a. m. to 7:00 p. m. , in summer, as it is south-facing, it does not enter the house. The air conditioning duct works with two hot and cold air conditioning units The price includes two parking spaces located together on the -1 floor of the building. The urbanization has 5 swimming pools, an 18-hole golf course, a gym, a social club, a playground, paddle tennis and tennis courts. The use of these facilities is included in the community price. Private security at night, security cameras in the building. Novaschool Benalmádena Bilingual Private School is a 5-minute walk away, Mariana Pineda Public School is a 5-minute walk away, Mercadona supermarket is a 3-minute drive away, Xanit International Hospital is a 5-minute walk away. Community expenses 143/month. IBI 893/year.

description: Are you looking for a spacious apartment with sea views in the towers of Playamar Torremolinos? . We offer a bright, high floor with 2 bedrooms and two bathrooms of 115m2 with wonderful sea and mountain views.  Nice and charming kitchen, with renovated plumbing and appliances In perfect condition from top brands. Large bright dining room with double-glazed windows and blinds with room for several sofas, with a terrace where you can receive and spend good afternoons with family and friends.  Bathrooms with direct light, double windows, screens new glass and renovated plumbing. One en suite. The bedrooms include built-in wardrobes made to measure with wooden Venetian doors and interior also lined with wood in both rooms. The entire house except the closed balconies have wooden flooring in perfect condition. The balconies have wooden flooring. ceramic imitating wood less than 3 years old. The house has another terrace currently used as an office with unobstructed views of the sea. This office can also be used as a guest bedroom since it has an enclosure and shutters.  Double glazing surrounding the entire house and central hot and cold air conditioning.  The urbanization consists of about 27,000 square meters, with several swimming pools with picnic tables, umbrellas, Hammocks, leafy trees, playground, mini golf, 2 tennis courts, ping-pong tables, basketball court and beach bar for the days when you don't want to cook. At the exit of the enclosure we will find two supermarkets (Mercadona and Carrefour ), pharmacy, taxis, several restaurants (Vietnamese, Italian, Indian... ), bus stop, cafeterias and Bajondillo beach 150m away. You can park throughout the premises, with a license plate reader, two cars per apartment  The community fees includes water, electricity, garbage collection on the same floor daily, security surveillance and maintenance. Do you want to know more details about this fantastic home? . Do not hesitate and contact us, we are looking forward to introducing you to your new home!

Next to the Antonio Banderas Promenade, just at the confluence of Pacifico and Cañada del Tesoro streets, a unique environment that offers not only the advantages of living within walking distance of the urban center, but also the best of living in a city with Sea: the beach just 50 meters from your house. Located in the Pacific district, Residencial Oceanía is just a few meters from the Paseo Marítimo, Playa de la Misericordia and Parque del Oeste. description: Our project of 6 exclusive villas is located in the unique setting of the protected pine forest of Pinares de San Antón, one of the most exclusive residential areas in Málaga, from where you can enjoy a breath-taking view of the sea, the mountains and city, yet only a few minutes from the city centre, which allows easy access to the wide range of services that Málaga has to offer. The architectural concept of our villas is focused on a harmonious fusion with nature, which blends beautifully between indoor and outdoor living space. Natural light is the key element that draws the spaces, flowing through the wide doors and windows thanks to a south-west orientation, with exclusive views of the sea, the city and the pine tree covered mountains. A perfect blend between Location and Nature. The perfect circulation between the zones is orchestrated by an open space on the first floor that connects the living and dining areas, with access to a large terrace with a swimming pool and gardens.   The rooms, on the second floor, are designed to provide maximum space and comfort. This feeling is especially important in the master suite, which has a dressing area and its own bathroom. In all of them, the views of the sea and the city will make us feel that we live in paradise. The effort to perfectly illuminate the entire interior of the villa, thanks to the large. Location: 2 min from Tennis Club Malaga 5 min from international schools 5 min supermarkets 5 minutos beach 10 min shopping centres 10 minutos downtown 15 min Airport Málaga With cultural experiences (Museo Picasso, Museo Carmen Thyssen, Centre Pompidou Malaga), numerous recreational and sports facilities, many Tennis Clubs, several Marina’s, golf courses, shopping centres, international schools, and medical centres, city and rural sandy beaches, international airport, etc. , Málaga has quickly become one of the most exciting and authentic cities in Spain for investment (most recently Google & Vodafone) and residential living.

description: Living in the city of Malaga, on the beachfront, in an exclusive development and with a swimming pool on the roof, is more than a dream.Thus, our Habitat TorreMare development will have around 100 homes to make this dream a reality very soon. Habitat TorreMare offers unique and exclusive homes in which a modern and open distribution stands out, in which every detail has been taken care of to optimize the comfort of the owners.Thus, the houses have living rooms that open onto the terraces and also with impressive windows that let the light and the sea enter directly into the home. The promotion also stands out for its impressive common areas.Thus, on the roof of Habitat TorreMare there is an exclusive swimming pool, where you can relax and unwind without leaving your own home.In addition, the promotion will have different options so that you can enjoy your leisure time, such as a gym, multipurpose room and gardens. The new development will be located in the area of El Pato- La Térmica, an area that is in full expansion both for its excellent facilities (such as the New Guadalhorce River Footbridge or the new Poniente Seafront) and for the real estate development that is experiencing and in which new prestigious developments such as Habitat Torre Mare stand out. In addition, the area is perfectly connected, both by public transport (by metro and bus), and by road, with its close access to the A-7, the A-45 and the M-20 Malaga ring road.And of course we must also highlight the new connections on foot, which allow you to walk the entire Paseo Marítimo. The promotion has all the necessary services in the area and, in addition, it is close to different points of interest such as the Los Patios Shopping Center, the Plaza Mayor Shopping Center, the Parador de Málaga Golf Club and also sports facilities such as the Palace Sports Martin Carpena, Inacua and Ciudad de Málaga Stadium in its surroundings.Five kilometers away is the city's train station and five minutes by car from Malaga international airport. Living in the city of Malaga means enjoying 365 days a year in a cosmopolitan city where you will find endless cultural, gastronomic and leisure options.All this, combined, of course, with its pleasant climate, perfect for enjoying the sea, the beach and nature. Without a doubt, Habitat TorreMare is the perfect option for those looking to enjoy a unique development, which offers exclusive and designer homes, where they can wake up every morning looking at the sea. *The image is indicative and does not necessarily correspond to the characteristics of the future homes.

description: SUPER GROUND APARTMENT WITH PATIO AND PARKING IN THE CENTER OF ALHAURIN DE LA TORRE This apartment is wonderfully located in the very center of Alhaurin de la Torre, with all services very close, shops, banks, pharmacies, banks, Town Hall, health center, and also the building is adapted for people with reduced mobility, not having a step from the entrance to the house. Ideal for both young and older couples. It also has an elevator to the garage and parking space. The apartment is in excellent condition and is very well distributed with no corridors that take up space. At the entrance to the house we find a spacious living room that connects as we said with the rest of the rooms. Bedroom with built-in wardrobe and window to the outside. Full bathroom with a large shower with screen and bidet. Independent kitchen furnished and with space for a small breakfast table. From the kitchen we would go to a charming covered patio with a transparent skylight and a water collection channel, an ideal place for breakfasts and dinners. The house has centralized air conditioning (hot / cold), aluminum windows with double glazing, hot water by electric water heater and both living room and bedroom with exterior window. Includes parking space. An ideal apartment, to enter directly to live without the need to make any modifications. * In compliance with the Decree of the Junta de Andalucía 2182005 of October 11, the client is informed that notary, registry, ITP expenses and all those expenses inherent to the purchase are not included in the price. ** Agency fees are included in the advertised price.

description: Our project of 6 exclusive villas is located in the unique setting of the protected pine forest of Pinares de San Antón, one of the most exclusive residential areas in Málaga, from where you can enjoy a breath-taking view of the sea, the mountains and city, yet only a few minutes from the city centre, which allows easy access to the wide range of services that Málaga has to offer. The architectural concept of our villas is focused on a harmonious fusion with nature, which blends beautifully between indoor and outdoor living space. Natural light is the key element that draws the spaces, flowing through the wide doors and windows thanks to a south-west orientation, with exclusive views of the sea, the city and the pine tree covered mountains. A perfect blend between Location and Nature. The perfect circulation between the zones is orchestrated by an open space on the first floor that connects the living and dining areas, with access to a large terrace with a swimming pool and gardens.   The rooms, on the second floor, are designed to provide maximum space and comfort. This feeling is especially important in the master suite, which has a dressing area and its own bathroom. In all of them, the views of the sea and the city will make us feel that we live in paradise. The effort to perfectly illuminate the entire interior of the villa, thanks to the large. Location: 2 min from Tennis Club Malaga 5 min from international schools 5 min supermarkets 5 minutos beach 10 min shopping centres 10 minutos downtown 15 min Airport Málaga With cultural experiences (Museo Picasso, Museo Carmen Thyssen, Centre Pompidou Malaga), numerous recreational and sports facilities, many Tennis Clubs, several Marina’s, golf courses, shopping centres, international schools, and medical centres, city and rural sandy beaches, international airport, etc. , Málaga has quickly become one of the most exciting and authentic cities in Spain for investment (most recently Google & Vodafone) and residential living.

description: We invite you to take a look at our unique offer! Excellent Villa in a comfortable and quiet area of Cortijo Torrequebrada in Benalmadena Costa with 6 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms. Ideal for both families and rentals. It is located just a few minutes walk from the beach of Benalmádena. In addition, there are various entertainment in the area: two aquariums, a casino, a cable car, the largest marina, Puerto Marina, where there are many restaurants, bars, shops, a Ferris wheel and the new Al-Baitar Nature Park. With an area of 23 hectares. In addition, international schools and hospitals are located here. The city has very thoughtful and convenient transport links that connect the area with nearby cities: Fuengirola, Torremolinos, Malaga. Malaga airport is a 20-minute drive away. The villa is very bright, cozy, has a unique interior, large indoor and outdoor spaces, terraces with magnificent views, as well as a beautiful garden and pool. address: Calle Amalia Heredia, 1 esquina C/ Cañada del Tesoro  no number
description: 37 flats of new construction IN ONE OF THE BEST AREAS OF THE CITY, 150 METERS FROM THE BEACH High-rise homes with 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms, with magnificent terraces, in a private urbanization, with a swimming pool and gardens. Located in the center of Malaga, on Calle Amalia Heredia 1, corner of Calle Cañada del Tesoro. The apartments are distributed on the ground floor and 6 floors + attic, configuring a single portal. All homes are exterior. The project is designed to achieve optimal sunlight and adequate ventilation of the houses. Pedestrian access to the plot is through a single door, which favors the safety of the farm and its future inhabitants. Once in the urbanization, it is accessed through a pedestrian path to the only portal and the free area, with gardens and swimming pool. Each house has a storage room and a garage space. The development is located in a privileged area of the city, next to the Antonio Banderas promenade, at number 1 Amalia Heredia street, on the corner of Cañada del Tesoro street. With views of the sea and less than 150 meters from the Playa de la Misericordia. It is a residential area that has all kinds of services that favor the quality of life of its inhabitants. It has schools, institutes, museums, sports facilities, parks, a municipal market and a nearby shopping area. All this forming part of an urban environment with wide sidewalks, public green areas and a walkable promenade. Completely connected to the rest of the capital, it has a Metro station 150 meters away, the AVE station 10 minutes away on foot and the Main Port of Malaga 3 kilometers away. Contact us to reserve housing or to ask any questions. You can also click on the link of our website to see all the information and leave us your data, to get in touch with you.

description: SPACIOUS, COMFORTABLE AND BRIGHT THREE-BEDROOM BRAND-NEW APARTMENT WITH A TERRACE. LOCATED JUST A FEW MINUTES FROM THE BEACH IN TORREMOLINOS.  Fortuny Hogares Únicos offers for sale this spacious, comfortable and bright brand-new flat, located just 700 metres from the beach and 900 metres from the centre of Torremolinos, close to all amenities: shops, supermarkets, restaurants, and cafes. At 10 minutes walking distance to the beaches of Bajondillo and Playamar. The property is well connected with public transport stops and the N-340 road to reach the capital of the Costa del Sol.  The property, situated on the first floor with a lift, with northeast orientation, consists of 87m2 built including the communal areas, 74m2 of living space, a large terrace 10m2 and is distributed in the entrance hall, a bright living-dining room with access to the terrace, an open plan kitchen open to the living room semi-furnished, a hallway, three bedrooms, the master bedroom has fitted wardrobes and an en suite bathroom, two more bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, and a second full bathroom that serves the rest of the rooms.  The property is brand new and has excellent qualities. Among them, we highlight the security access door, porcelain floors, pre-installation of air conditioning hot/cold and double-glazed windows.  The property has an optional storage room, price on request.  The building where the flat is located has a lift and is adapted for people with reduced mobility.  Beautiful property of recent construction, close to the centre of Torremolinos and with all services at hand. A perfect proposal for a quiet life with all the necessary services for daily life and an excellent purchase option as an investment.  The information provided is for guidance only, is not binding and has no contractual value. This information may have undergone modifications that have not yet been incorporated. description: Living in the city of Malaga, on the beachfront, in an exclusive development and with a swimming pool on the roof, is more than a dream.Thus, our Habitat TorreMare development will have around 100 homes to make this dream a reality very soon. Habitat TorreMare offers unique and exclusive homes in which a modern and open distribution stands out, in which every detail has been taken care of to optimize the comfort of the owners.Thus, the houses have living rooms that open onto the terraces and also with impressive windows that let the light and the sea enter directly into the home. The promotion also stands out for its impressive common areas.Thus, on the roof of Habitat TorreMare there is an exclusive swimming pool, where you can relax and unwind without leaving your own home.In addition, the promotion will have different options so that you can enjoy your leisure time, such as a gym, multipurpose room and gardens. The new development will be located in the area of El Pato- La Térmica, an area that is in full expansion both for its excellent facilities (such as the New Guadalhorce River Footbridge or the new Poniente Seafront) and for the real estate development that is experiencing and in which new prestigious developments such as Habitat Torre Mare stand out. In addition, the area is perfectly connected, both by public transport (by metro and bus), and by road, with its close access to the A-7, the A-45 and the M-20 Malaga ring road.And of course we must also highlight the new connections on foot, which allow you to walk the entire Paseo Marítimo. The promotion has all the necessary services in the area and, in addition, it is close to different points of interest such as the Los Patios Shopping Center, the Plaza Mayor Shopping Center, the Parador de Málaga Golf Club and also sports facilities such as the Palace Sports Martin Carpena, Inacua and Ciudad de Málaga Stadium in its surroundings.Five kilometers away is the city's train station and five minutes by car from Malaga international airport. Living in the city of Malaga means enjoying 365 days a year in a cosmopolitan city where you will find endless cultural, gastronomic and leisure options.All this, combined, of course, with its pleasant climate, perfect for enjoying the sea, the beach and nature. Without a doubt, Habitat TorreMare is the perfect option for those looking to enjoy a unique development, which offers exclusive and designer homes, where they can wake up every morning looking at the sea. *The image is indicative and does not necessarily correspond to the characteristics of the future homes.

description: Our project of 6 exclusive villas is located in the unique setting of the protected pine forest of Pinares de San Antón, one of the most exclusive residential areas in Málaga, from where you can enjoy a breath-taking view of the sea, the mountains and city, yet only a few minutes from the city centre, which allows easy access to the wide range of services that Málaga has to offer. The architectural concept of our villas is focused on a harmonious fusion with nature, which blends beautifully between indoor and outdoor living space. Natural light is the key element that draws the spaces, flowing through the wide doors and windows thanks to a south-west orientation, with exclusive views of the sea, the city and the pine tree covered mountains. A perfect blend between Location and Nature. The perfect circulation between the zones is orchestrated by an open space on the first floor that connects the living and dining areas, with access to a large terrace with a swimming pool and gardens.   The rooms, on the second floor, are designed to provide maximum space and comfort. This feeling is especially important in the master suite, which has a dressing area and its own bathroom. In all of them, the views of the sea and the city will make us feel that we live in paradise. The effort to perfectly illuminate the entire interior of the villa, thanks to the large. Location: 2 min from Tennis Club Malaga 5 min from international schools 5 min supermarkets 5 minutos beach 10 min shopping centres 10 minutos downtown 15 min Airport Málaga With cultural experiences (Museo Picasso, Museo Carmen Thyssen, Centre Pompidou Malaga), numerous recreational and sports facilities, many Tennis Clubs, several Marina’s, golf courses, shopping centres, international schools, and medical centres, city and rural sandy beaches, international airport, etc. , Málaga has quickly become one of the most exciting and authentic cities in Spain for investment (most recently Google & Vodafone) and residential living.

description: Are you looking for a spacious apartment with sea views in the towers of Playamar Torremolinos? . We offer a bright, high floor with 2 bedrooms and two bathrooms of 115m2 with wonderful sea and mountain views.  Nice and charming kitchen, with renovated plumbing and appliances In perfect condition from top brands. Large bright dining room with double-glazed windows and blinds with room for several sofas, with a terrace where you can receive and spend good afternoons with family and friends.  Bathrooms with direct light, double windows, screens new glass and renovated plumbing. One en suite. The bedrooms include built-in wardrobes made to measure with wooden Venetian doors and interior also lined with wood in both rooms. The entire house except the closed balconies have wooden flooring in perfect condition. The balconies have wooden flooring. ceramic imitating wood less than 3 years old. The house has another terrace currently used as an office with unobstructed views of the sea. This office can also be used as a guest bedroom since it has an enclosure and shutters.  Double glazing surrounding the entire house and central hot and cold air conditioning.  The urbanization consists of about 27,000 square meters, with several swimming pools with picnic tables, umbrellas, Hammocks, leafy trees, playground, mini golf, 2 tennis courts, ping-pong tables, basketball court and beach bar for the days when you don't want to cook. At the exit of the enclosure we will find two supermarkets (Mercadona and Carrefour ), pharmacy, taxis, several restaurants (Vietnamese, Italian, Indian... ), bus stop, cafeterias and Bajondillo beach 150m away. You can park throughout the premises, with a license plate reader, two cars per apartment  The community fees includes water, electricity, garbage collection on the same floor daily, security surveillance and maintenance. Do you want to know more details about this fantastic home? . Do not hesitate and contact us, we are looking forward to introducing you to your new home!

description: 37 flats of new construction IN ONE OF THE BEST AREAS OF THE CITY, 150 METERS FROM THE BEACH High-rise homes with 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms, with magnificent terraces, in a private urbanization, with a swimming pool and gardens. Located in the center of Malaga, on Calle Amalia Heredia 1, corner of Calle Cañada del Tesoro. The apartments are distributed on the ground floor and 6 floors + attic, configuring a single portal. All homes are exterior. The project is designed to achieve optimal sunlight and adequate ventilation of the houses. Pedestrian access to the plot is through a single door, which favors the safety of the farm and its future inhabitants. Once in the urbanization, it is accessed through a pedestrian path to the only portal and the free area, with gardens and swimming pool. Each house has a storage room and a garage space. The development is located in a privileged area of the city, next to the Antonio Banderas promenade, at number 1 Amalia Heredia street, on the corner of Cañada del Tesoro street. With views of the sea and less than 150 meters from the Playa de la Misericordia. It is a residential area that has all kinds of services that favor the quality of life of its inhabitants. It has schools, institutes, museums, sports facilities, parks, a municipal market and a nearby shopping area. All this forming part of an urban environment with wide sidewalks, public green areas and a walkable promenade. Completely connected to the rest of the capital, it has a Metro station 150 meters away, the AVE station 10 minutes away on foot and the Main Port of Malaga 3 kilometers away. Contact us to reserve housing or to ask any questions. You can also click on the link of our website to see all the information and leave us your data, to get in touch with you.

description: Detached villa from 2007, modern in style and with a totally independent apartment. BEAUTIFUL INDEPENDENT VILLA IN QUIET AREA OF MORALES, PUERTO DE LA TORRE LOCATION The CHALET is located in a location with privileged views.A 10-minute walk from the main street and just 5 minutes by car.The area has basic services nearby, supermarkets, schools, pharmacy...Puerto de la Torre, is today one of the best communicated districts in Malaga, with access to the ring road in all directions and minutes from Teatinos, Cónsul and Carlos de Haya. LIVING PLACE The chalet is divided into two floors.At street level you enter the garage, completely renovated, with a clean and careful finish as well as a toilet.Through some stairs we access the main floor, where we find an extensive terrace.Two bedrooms, one double and one single but spacious, and a full bathroom with a shower.From here we can already see the unobstructed views that the property has, you can see the entire Puerto de la Torre and beyond, breathing fresh air and tranquility at the same time. On the next floor down, to the right we enter a cozy living/dining room with a fireplace, perfect for the cold winter months, and a large window with completely unobstructed views.To the left, we find the fully equipped kitchen with top quality countertops and furniture and also a window with the same views as the living room.To the left is the full bathroom with a bathtub. Furnished and modern kitchen with access to the terrace, 3 bedrooms with built-in and lined wardrobes inside, two complete bathrooms, one of them en-suite with bathtub, bidet and window to the outside The apartment is equipped with a garage, storage room and community pool, plus solar panels that benefit considerable home energy savings. If this is your chance to get this home, you can contact Arturo at ☎ who will help you and answer all kinds of questions. Do not miss this opportunity, we will be happy to show it to you. description: GILMAR Real Estate exclusively sells this magnificent Residencial Bisso development, located in the heart of the west of Malaga, in the Girón-Las Delicias neighborhood.Urban nature area where its streets exude tradition and preserve the familiar atmosphere of a lifetime. Residencial Bisso is an urban building conditioned for today's lifestyle, where the functionality of your home, the optimization of spaces and light are aimed at improving your life.Quality and design come together to create 23 apartments with 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms.And homes on the first floor with private patios. They have a storage room and parking space for greater comfort.In addition to well-kept common areas.The distribution follows the trends that best adapt to the current lifestyle, with a dining room connected to the kitchen and many details that make Residencial Bisso a dream home. The Residencial Biso facilities are designed for a relaxed and comfortable life adapted to all tastes.Indoor pool with a solarium area to enjoy almost all year round.A space for family, couples or friends where you can disconnect and have a good time. At Residencial Bisso you can choose between different styles of flooring, doors, tiles, kitchen furniture or separate the living room from the kitchen.Create warm spaces tailored to your needs. Residencial Bisso is designed seeking greater efficiency to reduce energy consumption, take care of the environment and provide climatic comfort within the home. It has a careful thermal envelope with state-of-the-art insulation solutions that are also combined with efficient and high-performance installations such as aerothermal energy for DHW and LED technology with a presence detector in common areas.Getting the building to have reduced energy consumption and is low in CO2 emissions.Quality standards that guarantee the comfort and enjoyment of the home. The Girón - Las Delicias neighborhood offers endless possibilities to enjoy the sea and the beach, just 800 meters from the Paseo Marítimo Antonio Banderas, and leisure, its gastronomy and its culture.Its excellent connections stand out, a few meters away we find several bus stops, the Metro and train station.10 minutes from the center of Malaga and the airport. A neighborhood that has it all, great commercial activity such as restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacies and large facilities such as public schools, libraries, health center, sports spaces.Resources that make life easier and more comfortable. Without a doubt, this is a magnificent purchase opportunity for investment or for a finalist client who wants to live in a quiet, well-connected neighborhood in the city of Malaga that is constantly being renovated.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Girón - Las Delicias - Pacífico, Málaga
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle José Bisso, 3

description: NEW PROMOTION FOR SALE We are pleased to present you with an exciting project called ALTOVELOO, located in Rincón de la Victoria (Málaga), so that you can enjoy the wonderful climate of Andalusia. DELIVERY IS IMMEDIATE, delivery of homes is from 1 to 6 months. ALTOVELOO is made up of 12 blocks of four heights each, these are made up of spacious homes with 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms, all facing South or Southwest, all of them enjoy large terraces to enjoy the views of our imposing Mediterranean, parking spaces, panoramic elevators and extensive common areas. The houses are very spacious, with dimensions ranging from 55 to 73 m2 and terraces up to 97 m2, most of the houses are adapted for people with reduced mobility, as well as the parking spaces. For this reason, we have designed spacious and wonderful garden areas, achieving an incomparable space, likewise, we find large common spaces with a fantastic swimming pool, paddle tennis, children's playground, etc. , to be able to enjoy all the pleasures without leaving your home environment. Near the urbanization, business center, gym and SPA facilities are planned. As well as a new exit to the A-7 motorway next to the urbanization. The location is close to essential services such as educational, health and sports centers, such as the Añoreta Golf course. Also highlight the 4 min. to the fantastic beaches of Rincón de la Victoria, 15 min. to the center of beautiful Malaga or 30 min. from the International Airport of Malaga – Costa del Sol. Get to know ALTOVELOO!

description: Text: The AVANT Building has 12 homes located in the Historic Center of Malaga, behind the Cervantes Theater, 3 minutes on foot from Plaza de la Merced and 5 from the Cathedral. In this building, we have sought to design unique spaces, making a difference with the avant-garde design, which can be seen both on its façade and in its careful interior. As the backbone of the building, it has a central patio with an artificial vertical garden that provides light and air, lighting and ventilation, regulating the temperature of the different rooms. The homes are 1-bedroom apartments, studios and penthouses with lofts and solarium terraces. Unique homes for a unique enclave in the heart of Malaga. The Promotion has 12 homes distributed over 4 floors, a central patio and an entrance portal. The 1-bedroom apartments on the top floor have a second room, an ideal attic to house a second bedroom plus a Terrace-Solarium. All the units are equipped with air conditioning and a furnished kitchen fully equipped with electrical appliances.

description: APARTMENTS FOR SALE IN BENALMÁDENA! Hábitat Mediterránea offers you this promotion of flats of new construction in first quality and in a privileged area from Benalmádena Costa, 500 meters from the beach and 800 meters from the center of Arroyo de la Miel, the main urban center of Benalmádena, on the Costa del Sol, province of Málaga, next to to the residential Puerto Marina, on Avenida de San Carlos. There are 89 homes with between 2 and 3 bedrooms, distributed in a building of five heights, which count some of they with storage room and/or garage included in the price, This development consists of homes with full bathrooms, kitchen furnished with low kitchen units (70cm/80cm) equipped with a 60 cm dishwasher, combined refrigerator, extractor hood, ceramic hob and oven; qualities in its finishes such as: thermal insulation, walkable covers in non-slip porcelain stoneware on the porch and terraces, tiled in bathrooms with first quality, false ceiling with smooth plastic paint in all rooms, double glazing type Climalit (or similar and motorized blinds), fitted wardrobes modular with sliding doors and pre-installation of air individual conditioning. The buildings are equipped with elevators for people to a load capacity of 630kg (8 people), with door automatic two-leaf with telescopic opening. With this price we offer you this apartment with a surface of 91`58m² useful, distributed between: fully equipped kitchen furnished equipped with electrical appliances, 3 bright bedrooms, large living-dining room, 2 bathrooms, one with a bathtub and another with a shower, and a large terrace with spectacular views with an area of 12`56m². Includes a garage space (n.44) and storage room (T-02). ** The images correspond to the pilot model for show and recreate the spaces that could enjoy, providing you with a possible decoration option and use, since the houses are delivered without furnish, except the kitchen. Located in an excellent location, it is close to to shopping areas supermarket MÁS, first class stores need such as bakery, fruit shop, tobacconist, pharmacies, etc.), educational centers (c.AND.I.P.El Tomillar, Medyform-Benalmádena), leisure centers (El Tomillar Soccer Field, Fortuna Theatre, Cultural Center Bullfighting Museum, Sea Life Benalmádena), centers of health (FitClub, 6 minutes from the Health Center of Arroyo de Honey) and with several main communication routes in its surroundings: by road (the N-340 at 1km, the A-7 and E-14 at 2km, among others), several urban bus stops (lines M-124 at 100m, lines M-112, M-121 and M-126 at 400m), by road air with Malaga-Costa del Sol Airport 18 minutes away, and by sea the Puerto Deportivo de Benalmádena 11 minutes away, in addition to have the Benalmádena Bus Station, bus stops taxi and the train station of Arroyo de la Miel, a few 15 minutes walking. Among the common areas for use and enjoyment within this fenced and closed urbanization is: social area of uses multiple, coworking, equipped indoor gym, toilets and changing rooms, recreational spaces and outdoor rooms with a children's area, community gardens with a promenade area, banks etcand a bicycle parking area in low level, A unique opportunity that you should not miss to invest in a home with everything you want at an exceptional price. CONTACT US, WE WILL BE HAPPY TO ASSIST YOU. We can advise you free of charge throughout the process of buying and selling, as well as being able to guide and manage the financing if necessary, since we have contact in collaboration with all banking entities, and thus be able to offer you the best conditions.

description: Irene Homes sells a spacious semi-detached house, in Torrequebrada, with an elevator. It is located in a quiet and residential area. A 15-minute walk from the beach and the promenade.A 5-minute drive from the center of Arroyo de la Miel, La Paloma park and suburban train station.A few steps from the Maravillas school. The urbanization has a special charm, a closed area with large gardens, community pool, gym, social club. The semi-detached house stands out for its spaciousness and its surroundings, with views of the sea and mountains. Distributed in 3 levels plus attic.A corner surrounded by outdoor areas.206 2 of housing, 26 m2 of terraces and 37 m2 of garden. Two private garage spaces right at the door of the house. On the main floor there is a living-dining room with a corner terrace at the foot of the living room, a toilet and an independent kitchen, with the possibility of opening to the living room. Basement floor there are two large bedrooms, with en-suite bathrooms, 2 dressing rooms and a living room. On the upper floor there are 2 bedrooms, each with en-suite bathrooms and terraces. In the attic you have an open space with windows, the possibility of using it as a bedroom or office. Elevator from basement to upper floor. Do not hesitate to contact us for more information. You imagine it, we find it. Your next house.
