description: Fantastic couplet in Alto del Pinar. Located in a quiet area with services, supermarkets and train stop a few minutes away. The house is renovated with top quality materials. The plot has 408 M2 and 200m2 built in a semi-detached house with three floors. - On the main floor, we will find a beautiful living room next to the kitchen and with access to a large terrace with sea views. Two bedrooms and two bathrooms. In addition, from the main terrace through the spiral staircase, we will access the solarium where the solar and photovoltaic panels are located and close to the entrance door, we will find a storage room and an area to store gardening things. - On the ground floor, it has another cozy living room with its independent terrace, equipped kitchen, two bedrooms and two bathrooms (one of them en suite). Also, if you wish, you can join both floors to create a duplex (as it was originally). - At the pool level we would have an independent apartment, perfect to use with our guests. In it we have a living room, kitchen, two bedrooms and a bathroom. It also has a fantastic pool with its outdoor bathroom, magnificent views and fruit trees throughout the plot. description: Exclusive luxury villa in an unbeatable setting 15 minutes from Malaga, located in a residential area in Miraflores del Palo, this being one of the best places to live with panoramic views and absolute privacy. The plot consists of about 4.000 m2 with a house of 2.400m2 distributed on 3 floors with elevator. The entrance has a round fountain and ample parking area for four vehicles, from which you can access the house or the gardens. In the garden there is a beautiful pool with waterfall giving this an elegant, fresh and natural environment to the land, it also has a saltwater Jacuzzi next to the pool and barbecue. The house is oriented to the south obtaining lots of light and wonderful views. It has a spectacular entrance to the house with a mahogany staircase that ascends to the first floor, being located in the center a space where you can place a chandelier. Each plant is divided in two. The first floor that is accessed contains a large living room with different spaces and access to the garden from it, then we have a large bedroom with built-in wardrobe; then we go to the kitchen with dining room, contains laundry area, pantry and a beautiful island. This kitchen contains an exit to a nice porch to eat in its wonderful garden. On the lower floor there is a distributor that leads to a living room divided into two rooms, an area for diners with a fireplace and a diaphanous leisure area with kitchen, also with access to the gardens from the lower floor. It has a heated pool with jacuzzi and a toilet. There are 2 bedrooms with 2 full en suite bathrooms and closets in each of them. On the upper floor there are 2 large master bedrooms with 2 elegant en suite bathrooms in each, next to each bedroom you have access to a huge dressing room. The villa also has solar panels, security shutters, piped music, security cameras and alarm and fire system, the construction dates from 2.000, the materials and finishes are of real luxury. It contains 3 premises of approximately 200m2 each. Do not miss out on this great opportunity to live in a dream place! description: Arenal Homes is a newly built residential complex located in the privileged surroundings of Benalmádena, one of the most dynamic and up-and-coming towns on the Costa del Sol. In its surroundings you will find all the necessary services for day to day life such as school, high school, nursery, supermarkets, hospitals, golf courses, paddle tennis courts, playgrounds, public transport.. . It is also a very well communicated area, with access to the A7 less than 5 minutes away. Arenal Homes consists of a total of 96 properties of 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms distributed in 5 low-rise buildings. All the properties have large terraces, with the solariums of the penthouses and the gardens of the ground floor apartments standing out. It is also worth mentioning the variety of kitchens available in the residence, from independent kitchens to open or semi-open kitchens. The complex, designed by the prestigious architectural studio HCP, has pleasant communal garden areas and a swimming pool, all within a private and secure complex. The apartment is located in a super quiet urbanization, where silence reigns, green areas, swimming pool, paddle tennis court, children's area, etc. It has two large bedrooms, both with fitted wardrobes and two full bathrooms, from the living room you can go out to a large terrace from which you can enjoy views of the sea and the mountains, its Southwest orientation means you can have some warm afternoons in winter and be able to use the terrace. At the entrance of the house we find a hall with built-in wardrobes, which are always useful and from here you go to the living room and the kitchen, which is fully furnished and with access to a super large laundry room. It also has a private garage space and a storage room. In compliance with the decree of the Junta de Andalucía 218-2005 of October 11, clients are informed that the notarial, registry and I.T.P.Are not included in the price.We remind you that as a consumer you have the right to be informed and delivered the corresponding informative documentation, as the case may be, based on the provisions of Decree 218/05 of October 11 that regulates the Consumer Information Regulation in the purchase -Sale and lease of homes in Andalusia.

description: Angela Schroeder Soluciones Inmobiliarias sells a villa in Cerrado de Calderón, one of the most prestigious areas of East Malaga, given its wide range of services of all kinds, restaurants, shops and leisure, highlighting the presence of important concerted and private educational centers such as the French Lyceum and Saint George. It is excellently connected to the rest of the city by public transport, and just a few minutes from the motorway in all directions. It is an independent property that is part of a private complex of several single-family homes, which share an open-plan multipurpose area and a large swimming pool. The house is distributed over 2 floors plus a basement, it is projected on a 240 m2 plot and consists of approximately 200 m2 of housing. It has 2 spacious and bright living rooms, both with fireplaces, a large furnished and equipped kitchen with an office area, a laundry room, 3 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes (the second living room can be used as a large additional bedroom, thus making the property have 4 bedrooms). ), 3 complete bathrooms (of which 2 of them are en suite) and a beautiful entrance porch. In the basement, an independent apartment for guests or different functionalities could be projected.

description: Fabulous residential complex in Benalmádena Costa 400 meters from the beach. Quiet area very close to Parque de la Paloma and Puerto Marina, and surrounded by all services: shops, restaurants, health center, pharmacy, schools, etc. Commuter train. 15 minutes from Malaga and airport. A modern private residential complex that offers 2 and 3 bedroom apartments with large terraces where you can enjoy the best climate on the Costa del Sol. The kitchens come fully furnished and equipped with appliances. The thermal-acoustic insulation system and the installation of Climalit glass windows provide maximum comfort and considerable energy savings. The complex also offers fantastic common areas with swimming pool, solarium, communal gardens designed with a walk area, benches and recreational spaces with a children's area, gastroclub, coworking, gym, and bicycle parking area. Each apartment includes 1 parking space and some with storage room. The information and images published are merely illustrative so they are not contractual and are subject to modifications due to technical, legal or commercial requirements of the promotion.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida san carlos, 6

description: Beautiful restored 19th century house. For the reform, original materials from Malaga have been used, such as the cobblestones or the mud of the bathrooms and the original terrace of the tiles of Vélez Málaga. The fountain takes advantage of the freshness of the water and communicates with a wind tower that is on the terrace (original Iranian system) and thus lowers the interior temperature by several degrees. The whole house is heated with splits for hot and cold, it has gas radiators and two pellet fireplaces in the dining room and living room. Private pool on the upper terrace with glass floors. Hydraulic floors, some original and others made by hand. Kitchen with double induction and gas system and concrete floor. Views of the Alcazaba and endless peculiarities. The house has 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, living room, kitchen. The house has four heights on the ground floor, there is the living room, the kitchen and a bathroom with a shower tray and inside there is a fountain with a vertical garden with pots that reaches the upper floor of the house. On the first floor there are two rooms that share a full bathroom. On the second floor there are two other rooms that share a full bathroom. On the solarium floor a beautiful terrace with a private pool. This magnificent house is located in the heart of Malaga.

On the first floor there are three bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and 2 full bathrooms, a master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and a dressing room. Spacious and bright south-facing villa, all exterior, distributed over 3 floors as follows: The ground floor has a 13 m² front terrace, a 30m² living-dining room with air conditioning, a 15m² kitchen with access to a 10m² interior patio, a toilet with a shower. The first floor is divided into 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom). The 2nd floor has a bedroom with access to a terrace. The complex is located in the Arenal Golf area, a pleasant residential area that stands out for its tranquillity and comfort. In its surroundings you will find all the necessary services for day to day life such as school, high school, nursery, supermarkets, hospitals, golf courses, paddle tennis courts, playgrounds, public transport.. . It is also a very well communicated area, with access to the A7 less than 5 minutes away. Arenal Homes consists of a total of 96 properties of 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms distributed in 5 low-rise buildings. The complex, designed by the prestigious architectural studio HCP, has pleasant communal garden areas and a swimming pool, all within a private and secure complex. description: Gilmar Consulting Real Estate sells this wonderful apartment, located in one of the best places in the city of Malaga, Barrio de La Malagueta, a place located next to Muelle Uno del Puerto and delimited by the beach of the same name. An excellent corner that becomes a wonderful alternative to get to know the capital of the Costa del Sol in depth and, also, enjoy its many gastronomic options facing the Mediterranean, just a few meters and a short walk from its no less prestigious Historic Center, with the Cathedral, Roman Theater, Castle, Alcazaba, without a doubt the perfect place to reside in this beautiful city. In a building in perfect condition, with an elevator, this property is located with a constructed area of 191 square meters, which is distributed in a large independent room, where a part of the terrace has been incorporated into it, leaving a large space with two very different areas for living and dining, a large entrance hall, a very large kitchen that has also been rectified, including the old service area to make a space with an office, it also has 4 large bedrooms, the main one that has access the same as from the living room with open terrace with beautiful views of the sea, and finally has 2 full bathrooms. What stands out the most about this property, in addition to its location, and its width for its meters, is the beautiful view that it has directly to the sea, which we can also enjoy from its large terrace. Next to the house a garage space is sold for your comfort. At Gilmar Consulting Real Estate we have been working to offer our clients the best properties for 37 years. We cover all real estate needs with more than 4,000 homes for sale, second-hand apartments, new construction, chalets, beachfront, rustic properties, commercial premises, plots.. . We have more than 30 specialized teams in different areas at the service of more than 90,000 national and international clients, who have the necessary advice to guarantee their security, legal effectiveness and the best financial-fiscal profitability. Call us and we will help you find the house of your dreams. The best investment options to make your money profitable.

description: Exclusive luxury villa in an unbeatable setting 15 minutes from Malaga, located in a residential area in Miraflores del Palo, this being one of the best places to live with panoramic views and absolute privacy. The plot consists of about 4.000 m2 with a house of 2.400m2 distributed on 3 floors with elevator. The entrance has a round fountain and ample parking area for four vehicles, from which you can access the house or the gardens. In the garden there is a beautiful pool with waterfall giving this an elegant, fresh and natural environment to the land, it also has a saltwater Jacuzzi next to the pool and barbecue. The house is oriented to the south obtaining lots of light and wonderful views. It has a spectacular entrance to the house with a mahogany staircase that ascends to the first floor, being located in the center a space where you can place a chandelier. Each plant is divided in two. The first floor that is accessed contains a large living room with different spaces and access to the garden from it, then we have a large bedroom with built-in wardrobe; then we go to the kitchen with dining room, contains laundry area, pantry and a beautiful island. This kitchen contains an exit to a nice porch to eat in its wonderful garden. On the lower floor there is a distributor that leads to a living room divided into two rooms, an area for diners with a fireplace and a diaphanous leisure area with kitchen, also with access to the gardens from the lower floor. It has a heated pool with jacuzzi and a toilet. There are 2 bedrooms with 2 full en suite bathrooms and closets in each of them. On the upper floor there are 2 large master bedrooms with 2 elegant en suite bathrooms in each, next to each bedroom you have access to a huge dressing room. The villa also has solar panels, security shutters, piped music, security cameras and alarm and fire system, the construction dates from 2.000, the materials and finishes are of real luxury. It contains 3 premises of approximately 200m2 each. Do not miss out on this great opportunity to live in a dream place! In compliance with the decree of the Junta de Andalucia 2082005 of October 11, the client is informed that the notary, registry, I expenses. T. Built with high-quality materials and a modern style, this townhouse has 182 square meters of constructed area and a front terrace of 80 square meters with a barbecue area, as well as a backyard of 15.50 square meters. This 4 bedroom house offer plenty of outdoor space for the whole family. The house is bright with a west and north orientation, making it a warm and cozy place to live. Additionally, being located on a corner provides greater privacy and natural light. The distribution of the house is perfect. In the basement, you'll find a private garage, a 10-square-meter storage room, and a 30-square-meter multi-purpose room. On the ground floor, the house has a beautiful and welcoming entrance through the outdoor terrace, a living room, a large bedroom, toilet, fully equipped kitchen, and a nice patio of 15.50 square meters. On the first floor, you'll find three bedrooms and a bathroom, one of them with a private terrace. And on the second floor, you'll discover a spacious attic that could be an extra apartment on the top, an office area, or extra living room. In summary, this townhouse is perfect for those looking for a modern, comfortable, and secure home in a quiet and beautiful location. Don't miss the opportunity to be the first to visit it!
